po dang ldan pa/ gsal bar mdzad du gsol/ bcoM ldan 'das bdag gi mig rnams par sbyang du gsol zhes byas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das lha'i gnas pa la bzhugs pa/ lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa
mi las 'das pas shAkya bde bas tshig de skad brjod pa gsan to/ /gsan nas kyang ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la mig rnam

par sbyong ba'i rig sngags 'dis shAkya bde ba la bsrung ba gyis shig /yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spangs ba dang /

mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing ba gyis shig / de dang de bzhin du 'khor bzhi po dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge snyen rnams dang /

dge snyen ma rnaMs dang / sems can gzhan gyis mig kyang rnam par sbyongs shig /mig gis sbubs rnam par sbyongs shig /mig gi skyon med par gyis shig /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ ki li mi li/ hi li te mi li/

hu yA hu yA hu yA ma ni/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ hu du hu du hu du/ tsak+Shur me bi sho d+ha ya swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo mig rnam par sbyong ba 'di ni mig gi skyon dang / rlung gi skyon dang / mkhris pa'i skyon dang / bad

kan gyi skyon dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa'i skyon sel te/ tshul khrims kyi bden pa dang / brtul zhugs kyi bden pa dang / drang srong rnams kyi bden pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi bden

pa dang / kun 'byung gi bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bden pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bden pas
shAkya bde ba'i m-ig na bar ma gyur cig /mchi ma 'dzag par ma gyur cig /kun tu mchi ma 'dzag par ma gyur cig /bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur cig swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig

sngags kyi rgyal mo mig rnam par sbyong ba 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug gi gsungs pa'o/ /nga yang da ltar 'chad de/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha rnams kyi bdag po rgya byin dang / mi mjed
kyi bdag po tshang pa yang rjes su yi rang ngo / /kun dga' bo gang gis rig sngags 'di dus gsum du brjod na de la thibs par 'gyur ba'am/ rab rib 'am/ ling tog gam/ mig nad sngon por mthong ba 'am/
mig gi yul gyi skyon lha las gyur pa rnaMs sam/ klu las gyur pa rnams sam/ dri za las gyur pa rnams sam/ gnod sbyin las gyur pa rnams sam/ srin po las gyur pa rnams sam/ sha za las gyur pa
rnams sam/ byad las gyur pa rnams sam/ ro langs las gyur pa rnams sam/ ro langs dang byad las gyur pa rnams sam/ kun tu rgyu las gyur pa rnams sam/ kun tu rgyu dang ro langs las gyur pa rnams

kyis tshugs par 'gyur ba ni lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i skyi dgu'i 'jig rten na ngas ma mthong ste
de ni gnas med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ bcoM ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams gzung ste/ kun
chub par byas nas shAkya bde ba ga la ba der song ste/ bde ba mig rnam par sbyong ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la bskur gyis nyin re zhing dus gsum du dran par gyis
shig ces de la rgyas par smras so/ /shAkya bde bas thos ma thag kho nar mig rnam par dag te/ mig rnam par dag pas dri ma med pa'i mig gis thams cad mthong ngo / /bcom ldan
'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / shAkya bde ba dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon

par bstod do/ /'phags pa mig rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags/ rdzogs s+ho// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba an ta rA yi bi sho d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bar du gcod
pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa
dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi shar phyogs bram ze'i grong shing a mra'i gnas shes bya ba de'i byang phyogs na lus 'phags ri la dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs so/ /
de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'chi 'pho'-i chos su gyur te/ de'i tshe 'du byed kyi lhag ma lus pa'i lnga ltas khong du chud nas skrag pa skyes te/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang / g.yog dang bcas
par bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ yang de'i tshe don du gnyer
ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de'i phyir khyod kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi gang dag gis bdud thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad dang /
phas kyi rgal ba thaMd shin tu tshar bcad par 'gyur ba bar du bcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams nyon cig /tad+ya thA/ a b+ha yi/

b+ha ya bi ga te/ b+ha ya pa ri sho d+ha ne/ a b+ha yi/ a b+ha ya~M da de/ ni du ba kliSh+Te/ a na ku le/ a ku la pa ri sho d+ha ne/ a be kal pa ne/ a ts+yu ti/ shu b+he shu b+ha/ te dzo te dzo ba te/ sha ni u pa sha me/ ma ho pa sha me/ me dri/ mai t+r+yud

d+hi te to she/ to sha ya Ne sat+ye/ sa t+ya dar shi/ a bi rud d+hi/ sa ha te/ s-i hi ta twe/ aR+be aR+tha sid d+hi/ a mr-i te/ a mri ta ba te/ a b+hI te/ badzra sa t+ye a k+Sha ye/ ak+Sha ya pra b+he/ dran tra ba re/ shud d+he

shud d+he pra b+he/ a ba b+hA se/ a ba b+hA sa ba ti/ u pa yo ge/ A nuta ta re/ sa ma tsit+te/ bud d+ha ad+hi Sh+ThA ne/ shI le bi sho d+ha na/ a sang hA r+ye/ su ni gri tI/ tam ma ra bA lA nA ma/ pa ra dza yo

dr-iSh+Ti ga tra nA~M/ dz+wa la na~M d+harmo la kA le/ ud g+ha Ta nA~M/ d+har+m+ma ni d+ha na s+ya sa~M gra ha nA~M/ d+har+m+ma go sha s+ya/ kau shi ka khyod kyis rig pa'i gsang bsngags gzhi dag ni khyod kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi gang
dag gis bdud thaMd dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin du tshar bcad par 'gyur ba dag go/ 'di bzlas brjod byas na sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma
gtogs par bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur/ don thams cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin

yi rangs te/ de'i tshe 'di skad du/ kho bo lha las ma gyur la/ /'di nyid na ni 'dug bzhin du/ /kho bos tshe yang thob zin gyis/ /grogs dag de ltar shes par gyis/ /shes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /

'di'i mthu thams cad kyis bdag gi bar du gcod pa dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thaMd ni med par gyur cig /phun sum tshog pa thams cad ni grub par gyur cig /na mo a ke tu le na ge tsaN Da na ye swA hA/

sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni ye swA hA/ d+harmA sA d+ha ni ye swA hA/ sarba ngar ye bi sho d+ha ni ye swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha rnams kyis dbang po brgya byin btsun mo'i 'khor
dang bcas shing 'khor dang bcas pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa bar du gcod pa thaMd rnam par sbyong ba

zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po/ dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / @/ /rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya sarba
an ta ra sa~M grA sa d+hA ra N-I man tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs sngags/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje gzungs bsngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas rjod byed pa de la ni dug dang / mtshon gyis

'chi ba dang / ltogs pa dang / mtshon brgyab pa dang / gcan zan ma rungs pas za ba dang / mes tshig pa dang / chur 'chi ba dang / 'go ba'i r-ims gzhan ya nga ba dang / mdze'i nad dang / gsor mi rung ba'i nad ya

nga ba dang / g.yang la lhung ba dang / gzhan gyi byad dang / zas kyis mnangs pa dang / bdag rang gis gsod pa dang / de ltar gshis ngan du 'chi ba bcu gsum gyis rkyen byed par mi 'gyur ro/ / phyag na rdo rje gzungs
sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas rjod byed pa de la ni sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i bgegs dregs pa can ma rungs pa rnaMs kyis kyang glag rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /phyag na

rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas rjod byed pa de la las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing dag ste/ bde ba

can gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /\u0f00 badzra tsan+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la hU~M phaT/ sarba big+ha~M an+ta rA ya bi nA sha ka ra mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ ces brgya tsa brgyad brjod na 'grub pa'o/ /nges par
'grub pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs/ sngags/ rdzogs s+ho// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya dra mi dra bid+ya rA dza/ bod skad du/ 'phags
pa 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na smig
ma'i myu gu'i 'khor gyi khyams na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis glog thaMd zlog pa/ so sor 'brang ba sngon gyi
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsungs pa nga yang da ltar 'chad kyis zung shig /kun dga' bo shar phyogs na 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo
lho phyogs na skad brgya zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo nub phyogs na 'od nyam pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo byang phyogs na rgyun gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i glog yod do/ /kun dga'
bo gang la la glog 'di rnams kyi ming shes pa dang / phyogs rnams par gnas pa shes pa de la glog gis 'jigs pa thams cad du mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o/ /glog gi m-ing 'di dag yi
ger bris te/ gnas gang dag tu bzhag pa'i gnas de dag tu glog thams cad mi 'bab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal
to/ /tad+ya thA/ ni mi ni ni mi mi ni mi ni ni mi na d+ha re/ 'jig rten gsum sna bar byed pa/ lag na rtse gsum pas phyogs 'dir glog thams cad las bdag la srung shig bsrung shig swA hA/ yang de'i
tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyugs 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnams grangs 'di la/ 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ha de/ bi ha te/ ni ha te/ pra t+yar+thi ke /
pra t+ya mi tre/ shud d+he/ muka ke/ bi ma le/ pra b+ha swa re/ aN Da re/ paN Da re/ shwe te/ ban d+ha ra bA si ni/ ha ri ka ra de/ ping ga la kI dan+ti mu khi/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad
las bdag la bsrungs shig /bsrungs shig /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis bdag gis dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad mthong bar ma gyur
cig swA hA/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnams grangs 'di la gzungs kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni/ mu ni mu ni re r-i/ ma ti ma ti/ su ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/
hA hA hA hA/ khyod la sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig ces lag na rdo rjes smras kyis/ d+hi D+ha swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bsrung ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di su'i snying la 'dzin tam/
yi ger bris nas de la bdag gis rtag par rgyun du 'jigs pa thaMd las bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las thar bar bgyi'o/ /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs
pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba bskyed pa'i slad du chos kyi rnaMs grangs 'di

la gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ tsi li swA hA/ brah+ma swA re swa re swA hA/ brah+ma gar+b+he puSh+pa sa~M sta re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi
srung ba tshangs pa'i chad pa zhes bgyi ba ste/ du ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su bskyob pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya
byin gyis bcom ldan 'das ga ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi

gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ni ba ra nI ban d+ha ban d+ha mA dan d+ha/ ma ti ma ti/ ti Ti/ gau ri/ gan d+ha ri/ tsan Da li/ ma ta~M gi/ ba ra la ni/ hI na ma d+h+ya ma d+hA ra nI ma la ni/ da la mad te/
tsakra pa kri/ sha ba ri sha ba ri swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi rig sngags rdo rje lce 'bebs pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar bar bgyid pa/ dus ma
lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po
rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /

skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe puSh+pe/ d+harma ba ri ha ri/ Ar+ya
pra sha ste/ nir mug te/ ma~M ga li/ stu te/ sta ba ste/ swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag gi bsrung ba 'jigs pa ma mchis pa zhes bya ste/ 'jigs pa thams
cad las mi 'jigs par bgyid pa/ tshe skyong ba/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thaMd las yongs su bskyob pa lags so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po brgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang / klu'i
rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi bsrung ba chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba glog thams cad zlog pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad sel
ba/ dug rnams mi gdug par bgyid pa/ gshed byed dang / byad dang / ro langs dang / bkra mi shis pa 'jig par bgyid pa mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'di
nas 'byung ba dang / ser sna spang ba'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs te de bzhes su gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu rnams ni sems ser sna
can ste/ sems ser snas kun nas dkris pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /tad+yad thA/ a ra dze/ a ma re/ a mr-i te/ ak+Sha ye/ puN+ya par+ya pa te/ sarba pA pa pra sha ma n-I ye swA hA/ Ar+ya pu n+ya so
pa kI ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la'i lce la 'don tam/ yi ger bris pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad ma
mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /rtsa ba'i dug gam/ mche ba'i dug gam/ dbyig dug gam/ gang dag gzhan yang yan lag las byung ba'i dug de dag gis de 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi
'gyur ro/ /bdag 'jigs pa thaMd dang / gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jigs rten skyong ba dang /
klu'i bdag po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin bzangs dag khyed skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ chos kyi rnams grangs 'di
brjes su gzungs ba'i phyir 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad pa legs so legs so/ /phyogs rnams na gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa rnaMs
bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten bskyong ba de dag dang / klu'i dbang po de dag dang /
lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags

kyi rgyal po/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ /
@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+h+wa dza a gra ke y+'u ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'-i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na zla ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs te/ de nas lha'i
dbang po brgya byin lha ma yin rnaMs las pham/ rab tu pham nas de btab cing rings pa'i gzugs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di ltar lha ma yin dang g.yul bkye ba las/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris las pham/
rab tu pham ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang pham/ rab tu pham na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ lha'i

dbang po khyod kyis rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs zung shig /ngas kyang sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal
mtshan las 'di mnos so/ /mnos nas kyang gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bshad do/ /mngon par dran te de tshun chad 'jigs pa 'am/ bag tsha ba 'am/ spu zing zhes byed pa 'am/ tha na skad
cig yud tsam yang lus la gnod pa byung ma myong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung brgyan ces bgyi ba gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i gzungs de gang lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'

stsal pa/ tad+ya thA/ \u0f00 dza ya dza ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ dza ya bA hi ni/ shang ka ri shang ka ri/ pra b+hang ka ri/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi/ sarba sha trU~M/ dza~M b+ha ya dza~M b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/

mo ha ya/ b+ha ga ba ti/ dza ya bA hi ni/ ma thA ma thA/ pra ma thA pra ma thA/ gra sa gra sa/ ha sa ha sa/ hU~M hU~M/ la hU~M la hU~M/ lam bo d+ha ri/ tre ne tre/ tsa tur bAk+ke/ tsa tur da~M Sh+T+re/ tsa tur b+hu dze/ a si mu sa la/ tsakra/ tri shU la/ badzra ka ba dza d+ha ri/

bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig /\u0f00 b+ha ga ba ti/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ pa ra se n+ya~M/ bi d+h+wan

sa ya/ sarba sha trU~M nA sha ya/ d+h+wa dza a gra ke yU re/ tri Ta tri Ta tri Ta/ b+h+ri Ta b+h+ri Ta/ u la kA mu khi u la kA d+ha ra NI/ trai lokya ma thA ni/ bi d+h+wan sa ya pa ra se n+yan/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las

srungs shig srungs shig /tsa la tsa la/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ ka~M pa ka~M pa/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ muny+dza muny+dza/ Am+Ta hA sam bid+h+wan sa ya/ pa ra se n+yan/ bdag gnod

pa thams cad las bsrungs shig bsrungs shig /trA sa ya trA sa ya/ b+h+rA ma ya b+h+rA ma ya/ bud d+ha sa t+ye na/ d+harma sa t+ye na/ sa~M g+ha sa t+ye na/ sa t+ya bA di nA~M/ sa t+ye na/ bud d+ha sa t+ye ma tri kra ma/ d+harma sa

t+ye ma tri kra ma/ sa~M g+ha sa t+ye ma ti kra ma/ sa t+ye bA ti nA~M sa t+ye ma t+ye kra ma/ lam+bo d+ha ri/ lam+bo d+ha ri/ ku Ta ku Ta/ kuT+Ta kuT+Ta/ kuT+Ta kuT+TA pa ya kuT+TA pa ya/ ru dra ma nA ya/ biSh+Nu ma nA ya/ tsan+d+ra sUr+yA bA mA nA trai

lokya a d+hi pa ti ma nA ya sarba de ba a d+hi pa ti mA nA ya/ sarba yak+Sha/ rak+Sha sa/ gan d+harbI/ ku~M b+haN+Da/ ma ho ra gA d+hi pa ti ma nA ya/ bi d+h+w+wan sa ya ba ra se n+ya~M/ ra~M ga ra~M ga ra~M gA pa ya/ /ra~M gA pa ya/ dzA la dzA la/

puSh+pa mA li ni/ run+d+ha run+d+ha/ ri ti ri t-i/ tsi ti tsi ti/ d+h+ri ti d+h+ri ti/ b+h+ri ku Ti/ mu kha pa ra se na gu lo ta sA d+ha ni ka ri/ ha la ha la/ hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu/ he he/ ri ni ri ni/ ri ni mi ti/ dza~M b+ha d+h+wa dze/ sarba bud d+ha a ba la ki te/

bdag 'jigs pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig /sarba ta thA ga ta a pa lo ki te swA hA/ gu nA rA dza pra b+ha sot+ta me swA hA/ sUr+ya arka bi ma le swA hA/ tsan dra arka bi ma le swA hA/ sarba gra ha na k+Sha tra

d+he mI ka ra Ne swA hA/ bdag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las srungs shig srung shig swA hA/ lha'i rgyal po rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba gzhan

gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'dis khyod g.yul sprod pa 'am/ 'thab pa 'am/ rtsod pa 'am/ 'gyed pa 'am/ gang du 'gro yang rung ste mi 'jigs shing thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo 'aM/
mgul du btags na mi'i rgyal po dang / skyes bu dpa' bo thams cad la bsrungs bar byed do/ /bud med kyi gzugs lta bur bsgyur nas mdun du 'dug te mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing bsrung bar byed/ dpal bskyed

par byed/ pha rol gyi sde spa gong bar byed/ bkra shis pa dang / gtsang ba dang / grags pa dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa kun du gnas par byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i dbang po

brgya byin dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa rgyal mtshan gyis rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i

gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ /

@/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hI marde n+d+ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sa'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis

thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du 'od bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sa la chen po lta bu'i gnas lha dang ldan pa na bzhugs te/ de nas bram ze sa'i dbang po shing

sa la chen po lta bu bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od ga la ga der song ste phyin nas/ bcoM ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od kyi zhabs la mgo bos
phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bram ze sa'i dbang po shing sa la chen po lta bus bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du 'od la

'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab lags na/ gang gis bdag skye ba dran par 'gyur/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub kyi sems brjid par mi 'gyur ba'i thabs de bcoM ldan 'das kyis bdag la legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du 'od

kyis bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de'i phyir bu khyod gal te de ltar smon na de'i phyir kun du 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di zung shig /chongs shig /lhogs

shig /kun chub par gyis shig /kun du 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ a mo da ni/ pra mo da ni/ bi mo da ni/ sa~M mo da ni/ pri yaM ka ra naM/ shrA ka ra Ni/ shrA ka ra Ni/ bo d+h-i ka ra Ni/ a nu d+ha ra s+yaM

saM myaka sa~M bud+d+ha ka ra Ni/ a nut+ta ra Ar+yA ka ra Ni/ a nut+ta ra pradz+nya ka ra Ni/ a nud+ta ra ba shI ka ra Ni/ a nut+ta ra sarba kle sho/ pa kle sha bi d+ha ra nI/ a ba d+yA na d+ha ka ra bi d+ha~M ni/ a nut+ta ra bid+yA a lo kod pa da ni/ a nut+ta ra shai k+Sha shi la

bid+yA tsa ra Na/ bi mug te gu Na ga Na/ sa~M b+ha d+ha ni/ a nut+ta ra sarba ku sha la mU lod+d+he ni/ a nut+ta ra b+ho na mU la ni/ a nut+ta rA ra ga to Sha mo ha na mU la ni/ a nu t+ta re shai k+Sha ma Na a bid+yA/ an+d+ha kA rA/ bi d+ha ma ni/ a nut+ta rA sI a pra te ha

ta ba la tsa kra/ a nut+ta rA sarba lA ra ba bi drA ma ni/ twa~M hi b+ha dre/ a nut+ta rA ba la b+ha dra/ su b+ha dra/ shrI b+ha dra/ a nut+ta ra b+ha dra/ sa man+ta b+ha dra/ a sa ma sa ma b+ha dra/ a nut+t+ya ra ma hA pu ru Sha b+ha dra/ a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha se bi tA/ a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha

a nu brta nI/ a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha d+harmA de shi kA/ a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha d+harma ko Sha sa~M b+ha d+hi kA/ a nut+tar ma hA pu ru Sha n-irbA Na/ a nuta pra tar shi kA/ twaM hi b+ha dre/ gang ga si ta bak+Shu/ samyaka saM bud+he a se bi ta/ b+ha bi tA/ ba hu

lI kro ta/ stu sto+o mi ta stau mi birna tA/ pra sha sta/ bu 'di ni kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po yin te/ de bas na bu khyod kyis kun du 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba na

yang yid la gyis shig /bu gang la la zhig kun du 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di m-ing dang / rigs dang / rigs kyi bye brag gang yid la byed dam/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khre'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ lha 'am/ lha mo

'am/ klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ dri za 'am/ dri za mo 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ lha ma yin mo 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ mi 'am ci mo 'am/ lto 'phyi chen po 'am/ lto 'phyi chen po mo 'am/ yi dgas sam/ yi dgas mo 'am/ sha za 'am/
sha za mo 'am/ grul bum 'am/ grul bum mo 'am/ lus srul po 'am/ lus srul po mo 'am/ kun du 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ lung 'bog gam/ ston tam/ 'chang na de tshe rabs

bdun gyis bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /de ji srid 'khor gyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par 'gyur ro/ /lhar gyur kyang rung / mir gyur kyang rung ste/ de mtshon cha 'am/
dug gam/ chu 'am/ mes bar ma dor 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du rgyal ba 'od srung gi r-igs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mtha' yas rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'chi med 'od chen
po rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od chen po rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshalo/ /
bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od chen rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mnyam ba med pa
rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mi mnyam pa dang mnyam ba rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drang srong chen po 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa bdun po de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhi ba'i dbyings su zhug pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la phyag

'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung pa la mngon par stod do/ /'phags

pa sa'i dbang po chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas

gtan la phab pa/ / @/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA daN+Da nA ma d+hA ra nI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa be con chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na tshe dang

ldan pa sgra gcan zin rgyal po'i khab kyi dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i gnas na bud shing chen po lta bu'i phyogs na 'dug go/ der 'di lta ste/ lha'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnaMs

dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnaMs dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang / mi'i gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang /

yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'-i gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / gzig rnams dang / bya rog rnams dang / 'ug pa rnams dang / grog bur rnaMs dang / sdig

sbrul rnams dang / gzhan yang mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin la shin du gtses so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin bya rgod phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la
ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcoM ldan 'das kyi zhab la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ngus te mchi ma blags so/ /de nas bcoM

ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin la bka' stsal pa/ sgra can zin khyod ci'i phyir nga'i mdun na 'dug nas mchi ma 'byin/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin

gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag rgyal po'i khab kyi dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i gnas na bud shing chen po lta bu'i phyogs na mchis mchis na/ der lha'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnaMs

dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / mi'i gdon rnams dang /
rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang / yi dgas kyi gdon rnaMs dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / gzig rnams dang / bya rog rnams
dang / 'ug pa rnams dang / grog sbur rnams dang / sdig sbrul rnams dang / gzhan yang mi dang / mi ma lags pa'i sems can rnams kyis bdag la shin du gtses lags mod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin la bka' bstsal pa/ sgra can zin khyod kyi be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags 'khor bzhi po dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma

rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba dang / yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba 'di zung shig /tad+ya thA/ a~M gA/ ba~M gA/ ta~M gA/ ta ra~M gA/ ta ra~M gA/ sa rA sa rA/ ta ra~M gA swa/ sa dad sa/ dza d+ha rA/

aka ra/ a rA bI rA/ ta rA bI rA/ ka ra bI rA/ karga ra bI rA/ tsu ru bI rA/ tsu ru tsu ru/ bI in dra/ in dra ki/ sa ra ha~M sa/ ha na sa ki sa ra/ mi tsi re lA/ ma hA mits+tsha ba hi ShI kA ka lid tsa ka /a~M ge dza ye/ dza ye li kA e lA/

cin ta/ li li/ ti le ti le/ su ma ti/ bu su ma ti/ tsu lu naT+Te/ tsu lu tsu lu naT+Te/ tsu la na Te/ ku na Ti/ ha rI Ta ki/ na rI Ta ki/ ta gau r-i/ gan+d+hA ri/ d+hA ra Ne/ d+hA ra Ne/ uSh+Ta/ pi pI li ka uSh+Ta/ pa pI la ke/ ka ra kaR+thi ke/ kA ke li/ tsa la

naT+Ti/ ka gi ma li/ la ma ti rak+Sha ma ti/ bA la ku li/ ba ta sa le/ u na mi le/ ta ra bI re/ ta ra ta ra bI re/ ku ru bI re/ ku ru ku ru bI re/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ bI re/ ma hA bI re/ i ra ma ti/ ba ra ma ti/ rak+Sha ma ti/ sarba ar+tha sA

d+ha ni/ pa ra ma su ra sA d+ha ni/ a pra ti ha te/ rgyal po dbang po dang / rgyal po zla ba'i dang / rgyal po gshin rje dang / rgyal po rlung lha dang / rgyal po gzi can dang / rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang / rgyal po be con dang / rgyal po be con med

dang / rgyal po tshangs pa stong ldan dang / sangs rgyas bcoM ldan 'das chos kyi rje/ chos kyi rgyal po/ 'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba bla na med pas bdag la bsrung du gsol/ yongs su bskyab pa dang /

yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / dug gzhil ba dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing

ba mdzad du gsol/ tad+ya thA/ i la mi li ta sa lA/ i ra ma ti/ bi ra ma ti/ tsa la ma ti/ phu ru ma te/ phu ru phu ru/ phu ru phu ru/ pa ra khu ru ru/ khu ru ma ti/ b+hU mi maN De/ ka li ke/ tsaN Da li/ a ki sa rA li/ a yA sA sa la ma to hu

le s+thu le/ sha le dza ya s+thu le/ tsa la nA Ti/ tsa la nA Ti/ nA ga nan d+hA ra NI/ go ra hi Ni/ go le/ ti te/ ar+n+d+ha ra/ paN+Ta re/ ke y+'u re/ ki tu ma ti/ b+hU ta~M ga me/ b+hU ta ba te/ d+har+ye ma hA ba le/ a tsun de/ a tsu~M run de/ d+ha ran d+ha ra/ dza ya li kA/ dza le go

ro ha ni tsa ra hU ru hu ru/ ru~M d+hu ru~M d+hu hu ru/ d+hu ma ti/ d+ha ra na d+ha re d+ha re/ bi shwa ma ti/ na shwa na/ ma ta d+ha ni/ mo tsa ni/ bi mo tsa ni/ sa d+ha ni/ sho d+ha ni/ bi shod+ha ni/ sa~M gi ra ni/ ma~M thI ra Ni/ a ts+tshid ta ni/ sa d+hu ta ra ma Ni/ ha ra ha ra/ ban d+hu ma ti/ hi r-i

hi r-i/ gi li ri le/ hu ru hu ru/ bing ga le swA hA/ sangs rgyas bcoM ldan 'das rnaMs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgra can zin be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags rgya rtsa bcu pa 'di skud pa la mdud de/ lag pa la btags

sam/ mgul du btags na kun nas dpag tshad bcu khor yug tu be con rnams dang / me tog rnaMs dang / phyag rgya rnaMs kyis de srung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /de la mi dang mi ma yin pa rnaMs kyis mi tshug par 'gyur ro/ /

mtshon dang / dug dang / nad dang / rims nad dang / rims drag po dang / rig sngags dang / ro langs dang / khro gtug dang / me dang chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags dang / gsang sngags sbyor ba rnaMs
legs par sbyor ba thams cad kyis ma grub pa rnams kyang grub par byed pa'o/ /grub pa rnaMs chud mi za bar byed pa'o/ /pha rol gyi 'ching ba'o/ /pha rol gyi sbyor ba cings pa las grol bar byed pa'o/ /
nad dang / mya ngan dang / bgegs rnam par 'jig par byed pa'o/ /'thab pa'i rnyog pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/ /gdon thams cad zlog par byed pa'o/ /gdon gang gis gtong ba de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog
pa bzhin mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gems so/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje yang rdo rje 'bar ba/ kun tu 'bar ba/ kun du rab tu 'bar ba/ me lce gcig tu gyur pas de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa
bzhin du tshal pa bdun du mgems so/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi yang lcags kyi 'khor lo spu gri so lta bu'i mtshon gyis phung bar byed do/ /gnod sbyin gyi 'jig rten de nas shi 'phos nas lcang lo can gyis

pho brang 'khor du gnas pa mi 'thob bo/ /sgra can zin rgyal po dang / mi rgod dang / me dang / chu dang / mtshon cha dang / 'brog dang / dgon pa dang / ri dang / mya ngam du song ba gang gis be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags 'di
lan gcig brjod na/ sdig pa thams cad las rab tu thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sgra can zin be con chen po'i gzungs sngags 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung dgu bcu tsa gcig gis bye ma snyed kyis

gsungs pa/ gsung ba/ gsung bar 'gyur ba mchog tu grub pa/ gzhan gyi mi thub pa/ lha dang / klu dang / dri za la sogs pas bstod pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba ste/ bdag dang sems can thaMs

cad gnod pa thaMd las bde bar gyur cig /nad med pa dang / 'jigs pa med par gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs

pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa be con chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen pa'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad

gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ / @/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su mu khan nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phag+sa pa sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thaMd la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus gcig na/ bac+doMs byang chub kyi shing drung na byang chub kyi snying po'i mchod rten chen po na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan

pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la sogs pa nyan thos chen po thaMd dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub seMda'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' seMda' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' seMda' chen po rdo rje'i

rgyal mtshan dang / byu~Mb seMda' seMda' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub seMda' seMda' chen po byaMms pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub seMda' seMda' chen po rnams dang yang thabs cig go/ de nas byang chub seMda' seMda' chen po

lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcoM ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcoM pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnams grangs bshad du gsol/

gang gi seMn rnaMs la snang ba bgyi bar 'gyur ba dang / phyir rgol ba dang dgra thaMd kyis gnod pa mi bgyi bar bsrung ba dang / bskyab par 'gyur ba dang / 'di lta ste/ lha'i dbang po rnaMs dang / klu'i dbang po rnam dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnaMs dang /

srin po'i dbang po rnaMs dang / 'byung po'i dbang po rnam kyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa dang / mtshon dang / dug dang / byad kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ba dang / phar mchi 'am/ slar mchi 'am/ nyal lam/ gnyid kyi log gaMm/

smyos sam/ rab tu smyos kyang rung thaMd du yang skyob par 'gyur ba de dag gis don du de lta bu'i gsang sngags bzhi rnaMs bshad du gsol/ ji ltar bdag rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rim gro 'tshal ba dang / rtag tu bsrung ba dang /

yongs su skyob par 'tshal ba dang / de bzhin du seMn thaMd kyi don dang / byang chub seMda'i theg pa pa'i rig kyi bu 'aM/ rig kyi bu mo de dag 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / nad dang / dus ma lags pa'i 'guM pa las bsrung ba

dang / yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seMda' chen po lag na rdo rjes gsol ba btab pa thugs su chud nas/ de la

'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje khyod seMn thaMd kyi don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa legs so legs so/ /de'i phyir lag na rdo rje khyod leg par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / sgo bzang po

zhes bya ba'i chos kyis rnaMs grangs bshad par bya'o/ /u gu mu gu ba li ni/ ban d+ha ni/ ba la tsa ma na/ ba hu ba hu ba hu li brta ya swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags gzhi rnams bka' stsal to/ /

de bzhin gshegs pas kyang gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ badzri badzri badzri badzri d+ha ri/ badzra pA ni/ badzri d+ha te/ tsakra badzri/ tsakra d+ha ri/ pa Tu d+hi d+hi ri/ b+hi ri/ mu ri ts-i ri/ a hu ru/ b+ha ga b+hi b+hi ri/ shi ri tra shi ri/ ru ru tse ru ru tse

tsa ri tsa ri/ da ri tsa le/ tsu ri mu ri paN Da re/ sdig pa thaMd 'jig par byed pa/ nad thaMd rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba 'gog pa nas rmi lam ngan pa'i bar du 'gog par byed pa/ tad+ya thA/ ban d+hi da/ ga ga ra Ni/ murda ni/

pra murda ni/ nA sha ni pra nA sha ni/ nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa ni rmi laM ngan pa'i bar du 'gog par byed pa/ 'di lta ste/ nA sha ni/ ban d+ha ni ban d+ha ni/ ts+tshin da ni ts+tshin da ni/ tsi re mi re/ ma he ha da ni/ ba ni ba re/ kha re be re/ bi ri bi ri/ bo d+hi bo d+h-i/

su sha ni/ sha ra ni/ ba ru ba ri ni/ ba ra hU~M ye/ brah+me tsA ri ni/ in dra ba ti/ d+hi d+hi ra ya ni/ na mo ma hi shwa ra ya Ni/ ri shi/ b+hany+dza ni pA pa dza ha ni/ kA la pa ti n-i/ b+hu ta ba da ni/ sa t+ya ga the/ so ma bA di/ so ma pra b+he swA hA/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/

tad+ya thA/ ha ra ha ra ha ra hA Ni swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ i Ti ta ga Ti ta ba di da/ a yi na/ a ri bany+dza ni ka karda ni/ pu tra da da hA ni/ marga a b+ha ro ha ni/ hu sa ba ti/ mu pa ba di/ hi le hi li/ ya thA pa dzu ya/ ya thA a ga ni ya thA ba ra na

tsa/ ya thA na ya/ ya thA badzra na/ ya thA hrI da ya swA hA/ lag na rdo rje 'di ni sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i bzungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis thugs rjes sems can rnaMs kyi don du bshad do/ /ji ltar sngon gyi
de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa dang / bden pa'i thugs dam gyis rnam par gzhag bzhin du nga yang 'chad do/ /de nas bcoM

ldan 'das kyis skyes bu chen po'i smin mtshams kyi/ mdzod spu nas 'od zer byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'od zer gyi sna ba byung ngo / /'od zer gyi sna ba des bskul bas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing

de nas chas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byon nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i

chos kyi rnams grangs gzungs sngags gzhi rnams snang bar byed pa/ mchog tu dga' bar byed pa/ dran par byed pa/ bshad pa legs so legs so/ /bdag cag gis kyang byin gyi brlab bo/ /legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /

rig kyi bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs sngags gzhi 'di dag 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rig kyi bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mo da'i yon tan gyi phan yon nyi shur shes par bya ste/ nyi shu gang zhe na/
'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ba dang / ngan song du 'gyur ba'i las kyi bsgrib pa thams cad med par 'gyur ba

dang / tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang / ring du 'tsho zhing grags pa dang ldan pa dang / longs spyod dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang / gzi rjid dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu nad med pa dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa

dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thaMd dgyes shing thugs su chud par 'gyur ba dang / lha thaMd kyi bsams par 'gyur ba dang / dge bar spyod par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i don la rab tu brtson pa dang / snang bar byed par 'gyur ba dang /

mchog tu dga' ba dang / dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsung pa'i gnas kyi gzungs sngags gzhi rnams gsungs shing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /de nas byang chub

sems dpa' seMda' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rig kyi bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzung sngags

gzhi rnams bshad par bgyi'o/ /su zhig sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyis rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa de rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /

tha tad+ya thA/ shi khi shi khi shi khi shi ka /tsi tsi tsi tsi/ b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha/ ru ru ru ru/ dzi dzi dzi dzi/ gra gra gra gra/ hri hri hri hri/ ha ha ha ha/ ma ma ma ma/ ha na ha na me/ sarba pra t+ye r+thi kA/ da ha da ha me/ sarba sha tra ba/ pa tsa pa tsa me/ sarba a hi te Shi na swA hA/ de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis byang chub seMda' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dngos grub dam pa'i gzung sngags gzhi rnaMs smras pa

legs so legs so/ /byang chub seMda' lag na rdo rje gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnaM grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa de'i spu'i khung bu rnaMs

su mdangs thaMd stsal bar bgyi bar bshad par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li tsi li swA hA/ brah+ma swA re swA hA/ brah+ma a ba su garbe/ a kal pe/ pu sha sa~M sta re swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gang na~M par lung

nas klog pa'i rig kyi bu 'am/ reg kyi bu mo de bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi rnaMs lagaso/ /de nas bcoM ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

btsun pa bcoM ldan 'das bdag gi kyang gang gis tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di dag 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'aM/ rigs kyi bu mos bsung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi

gzung sngags gzhi rnaMs bshad par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ bo d+hi tsid te ba ra N-i/ da mA ra Na Ti/ dit+ti dit+ti/ gau ri/ gan d+ha ri/ sar ma tan ta/ badzra tu la ne/ dz+wA la mA li n-i/ tsakra bA ka /sha ba re/ sha ba re/ sha ma re/ sha ma re/ swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po

rnaM thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad

ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnaMs grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing nang par langs nas klog pa'i rig kyi bu 'am/

rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe su puSh+pe/ sho d+ha ni/ saM sho d+ha ni/ d+hu ma pa ri ha re/ Ar+ya pra sha ste/ shAn te/ nir mug te/ mi

ga l+ye/ hi ran Na gar+b+he sta re ta pa de nas 'byung po'i ma mo 'phrog mas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sgo bzang po'i chos kyi rnams grangs tshe skyong ba'i rigs

sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa dang / yid la bgyid pa'i rig gyi bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs kyis gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/

pi li sib si li si li/ ma hA bi pi li/ si me li si/ gu ru Ne/ gu ru gu Ne/ ma hA ku ru Ne phu swA hA/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom

ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing / nang par lang nas klog pa'i rig kyi bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mo de

la bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ aT+Te phu/ baT+Te phu/ naT+Te phu/ ku naT+Te phu/ ma naT+Ta phu/ muN Ta ta Ta ke phu/ shri phu/ b+haM ge phu/ maM ke phu swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes

'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la

bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyang ba dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug gzhil bar bgyi'o/ /mtshams bcad par bgyi'o/ /

tad+ya thA/ he badzre/ he badzre/ hI hA/ bi si bi si/ ma hA bi si phu swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu dbang phyug chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang

po zhes bgyi ba'i choskyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rig ky-is bu'am/ rig kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /

tad+ya thA/ hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu lu/ sarba b+hU ta pra ti sho d+ha naM ka ro mi swA hA/ de nas sde dpon gzhon nus bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gtsang ma 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang /

yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ba'i slad du gsungs sngags gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ tu ru tu ru/ tu ru tu ru/ sarba b+hU ta pra ti She de naM ka ro mi swA
hA/ de nas lha'i bu zla 'od kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi kyang gang sgo bzang

po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grang gtsang ma 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rig kyi bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ aM ge/ baM ge/ tsaM ge hi ni/ Di D-i/ di di/

tsi tsi phu swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po

zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grang tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rig kyi bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang yongasu skyang bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ha te bi ha t+ya/ rI kA pra t+yA/

mi tra shud d+he/ muka ke bi muka ki/ bi ma le/ nirma le pra b+ha swA re/ pra b+ha ka re phu swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan

'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rig kyi bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ dz+wa le

dz+wa le/ ma hA dz+wa le dz+wa le/ dz+wa le n-i/ uka ke/ muka ke/ sha me/ pra sha me/ ma hA pra sha me/ sha me sa ma d+he/ ma hA sa mA d+he/ sa mA ba d+he/ dz+wa le/ ma hA dz+wa le/ dz+wa le ba ma phu swA hA/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon kha ba can gyi bcom

ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig

sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rig kyi bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ u dum ba re/ u dum ba re/ dum be re pra dum be/ byA brde/ A na g+he/ sa mA

d+he/ ma ha sa ma d+he/ nI le nI le/ nI la ke she/ ke shi ni/ ku le ku le/ ma hA ku le/ nI la ku le/ sid d+hi/ sid d+hi/ ma no ha ro/ aT+Te/ baT+Te/ naT+Te/ ku naT+Te/ sa ma the/ ba ba la ku tse/ dAn te/ nI la ka she/ ku le nI la/ d+han te dzA gu le/

hu she/ mU she/ ba li/ ku she/ ha la ku she/ pha la mu tse swA hA/ de nas gnod sbyin kyi sde dpon chen po bde ba'i ri gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun

pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar

bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nir ma le/ maM ga le/ hi ra n+ya gar+b+he/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ ka ma sh+tsi ni yu bi ra dze/ ku Ta ku Ta/ ka mA le brah+ma/ brah+ma swa re/ bra sid d+he/ sid d+ha ma no ra the phu swA hA/ de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyis bcom

ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di

'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /

tad+ya thA/ badzre/ badzre/ ma hA badzre/ badzra da ni/ bud d+ha badzra/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te badzre/ su bud d+he/ ni bud d+he/ ba hu bud d+he/ bi shiSh+Ta bud d+he/ shud d+he/ bud d+he/ bud d+he/ nI shaM grA ma ni/ tsaM ge le/ a la se/ te li me/ ti le/ ti li le/ marge/ shAn+ta/

ta/ shAn ta/ gA mI ni phu swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs

tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi le badzre/ hi hi badzre/ he he badzra/ ya ba ki ri ki ri badzra swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ aN

Da re paN Da re sh+ya te/ pad Da ra ba si ni/ kin na re/ ka rA de/ ke yU re/ i hA bud d+he/ ta twa bud d+he/ b+hU dze b+hU dze/ b+hU dze ga me/ b+hU dza pA pa te/ b+ha ye b+ha ye/ b+ha ya a gra ba te/ bi nI bi nI/ shi ri pa the/ shi ba pa the/ A di t+t+ya pra tho/ te dze te dza ba to/

ba to/ A kA sha pa the phu swA hA/ de nas rdo rje pho nya mos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po

zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ku Te ku Te/ ku Ti ni/ ku Ta ku Ta re swA hA/ nI li nI le/

nI la ke she swA hA/ pI te pI te/ pI ta ke she swA hA/ lo hi te lo hi te/ lo hi ta ke she swA hA/ a ba dA hA+e/ a ba dA de/ a ba dA ta ke ni swA hA/ many+dzi Sh+Thi many+dzi Sh+Thi/ many+dzi Sh+Thi ke she swA hA/ tsa kre tsa kre/ badzra tsa kre swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag

g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te bzhin bzangs dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlab kyis lha dang / 'jig rten skyong ba

khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / bsrung ba'i phyir gzungs sngags gzhi 'di dag legs par brjod pa legs so legs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka'

stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis

brlabs par 'gyur/ lha'i dbang po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po thams cad kyis bsams par gyur ro/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i

'jig rten yi rang te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar kyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba
ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab ba/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+harma sA ga ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes

bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bA rA na sI na drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags na dge slong lnga brgya

tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis

'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong dag ngas ni chos zab mo mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ cha phra ba/ brtags pa/ mkhas shing shes pas rig par bya ba rtogs so/ /ngas ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /

skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / lha dang / mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/ /ngas thog pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir nges pa kho nar

bsgrub par bya'o/ /dge slong dag chos kyi rgya mtsho'i gzungs shes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ blo gros kyi blo dang ldan pa/ rtogs pa'i

blo dang ldan pa/ brtan pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyi blo dang ldan pa/ gsung gi mchog dang ldan pa/ spobs pa mchog dang ldan pa/ mkhyen cing gzigs pa dag gis bstan cing bshad pa yod de/ gang dag de shes pa dang / gang dag

de 'dzin pa de dag gis ni myur ba kho nar chos lnga thob par 'gyur ro/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa 'dzin pa'i dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / brjed ngas pa med pa'i dran pa dang ldan zhing chos bzung ba rnams chud

za bar mi 'gyur ba'i blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rnon po thob pa'i rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / yi ge dang don dang tshig la 'jug pa'i spobs pa thog pa med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyi

rgyu'i lam mngon par shes nas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba ste/ chos lnga po 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzhag go/ da ltar nga yang

'jog go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos thams cad kyi sdoms kyi gzhi bzhi bsdu ba khyod la bstan par bya ste/ des na khyod kyis ma thos pa'i chos rnams thos par

'gyur ro/ /thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /gzung ba'i chos rnams ni nyams su len par 'gyur ro/ /nyams su blangs pa'i chos rnams ni gzhan dag la khong du chud par byed do/ /tshig gi rab tu dbye ba lnga ni 'di lta

ste/ 'du byed kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / de bzhin du ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / bla na med pa'i tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / sa nas sa brtags pa'i yi ge'i tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / nges pa'i

tshig dang brda sna tshogs kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba'o/ /de la 'di dag ni gzi byin rten par byed pa'i tshig rig sngags dang ldan pa ste/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul

bum dang / yi dgas dang / sha za 'dzam bu'i gling du lhags pa thams cad kyis gang zag de la zas kyi sna grangs rnams dang / sman rnams sbyin par 'gyuro/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig chos las byung ba gzhan dag la mi

gnod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis mnos pa/ bstan pa yongs su 'dzin pa ni 'di dag yin te/ kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag nyon cig /khyod

phyis 'gyod ta re/ s+yAd ya the dan/ karma ke ta ma nud tse/ ra te ru ta gran dra ma/ thu ma na/ nai la ta/ a saM ku la s+thA/ bu mi a nu sma ri/ i shaM ga ma i sha s+thA/ kle na a nu ga te/ yA mu la gum b+he/ pa b+he ma gur ba ya ba/ a s+ya ba kya

s+ya bi laM ga /be la ma tha/ shrI ba ba rI pany+tsa ka /pra sa te/ a ba be la/ a gra be la/ ni shi lu khu tse dzu me/ u dze dzu me/ kun dga' bo 'di dag ni/ gnod sbyin kyi dbab pa grub dang / gnod sbyin gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung mthong ba la bsnyen bkur yang byed byed/ rim gro byed byed pa rnams 'ching ba ste/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gnod sbyin dbab pa grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa rnams

zung shig /kun dga' bo gang la la gsang sngags kyi tshig skyon med pa'i tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / kun chub par byed pa de la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi sems bzhin du gnas so/ /kun dga' bo gsang sngags

kyi tshig 'di dag gzung bas ni dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo shar kyi lus 'phags gyi gling na ni gnod sbyin srid pa snang byed ces bya ba gnas so/ /kun dga' bo nub

kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling na ni gnod sbyin cher spyod ces bya ba gnas so/ /kun dga' bo byang gi sgra mi snyan kyi gling na ni gnod sbyin rnam grang zhes bya ba gnas so/ /kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling na ni gnod sbyin grag thob ces

bya ba gnas te/ kun dga' bo gnod sbyin de dag gis kyang rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gzhan gzi brjid za ba gang yin pa de dag kyang dad pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /dad pa thob par gyur nas kyang dad pa mi phyed

par thob par bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar byed do/ /kun dga' bo de la 'di dag ni shes bzhin gyi tshig drang srong gis stan pa dag yin te/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong gi mchog gi tshig mchog

srog chags 'byung po tham cad la rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i tshig rnam zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /kun dga' bo de la nga'i phyir na 'brang ba'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa de dag gis kyang bar chad byed mi nus so/ /s+yAd ya the

dan/ dan d+ha ra ma hA ha ra ha ra ma ba ra na/ ru da dra tra/ ku ma ti dri tra/ in dra man tu ke/ a ba te/ sa ha rA/ sa d+hu ma ti/ i la la ba ma ti/ a ba ti/ ta ra pa ra/ yi biSh+Tha sa da biSh+Tha/ a ba tiSh+Tha/ pa ra birta/ i sha brda/ sa da brta/ kra ma kra ma ti

ran/ a si ba tsa ma la bi na ha thi/ Tha sha su re/ d+hu ra d+hu ra/ uka gra muka kru/ uka gra ba ti/ bi sa ra gra ma ti/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / grul bum dang /

yi dgas dang / srul po dang / klu dang / dri za dang / sha za gnas pa gang yang rung ba de dag gis khyim gyi nang na gnas pa dang / lam du zhugs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs tshig 'di dag thos nas dga' bar 'gyuro/ /

kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zung shig /phyis 'gyod ta re/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gnod sbyin grub pa 'di dag ni/ /gling bzhi dag na gtso zhes bya/ /

gsang sngags 'di dag su 'chang ba/ /de yi dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yi/ /gnod sbyin de dag lhags nas ni/ /chos rgyal rnams kyis bstan pa dag /nyams par gyur pa de la ston/ /

dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po yang / /mthar gyis su ni song nas kyang / /zab cing don dang ldan pa yi/ /tshig 'di dag ni mnyan par bya/ /'di dag chos kun rtsa ba ste/ /de dag mkhas rnams nyan par gyis/ /drag po dag gis thos na yang / /
phyi nas mchog tu dga' ba ste/ /gang la bde dang sdugs bsngal med/ /de la de ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /sa 'di chags pa med pa ste/ /sangs rgyas sa ni bsam mi khyab/ /chags pa med par bstan pa yi/ /bsam yas

sa de thob gyur nas/ /nyi ma sprin las byung ba ltar/ /de nas sa steng de bzhin snang / /'di la skye mched phung po rnams/ /dben dang byang chub yan lag dbang / /dge ba'i chos ni zab mo rnams/ /sangs rgyas gsung pa ci yang yod/ /

de yi thos pa'i tshogs rnams gang / /nams kyang chud zar mi 'gyur te/ /ma thos chos rnams de dag thos/ /nyes dang nyes min rnams la mkhas/ /rtog par khong du chud pa'i mchog /mig bzad rnams kyang dag par 'gyur/ /

'chang ba dang ni ston byed pa/ /de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas bsngags/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams la/ /the tshom mi mnga' bden pa gang / /bden des bdag la lung mnos pa/ /ci yod thams cad gnas gyur cig /sangs rgyas

rnams ni 'byung rnams la/ /byams pas gnas pa'i bden pa des/ /rang gi sems dang gzhan sems la/ /ston pa rab tu gnas gyur cig /gling bzhi'i gnas kyis gnod sbyin dag /ma dad pa dang dad pa bstan/ /gang la rtog pa mi

snang ba/ /de la de kun don ston 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin skar gdong gang yin dang / /glang chen sna dang khyad par stobs/ /drag po dga' byed gsod byed dang / /zla ba mgo med lug gsod pa/ /dpa' sde dang ni lag dpa' dang / /srin po dang ni

sa 'dzin pa/ /ljang gu kha dang rna bzang dang / /ral gri'i spu can bong bu rnams/ /thams cad grub par byed par shog /gsang sngags 'di dag su 'dzin la/ /gnod sbyin srin po de dag ni/ /spro bar gyur nas 'dzud par byed/ /rtag tu de ni

spobs pa dang / /tshig rnams dang ni lung bstan dang / /nges pa'i tshig dang chos kun dang / /yi ge rnams la mkhas par 'gyur/ /lung mnos pa yang chud mi za/ /rtogs pa mtha' yas 'phel bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu don dang yi ge la/ /

de yi shes pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang / /mi mjed bdag po tshang pa yang / /de yi legs bshad nyan pa rnams/ /de yi mod la dran par byed/ /s+yad ya the dan/ tu ku na/ mu ku na/ ha ra Na/ bi ha ra Na/ i sha saM

kra ma Na/ o su mu kha/ ta ka Na/ a ga Na a pri ya/ u s+tha me/ ko ba ha re/ u ru pa/ pra ba Na tan/ saM pra me ba ha dza ga re/ pra shi ga re/ gu D+ha ba ne/ ut+Ta na/ bi gu Na/ i sha ku na/ a tu la tu la/ a Ti ba Ti/ ba ri tsa mo sha /ha ra/ dza ga ta/ e ba saM

pra mu khe/ a ga ba re/ Tha hu sa hu/ i ti ya/ thA hu/ tsa tur dwI bi ka yan/ Tha hu ma hu u ka gra hu/ d+hA ra sa hu/ si gra ha/ a bi na gra ha/ a bi na gra ha/ pradz+nya br-id d+ha ye/ Tha hu sa hu/ ka ra ku ru/ d+ha sa hu/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /gsang sngag

kyi ni tshig 'di dag /gang gis lag dang lus la yod/ /de ni thos la rmongs pa med/ /de ni shes rab med mi 'gyur/ /skar mda' ji bzhin nyi ma bzhin/ /zla ba ji ltar snang ba bzhin/ /de ltar thos dang don gyis kyang / /mya ngan 'das pa'i

bar la reg /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gsang sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /s+yAd ya the dan/ tsa ra D+he/ bi tsa ra D+he/ a maM ku te/ a ti mi ti/ pa ra ha re/ g+ha Na b+he/ hi ba ra me/ ma hA pra ti bA hA ne/ dza ya dza ya/ a nu ke/ pa la

pa le/ u ka gra ba ti/ swa ra swa ra/ a bi sa re/ gu gun de/ pra bi ba bar+d+he/ sa ma/ a dzi ta dza ye/ nu pa le su kho ma su san d+hi ni ku ma no/ /sak+She/ tsA pi tsA pe/ tsu pe/ tsu lu tsu lu/ pu lu pu lu/ bya ba pra sa re/ ka ra b+hin d+he/ bi dzA bi dze/ a pa ti

san d+hi/ nA nA nu ma ti/ pra na nu ma ti/ a ri da si/ dzeSh+Tha nu pa ni de/ a saM gra a ba ti/ rig sngag sdus pa'i gsang sngag kyi tshig 'di dag lus la thog te 'chang na/ gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum

dang / yi dag dang sha za gnas pa de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing / dbang du ma gyur pa rnam kyang dbang du 'gyuro/ /don thams cad kyang de bzhin gsheg pa gnang ba bzhin du 'tsho ba'i mthar thug gi 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ med par mi

'gyur ro/ /de la cho ga ni 'di yin te/ dgon par 'dug la gzung sngags 'di dag thams cad zhag bdun gyi bar du brjod de/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du dran par bya'o/ /de nas zhag bdun lon pa'i 'og tu bsam pa

thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi

rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang / pradz+nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he

ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ gA thA dwI ya d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa phyag 'tshal lo/ /

sangs rgyas dang ni chos la brnyas pa dang / /le lo dang ni cung zad chog par 'dzin/ /'dod chag dang ni nga rgyal spyod pa dang / /'gyod pa dang ni ma nges spyod pa rnams/ /sems can rnams kyi sgrib par gyur pa ste/ /de yi gnyen por theg pa

mchog bstan pa/ /de yi bar du gcod pa de dag gi/ nyes pa thams cad rab tu spong bar 'gyur/ /tad+ya thA/ o badzraM pra kA ra/ badzra pra ka ra badzra tsakra/ daMSh+TA b+ha yA na ke/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nir me la/ tsu lu ka /tsu lu tsu lu/ sarba bud d+he swA hA/
tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs la ni/ /tshig gam don gyi sgo nas gang sbyor ba/ /sems can dam pa blo dang ldan pa des/ /phan yon rnam pa bcu dag thob par 'gyur/ /khams rnams mtha' dag brtas par

'gyur ba dang / /'chi ba'i tshe na mchog dga' dam pa 'thob/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skye ba dang / /thams cad du ni tshe rab dran par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ba dang / /de bzhin de dag las ni theg mchog

thos/ /mos par 'gyur ba blo dang bcas pa dang / /sgo gnyis dang ni byang chub myur du 'thob/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya Sha Ta mu kha nA ma d+hA ra
NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams gnas gtsang ma'i

steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu rnam par phyed bar spras pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems

dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rig kyi bu dag khyed kyis 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di zung shig /de ni 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i skye gnas gzhan dag tu/

bdag gis sdug bsngal gang ci myong ba de sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du mi shes pa'i mtshan nyid du ma gyur cig /bdag gis 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba gang ci myong ba de sems can
thams cad dang thun mong du yongs su spyod par gyur cig /bdag gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las gang ci byas pa de so sor bshags pa bla na med pas so sor ma bshags par ma gyur cig /bdag gis bdud kyi

las gang ci byas pa de yongs su shes pas bla na med pas yongasu mi shes par ma gyur cig /bdag gi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa yang rung gang

ci yod pa de thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bur gyur cig /bdag gi rnam par grol ba gang ci yod pa des sems can thams cad rnam par thar bar gyur cig /'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la bdag

gnas par ma gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ \u0f00 k+Sha me k+Sha me/ k+ShAn te k+ShAn te/ da me da me/ dAn te dAn te/ b+ha dre b+ha dre su b+ha dre su b+ha dre/ tsan dre tsan dre/ su tsan dre su tsan dre/ tsan dra ki ra Ni/ tsan dra ba ti/ te dzo ba ti/ ya sho ba ti/ d+harmA ba ti/ bram ba ti/ sarba kle sha bi

sho d+hA ni/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ sarba ar+tha pra sha ma ni/ pa ra mar+tha sA d+ha ni/ kA ya bi sho d+ha ni/ bAka bi sho d+ha ni/ ma naHsaM sho d+ha ni swA hA/ rig kyi bu dag de ltar na rig kyi bu dang rig kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sgo drug pa zhes

bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum bklags na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang nas skye ba bdun gyi bar du de skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs

par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / di zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de yi te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya Sha Da k+Sha ri bid+yA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yi ge drug ma'i rig sngags/ sangs rgyas

dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo/ /'di skad bdag gi thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/

kun dga' bo yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bshad pa/ yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal

mo 'di kun dga' bo khyod kyis zung shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /tad+ya thA/ dan+ti le/ kan+ti le/ daN+Da mi ti/ ma d+hu ma ti/ ma ra Na Di/ ko ra Na De/ drA bi ba ti/ ko shA ri/ tsha Ta dze/ du du ma n-i/ ke tu

ma te/ tsu du n+d+ha ke'u ta dan te/ ta hu ra re/ e na ni ge/ hu ta ba hu ni/ kun dga' bo 'di ni yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags te/ glad pa na ba dang / mig na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / sna na ba dang / lce na ba dang /

snying na ba dang / lto na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / byin pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yag lag dang / nyin lag na ba dang / zas ma zhu ba dang / sbos pa dang / mngal du thogs pa dang / rlung

las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / rims drag po dang / nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / rims

yud tsam pa dang / nyin mo'i rims dang / mtshan mo'i rims kyi btab pa las ye ge drug pa'i rig sngags 'di bsrungs ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde

legasu 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / chus gtor ba dang / srad bus bcing ba bcas pa las gang zhig 'gal bar byed na/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal

pa bdun du mi 'gas pa ni kun dga' bo ngas lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i

'jig rten na ma mthong ngo / /tad+ya thA/ aN DA re/ paN DA re/ ka re te/ ke yu re/ b+hU taM ga me/ b+hu ta gra he/ b+hu ta pra k+Shi te/ b+hu ta ya smra ra ya ni bri yA ba ni te dza ba ti ya sha ba ti gi r-i ni ni/ bdag 'jig pa thams cad dang / gnod

pa thams cad las bde legasu gyur cig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/

bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa yi ge drug pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags rdzogas+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya kAn ka pa ti nA ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gser

can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lhas ma lta bu na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po

lag na rdo rje dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song te phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag g.yul ngor mchis te g.yul 'gyed pa na lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang rig sngags rnams
dang / gsang sngags dang / sman dag gis pham par gyur pa mkhyen lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rjes su gzung ba dang / bdag cag la thugs brtse ba dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi sgyu dang rigs
sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman rab tu gzhom pa dang / rab tu gzhig pa'i slad du rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i gsang sngags chen po legs par stan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang

po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no/ /lha ma yin dang g.yul sprad pa na rig sngags rnams dang / gsang sngags rnams dang sman rnams kyi pham pa de de bzhin te/ /kau shi ka

snying brtse ba'i phyir da 'dir rig sngags brjod par bya ste/ sgyu thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rig sngags thams cad zlog pa/ gsang sngags thams cad rengs par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mtshang 'bru

ba dang 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa thaMd rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ gsang sngags dang / sman thaMd gcod pa'i rig sngags bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rig sngags chen po gser can bka'

stsal pa/ gang bskal pa grang med pa gsum du gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa dang / kun du rgyu ba dang gcer bu pa rnams kyis ngan du bsams shing bar chad du byas pa las/ ngas de tshun chad sgyu dang ldan pa rnams

kyis rig sngags thams cad bzlog nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par byas te gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun du rgyu dang / gcer bu pa dang / 'tshe ba rnams kyi sgyu dang / rigs sngags dang / gsang
sngags dang sman dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i rig pa chen mo de ngas bshad par byas/ kau shi ka khyod kyis sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir gsang sngags chen po rnam par

rgyal ba chen po zung shig /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de'i tshe rig sngags chen po gser can 'di

dag bka' stsal to/ /tad+ya thA/ \u0f00 hi n-i hi ni/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ hi li mi li/ ni hi ni hi/ ni hi ra pi ni/ kA nyA nA pa ni/ lo kA mA te b+hu te b+hu ku ta man tra/ a d+hi kre te/ be de be de be ta man tra/ a d+hi kri te/

ha na ha na/ ha sa ha sa/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha/ b+ha ga ba te/ dza ye bi dza ye/ dzam b+ha ni/ stam b+ha ni/ ban d+ha ni mo ha ni/ a mo g+ha shag ti d+hA ra NI/ gri Na gri Na/ kA Da ma mA na si/ dzam b+ha ya dzam b+ha ya/ b+hany+tsa ya

b+hany+tsa ya/ stam b+ha ya stam b+ha ya/ ban d+ha ya ban d+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ lha'i sgyu dang / klu'i sgyu dang / gnod sbyin gyi sgyu dang / srin po'i sgyu dang / nam mkha'i lding gi sgyu dang / dri za'i sgyu dang / lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang /

mi 'am ci'i sgyu dang / lto 'phye chen po'i sgyu dang / rig sngags 'chang gi sgyu dang / rig sngags 'chang grub po'i rgyal po'i sgyu dang / drang srong gi sgyu dang / sems can rig sngags 'chang thaMd kyi sgyu dang / 'byung po'i sgyu dang sgyu thaMd ra la ra la/

rad dza rad dza/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+hu d+hu ma/ rA ba rA ba rA ba na tsakru na tan/ gru na tha ni ha na ha na/ sarba bi d+ha/ sha trUM nAM/ stam b+ha ya/ b+ha yun stam b+ha ya/ sUr+yAn stam b+ha ya/ so na ma stam b+ha ya/ ba ru NAn stam b+ha ya/ ag na ni stam b+ha ya/

ud da kan d+hi ti d+hi ti/ d+hA ra NI bA sha ha ste/ beSh+Ta ya pA sha ne/ gang dag bdag la phyir rgol ba rnams dang / dgra rnams dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i seMs dang ldan pa rnams dang / 'thab pa dang / rab tu 'thab pa dang / mi phan

par 'dod pa thaMd/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hany+tsa ya b+hany+tsa ya/ dzaM b+ha ya dzaM b+ha ya/ stam b+ha ya stam b+ha ya/ b+han d+ha ya b+han d+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ ma hA mo hA ni/ b+ha ga ba ti swA hA/ bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod

pa dang / nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig /phaT swA hA/ kau shi ka rig kyi bu 'am/ rig gyis bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po gang la la zhig /gser can gyi rig sngags 'di rjesu dran

par byed na de la pha rol gyi 'jig pa mi 'byung ngo / /de'i sde la pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi mi tshugs so/ /lhas ma yin klus ma yin/ gnod sbyin gyis ma yin/ srin pos ma yin/ dri zas ma yin/ lha ma yin kyis
ma yin/ nam mkha' lding gis ma yin/ mkha' 'gro mas ma yin/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman rnams kyis
pha rol kyi dmag tshog kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ lus la me dang / chu dang dug dang / rig sngags dang gsang sngags dang sman rnams kyis mi tshugaso/ /gang gi

sdig pa byas pa dang / byed du bcug pa dang / rjesu yi rang ba de nyid slar 'bab par 'gyur/ de nyid du slar 'gro bar 'gyur/ koM shi ka de lta bas na dad pa'i dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge dge bsnyen ma 'am/

rig kyi bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mos rig sngags 'di chu la lan bdun bzlas te bdag gi lus la blugs na bdag gi lus bsrungs bar 'gyuro/ /'jig pa thaMd dang / gnod pa thaMd dang / yams kyi nad dang / nad 'go ba thad dang / rig sngags thaMd

dang / gsang sngags dang / sman thaMd las byad thaMd las shin du 'da' bar 'dod pa gser can kyi rig sngags 'di dran par bya'o/ /rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs bzhom pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gdul bar 'dod pas

gser can gyi rig sngags 'di dran bar bya'o/ /lan bdun bzlas te mdud pa bdun bor ba'i srad bu bdags par bya ba 'am/ chu la lan bdun bzlas pas bdag bsrung bar bya'o/ /'jig pa thaMd la thog pa med pa'i gzungs yi ger bris te bcang

bar bya/ mgul du gdags par bya'o/ /yi ger bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te g.yul du zhugs na dge ba dang bde bar thar bar 'gyuro/ /rig sngags 'd-i'i stobs kyis nang mi dang / g.yog 'khor dang / sde dang dang bcas te dge

ba dang bde bar rgal bar 'gyuro/ /ma grub pa rnams kyang grub par 'gyuro/ /rig sngags reng par byed par 'dod pas srad pu dkar po la lan bdun bzlas te/ mdud pa bdun bor na bcings pa dang rengs par byas par 'gyur ro/ /

rgyu rengs par byed par 'dod pas dur khrod kyi sa la lan bdun bzlas te gtor na sgyu reng par byas par 'gyur ro/ /'gyed pa'i tshe kha lkugs par byed par 'dod pa'i zin thig le la lan bdun bzlas te 'chos na smra ba thams cad kyi lan

thebs par 'gyuro/ /klag par bya/ kha ton du bya/ brjod par bya ste/ brjod pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuro/ /gang gis byas par gyur pa dang / gang gis bsams par gyur pa de nyid la slar 'gro'o/ /srad bu btags

sam/ chus bdag bsrung ba byas na de'i lus la rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman thams cad kyis mi tshugaso/ /ma grub pa rnams grub par 'gyuro/ /de'i don thams cad kyang 'thun par 'gyur ro/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogas+ho// //rgya gar gyi
mkhan po 'dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ ka ru Na a gra nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshalo/ /phyag na pad ma bsnam pa/ sems can sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshang tshing du nub

pa rnams yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir blo gros shar ba la phyag 'tshalo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang sngags kyi mchog snying rje chen po'i rtse mo 'char ba/ thogs pa med pa'i don yod pa'i las kyi dngos grub de bzhin gshegs

pa'i zhal nas byung ba/ sems can kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa'i las kyi sgrib pa dang / ngan song gis sdug bsngal rnams pa sna tshogs zhi bar byed pa/ byed pa ma yin pa dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang /

ltas ngan pa thams cad dang / nad rnam pa du ma dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ stong chen po rab tu 'joms par byed pa bshad par ste/ thog mar bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi
tshogs du ma bye ba phrag 'bum gyis brgyan pa'i sku mnga' ba la phyag 'tshal nas brtsam par bya'o/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bai ro tsa nA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ a ra ha te samyag saM bud
