snying rjes khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya che ba/ /rab dga' rab dgyes rab tu ston pa po/ /skal pa bzang po rnam thar zhi ba'i mchog /shin tu rnam dag yon tan chen po'i bdag /rnam dag du mar grag
pa'i me tog thod/ /rab mchog srid gsum dag gi mig gcig pa/ /mchog sbyin 'gro ba kun gyi 'byor pa mdzes/ /dpag med pas kyang dpag med bskal par 'byung / /skyabs dang yid 'phrog
dag cing gsal bar mdzad/ /nor bu'i thod can rdo rje las byung ba/ /srid gsum gcig pa dpa' bo pad ma'i spyan/ /thos pa'i rgya mtsho sems can kun bas dpa'/ /'gro ba thams cad
rnam par grol mdzad mchog /snyan cha mgul zhing pad ma dag pa bsnams/ /dbang phyug bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i thor tshugs can/ /tshul bzang yon tan rgyan du 'tsham pa'i gzugs/ /
'jig pa'i rlung chen 'tshab pa'i mtshon cha can/ /dge ba'i rgyu ste dam pa stsol ba'i rgyu/ /tshul gyis long spyod bde chen mchog gi rgyu/ /dkyil 'khor mchog gi spyod yul rgyu gcig pa/ /srid gsuM
sgrol ba'i zam pa gcig pu lags/ /dkyil 'khor mchog gi rgyan te sdig med pa/ /gser mdog 'od rgyan rten du gyur pa ste/ /mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam mtshungs par 'gyur/ /sa brnyes
'od zer rgyas pa rgyan phreng mnga'/ /chen po'i che ba thog ma med pa ste/ /snga ma mun pa bsal zhing nyon mong med/ /dge bas dag pa spyod yul rnam par dag /tshul gyis dkyil
'khor yang shing rnam par dag /srid gsum dbang phyug pad ma las byung ba/ /srid gsum bde can yangs pa'i dbang phyug ste/ /dbang phyug mi g.yo rnal 'byor mkhas pa po/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa chen po rab mchog yangs/ /nor bu'i rgyan gyi rdo rje rgyan du thogs/ /pad mas brgyan pa lhun po las byung ba/ /dge snod yon tan chen po'i snod gcig pa/ /bde la longs spyod rnam 'dren chen po'i
bdag /smon lam rgya chen rgya mtsho ldan pa ste/ /'gro ba srid par lhung ba grol mdzad pa/ /sa dang mnyam pa thams cad gzigs par mdzad/ /skal bzang bskal pa stong gi snang ba po/ /rdo rje mchog gis
bsgegs pa'i dkyil 'khor can/ /yon tan rnam grags khyab par dkyil 'khor ba/ /dge ba'i mtshan nyid dpa' bo'i rtsal mnga' ba/ /de bzhin nyid chos ro mkhyen spyod yul can/ /cod pan thig
le dmar po'i dkyil 'khor ldan/ /lha chen brgya mnga' sum bcu gsum bdag dbang / /lha dang lha min dbang byas rnams kyis btud/ /brtson 'grus brgya dang ldan zhing rtsal stong mnga'/ /bsod
nams brgya mnga' mtshon cha brgya 'chang ba/ /pad ma brgya pa pad ma nyid las byung / /dkyil 'khor brgya yi dbus na mdzes pa ste/ /chos brgya ldan pa mchog stong ston pa po/ /sangs rgyas
stong phrag mang pos yong bstod pa/ /bskal pa rab 'byam mang por mkhas pa te/ /dkyil 'khor mang po dag na dpa' ba'i sku/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i mthu mnga' ston pa po/ /rgya chen dri
med dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs/ /rab dga' bsgyings pa 'thor mdzad me tog thod/ /na bza' dar dkar la mnabs 'od mdzad pa/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thugs rjes brgyan pa las/ /
cha phrar gse mdzad mtha' yas zad mi shes/ /dpa' bo nyi ma'i 'od zer brgya mnga' ba/ /nor bu'i dkyil 'khor zla 'dra 'od gsal zhing / /nyi mas kha phye pad ma mchog bsnams pa/ /me tog
mtshon cha thog pa'i lha zhes grags/ /gtsug pud gsum pa tshangs sras skye dgu'i bdag /btsun rigs mchog ste rigs chen nang du skyes/ /rang gi rigs gsol dbang chen dkyil 'khor ba/ /pad ma
bzang ba'i rigs mchog thig les mtshan/ /spyan bzang dge ba'i lha rnams rten gyur pa/ /gsang sngags mang po 'dzin pa'i dbang phyug po/ /tshogs chen bdun na 'dus pa'i mnga' bdag lags/ /spyan
gsum dag gis dkyil 'khor mdzes gyur pa/ /ka la ping ka'i skad kyis sdang ba 'dul/ /mda' dang ru gzhu stobs chen mtshon cha bsnams/ /stobs kyi lha ste stobs dang brtson pas 'dul/ /rgyan rnams
sna tshogs legs par spras pa ste/ /rgyal ba rig sngags 'chang ba mang pos bstod/ /tshogs mchod dag byed rnams gyis rab bstod pa/ /chu srin 'dzin khri'i 'jigs las rab grol mdzad/ /gzugs
mang mnga' zhing bde skyid rab sbyin pa/ /lha yul 'gro ba'i khyad par dkyil 'khor can/ /mtshungs med pas kyang mtshungs med mthu rtsal mnga'/ /stabs gshegs yon tan che mchog 'od zer ldan/ /
'jig rten nang na mkhas pa spyan ras gzigs/ /sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor dbus kyi dkyil 'khor can/ /'od zer mang po stong phrag zad mi shes/ /nyon mongs rdul rnams thams cad sel mdzad pa/ /
mtha' dang bral ba kun du gzigs pa ste/ /rab zhi kun las 'phags pa'i spyod yul can/ /don dang tshul la sems can gcig dpa' ba/ /theg pa bzang po 'dzin pa'i nyi ma lags/ /
dul dang sbyin dang tshul la dad pa brnyes/ /skye dgu rnams kyi dri ma ma lus bcom/ /blo gros bzang po rab dgyes ston pa po/ /bde ldan gos brgyan yang ba sna tshogs can/ /bcom ldan 'byung ba'i 'jig
pa med par mdzad/ /rtag tu dge ba kun mchog sbyin pa po/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i rnam thar brnyes pa'i blo/ /bde ba longs spyod cher 'gyur dri ma med/ /zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing dri med pa/ /
mi dang sred med brgya byin lag pa'i mchog /'jig rten mang po gzigs pa'i dbang phyug po/ /stobs dang rigs dang mthu stobs che ba lags/ /sangs rgyas mtshungs shing chos mchog rin chen
mtshungs/ /dge 'dun mtshungs shing chags bral thub par dka'/ /khyad par gsum 'phags r-in chen mchog chen mtshungs/ /khyab bdag nyon mongs rnam gsum rdul bsol ba/ /rdo rje sems
mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad ma dri med phyag gi dbus bsnams pa/ /thor tshugs can la gzugs ldan cod pan thogs/ /spyi bo 'od dpag med rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal/ /de nas bcom ldan

rang byung mun sel ba/ /rnga chen sgra ltar brtan pas bka' rtsal pa/ /mchog chen rdo rje glu la bstod pa yin/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad skyon sel legs pa mang / /ji ste la la rtag tu dge mchog 'dod/ /spyan ras gzig
dbang la ni bstod byed pa/ /des ni ring por mi thogs yon tan gyi/ /longs spyod mchog chen chos ni thob par 'gyur/ /mi n-i gang zhig rtag tu 'dis bstod la/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang dam pa sbyin par
byed/ /sdig pa rnams kyang de la 'byung mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa gang yin bde blag de yis 'thob/ /de ni sdig pa'i dri mas mi gos te/ /lam srang bzang por dmigs te 'gro bar 'gyur/ /
srid gsum skyabs 'os gcig pu pad ma skyes/ /de 'drar chos kyi mchog la spyod par 'gyur/ /de ltar ming gi khyad par grub 'dod cing / /gang zhig rtag tu bde ba 'dod pa yis/ /
'gro kun skye dgu'i bdag po spyan ras gzigs/ /pad ma las byung rtag tu bstod par gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das bla ma 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ / Ar+ya mai tri nA ma aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ / 'phags pa byams pa'i
mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshalo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams

pas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na ma s+t+rai yang d+hi ka nA~M/ sarba ta thA ga ta nA~M/ tad ya thA/ \u0f00 sa ra sa ra/ su ru su ru/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA d+ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ma ha tsa ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma ha b+ha ra/ kam+pa kam+pa/
ma hA kam+pa/ hUM ma hA s+pha ra Na d+harma a gra sA ga ra swA hA/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye ma gzungs chen mo 'di ni yon tan che ba te mtha' yas
par khyab pa/ bskal pa bye ba phrag mang por yang shin du thos par dka' ba/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad ston pa/ de bzhin gshigs pa grangs med pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
snyed kyis bsnyen bkur mdzad mdzad pa/ sgrib pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad las thar bar byed pa/ sems can gyi khams mtha'

yas mu med pa yongs su thar bar byed pa te shin du dkon pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa/ nor bu'i cod pan gyis bsgyings pa/ rgyan phreng rab tu g.yo ba rnams
kyis spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog 'phags pa byams pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ dpa' bo chen po thabs brnyes pa/ /rgyal tshab mi yi bdag po ste/ /
'jig rten bdag po rnam par gsal/ /dar ba chen po mngon par rgyas/ /tshan chen stobs ldan che ba ste/ /de bzhin yangs shing rdul dang bral/ /dbang chen rtse ldan 'od ldan pa/ /sa yi dbang phyug rnam
par gnon/ /rgyal chen mtshon cha brgya pa ste/ /mtshon cha chen po rdo rje'i mtshon/ /yon tan 'od brgyas bsgyings pa ste/ /nor bu'i rna cha'i rgyan thogs pa/ /srid gsum dag na dpa' ba'i sku/ /
rgya mtsho lta bu'i spyod yul can/ /lhun po zla 'byin ti si yi/ /rtse nas dkyil 'khor 'char ba po/ /dkyil 'khor chen po longs spyod pa/ /rab tu dga' ba de bzhin des/ /yongs su dga' ldan chen
po'i lha/ /che ba lha rnams kun gyi mchog /sangs rgyas gdung rgyud rgyas mdzad cing / /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rgyan dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas longs spyod longs par spyod/ /sangs rgyas
bstan pa ston pa po/ /ti se zla 'byin bzhin du yangs/ /sa yi dbang phyug bde mdzad pa/ /pad ma 'dab stong rtse mo can/ /rdo rje'i pad ma legs par skyes/ /chos kyi longs spyod longs
par spyod/ /sa dang mnyam pa thub par dka'/ /snang bar byed pa 'byung ba po/ /srid gsum ye shes nyi ma lags/ /gtso bo chen po cher grags pa/ /seng ge chen po stobs po che/ /
cha lugs chen po zhal che ba/ /skye bo ngan dang sdug bsngal 'dul/ /rdo rje byi ru bai dur+ya/ /nor bu'i dbu thod rgyan du thogs/ /byi ru gser gyi gcal bkram la/ /sku chen zhabs kyi stabs kyis
gshegs/ /zhal mdangs nyi ma du ma'i gzi/ /lcang lo cod pan dbu thod can/ /rig sngags 'chang brgyas zhabs la btud/ /rjed par bya ba rnams kyis mchod/ /nor bu brgya 'gul
'od zer gyis/ /brang gi phyogs rnams dag par byas/ /cod pan can te 'od 'tsher ba/ /nyi ma bye ba brgya 'od ldan/ /rin chen sna tshogs mchog bkram zhing / /dri med dkyil 'khor rab tu
'phro/ /rlung gis ma lus bskyod pa yi/ /'bar ba chen po'i lta ba can/ /'od zer mang pos phog pa yi/ /phan pa'i thabs ni rab ston pa/ /brjid pa'i tshul gyis bzhad pa yi/ /'od kyis
zhal gsal rnga yab bskyod/ /dpung rgyan 'od zer spel mar bkod/ /tshon bris shin du mdzes par 'char/ /lhun po phrad cing 'khrugs pa ltar/ /ha ha zhes pa'i sgra chen sgrogs/ /rdo rje chen
po rtsed mo can/ /shin du dga' mdzad bde sbyin pa/ /byams pa'i dkyil 'khor go char bgos/ /brtson pa kun las rnam par rgyal/ /snying rje'i stobs las byung ba ste/ /mtshon cha chen po shin du
'bar/ /byams pa byams pa'i rtog pa can/ /kun nas sba ba'i dkyil 'khor ba/ /ma pham thub med dag pa ste/ /sangs rgyas cha lugs mnyam med che/ /byams pa'i snying po snying po che/ /byams

pa'i pad ma las byung ba/ /rdo rje 'chang chen rdo rje can/ /rdo rje'i bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor ba/ /rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi btud/ /de bzhin bsnyen cing bstod pa po/ /grub pa chen po rig sngags grub/ /
rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par mdzad/ /thams cad grub mdzad grub pa po/ /sangs rgyas gdung gi sdong chen lags/ /gsang sngags chen po'i rnam par nges/ /mdo sde'i bkod
pa mdo sdud pa/ /nges gyur nges pa'i 'od sgron gyi/ /snang bas dri ma sel bar mdzad/ /'bar ba rtsa dmar 'od snang ba/ /dkyil 'khor dkar po che ba ste/ /gzhung dang 'thun pa'i chos dbying
dang / /nye bar gyur cing shin du nges/ /swA hA swA hA'i bdag po mchog /'od zer bde legs bde legs mdzad/ /stobs chen 'chang ba bkra shis pa/ /nyi ma 'dra ste snyoms pa lags/ /
bstod byed rgyal ba'i longs spyod ldan/ /mkha' ltar dri med spyod yul can/ /dpa' bo rdo rjes 'joms par mdzad/ /rdo rje chen po rab bsgrub pa/ /bsgrub pa po ste rtsod pa med/ /dkyil
'khor ldan pa rdo rjes ston/ /rlung chen shugs kyis bsgyod pa yi/ /g.yo dang 'brug sgrogs sgra ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul pad ma te/ /de bzhin nyid kyi mtsho las skyes/ /
mngon shes chen po mngon shes brnyes/ /khyab bdag sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /de nas sa yi dbang phyug po/ /byams pa'i dkyil 'khor byams pa la/ /bstod nas kun mkhyen
gnod bral ba/ /thub pa nyi mas bka' stsal pa/ /kye ma ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog /ming gi yon tan 'od ldan pa/ /bde dang phun sum tshogs bsgrub pa/ /thabs chen bla
na med pa ste/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni/ /'jig rten kun gyi bde skyed pa/ /'di ni bton pa tsam gyis kyang / /sdig pa thams cad dag par 'gyur/ /sdig pa dag las rgyal ba yi/ /
byams pa bstod pa'i gnas pa la/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'dis/ /mi ni la la gang bstod pa/ /de la lha la sogs kun dang / /lag na rdo rje stobs chen rnams/ /rtag pa nyid tu sdug bsngal kun/ /

gtan du bsal phyir brtson par byed/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog /myur du 'don pa'i mi de ni/ /sangs rgyas sa yang thob 'gyur te/ /'di la the tshom yong med do/ /nang par mal nas langs nas ni/ /
gang zhig byams pa'i sems kyis bstod/ /de la byams pa rtogs pa'i/ /byams pa bde legs byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir dri ma thams cad sel byed cing / /sdig 'joms yon tan thams cad bskyed pa dang / /
de bzhin 'jig rten sdug bsngal sel ba y-i/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad ched tu dag par lhogs/ /'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// //@#/ / rgya gar

skad du/ Ar+ya kha gar+b+ha aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po

zhal ras rgya che zhing spyan gy-i 'od 'phro bas nam mkha'i dkyil/ /dri zhim par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha'i spyod yul can sa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM swa sti

ka mA la k+Shi bi bu la sam b+ha ba/ d+harmA d+hA tu go tsa ra swA hA/ /gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu ngan song dang ngan 'gro thams cad ni rab tu zhi bar gyur/ sa yang g.yos par gyur/ rnga bo che dag gi sgra yang grag par gyur/

sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa/ /kye 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams nam mkha'i snying po'i

snying po dkyil 'khor mngon sum pa rnams kyi swA hA'i gachog gi gzungs 'byung bar shin du dka' ba/ bsod nams chen po sdig pa dang nyon mong pa thams cad sreg pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ma/ rin po che'i phung por gyur pa 'di nyon

cig dang / 'di thos pas dri ma med par 'gyur zhing legs par khrus byas par 'gyur la shin du rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /pad ma lta bur 'gyur te/ 'khor ba'i 'dam gyis mi gos so/ /nyi ma lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams

cad snang bar byed do/ /zla ba lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad rab tu sim par byed do/ /nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur te/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi gos so/ /sa gzhi lta bur 'gyur te/ mtho dman med do/ /

lhun po lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus so/ /thar pa lta bur 'gyur te/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi gos so/ /de la sogs pa yon tan stong phrag bgrangs ba tshad med grangs med pa dag

thob par 'gyur te/ nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa tsam dang / bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis gang ci yang rung ste/ de'i 'dod pa dang / smon pa dang / re ba de dag 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod

byas pa tsam gyis kyang char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / sdang bas dkrugs pa dang / mi nad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / gnod pa 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa'i dus dang / 'chi ba dang / chom rkun dang / dgon pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang /

can zan dang / mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams las yongasu bsrungs bar byed la/ bde ba dang / 'byor pa dang / ci 'dod pa dang / ci la dga' ba thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis ha ha zhes ca co dang

ga zha bton te/ sgra ring zhes byas nas gos dang / rgyan sna tshogs bskyod de/ snying nas phyag 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dbang byed pa 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bsngags pa

rgya mtsho'i bstod pa yang dag par brjod pa/ nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum sems can mchog /'byor ldan blo gros rin chen rgya mtsho mnga'/ /sems can dag pa bla med rin chen mchog /thar pa'i sa bon 'khor

ba'i sdug bsngal sel/ /kun mkhyen tshul mkhyen legs dang legs min mkhyen/ /thar mkhyen chos mkhyen bde dang mi bde mkhyen/ /lam mkhyen gces mkhyen dge dang mi dge mkhyen/ /dus mkhyen dge mkhyen stobs dang
stobs min mkhyen/ /'gro mchog chos mchog sems can yon tan mchog /lam mchog sngags mchog tshul dang tshul min mchog /rgyan mchog chos mchog 'dzin dang 'dzin min mchog /dag mchog rtogs

mchog mchog dang mchog min mchog /zhi rab snying rje'i rab ste 'khor gyi rab/ /'od rab thar pa'i rab ste rten gyi rab/ /rgya rab sngags kyi rab ste thugs brtse'i rab/ /mnyam rab sems can rab ste gsum rig rab/ /leg

sgron mchog sgron stobs dang stobs min sgron/ /thar sgron rigs sgron rgyal dang rgyal min sgron/ /dge sgron gzi sgron nor bu'i 'od kyi sgron/ /rgyu skar zla ba'i brgyan las shar ba'i sgron/ /mchog 'od yon tan kun gyis

'od zer 'od/ /legs 'od thar pa'i pho brang rten gyi 'od/ /'od chen gti mug rab tu 'byed pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje'i 'od 'bar bde ba'i 'od 'chang ba/ /rdo rje'i dbang po 'dren dbang sems can dbang / /rin chen 'od kyi dkyil 'khor brgyan

dbang po/ /rgyal dbang rgyal ba'i stobs rgyun tshad med dbang / /dpa' bo rig sngags 'chang dbang srid gsum dbang / /rdo rje bzang po rdor 'od rdo rje 'bar/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan/ /rdo rje 'od can rdor 'dzin rdo rje drag /rdo rje

rgya chen rdo rje rab mchog dbang / /na bza' sngo zhing sku yi cha lugs sngo/ /sku mdog sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'od kyis brgyan/ /ral gyi rno 'dzes sngo zhing bstan pa bsnams/ /mkha' sngo gzhal med khang 'bar nang na bzhugs/ /lha zhal dri med shin du

mi bzad 'bar/ /rab tu drag la 'od zer 'phro zhing 'gyur/ /sdig sel rdul ltar 'khrug byed phreng mchog can/ /glog gi stobs kyis snang bas bsgegs la bstan/ /ral gri mtshon thogs dbang ldan mthu stobs mtshon/ /rdo rje'i cha tshon

thogs mda' dang mdung thung 'jigs/ /'khor lo'i mtshon thogs bcibs pa ri dang 'khrul/ /gsal shing mtshon thog bgegs kyi stobs 'joms pa/ /bde 'byung 'jig rten gsum bdag rdo rje'i dbyug /sku rnams thams cad nyi ma

'i 'od kyis brgyan/ /grag pa'i rigasu byung bas rgyal po mdzad/ /mu tig phreng bas bsgeg cing mdzes par bgyis/ /sku mdzes brnyes shing phun sum tshog pa brnyes/ /rab 'byam mchog brnyes sa la 'jug pa brnyes/ /mthu stob lhag pa

brnyes shing grub brnyes la/ /rig pa gsum gyi stobs brnyes mthu brnyes pa/ /bde 'dren zhi ba 'dren cing 'od 'dren pa/ /cha lug gsal mchog dar ba chen po 'dren/ /byam 'dren nyi ma 'dren cing skye dgu 'dren/ /leg 'dren zhing gi stob 'dren snying

rje can/ /dri med cha lug gsal ba cha lug 'bar/ /rnam grag bsgeg pas grag pa'i ba dan can/ /'gro ba'i skabs bya byed 'jug dang ldog pa mkhyen/ /long spyod gsal bar ston pa'i sems kyis 'jug /sku dmar sku mthon sku mdzes

sku bzang ba/ /sku ser sku dkar dar ba chen po'i sku/ /sku rol rdo rje'i sku mnga' spyan legs sku/ /rig sku rig sngags 'chang ba rin chen bsnams/ /gtsug gi nor bu gtsug can cod pan mchog /cod pan can te chos 'dzin rdo rje mchog /

dpal 'dzin rin chen dam pa 'chang ba'i mchog /sngags gzhi phyag rgya 'chang ba phun sum tshogs/ /rab mdzes mkha' la gshegs shing rab tu rgyu/ /srid gsum nyi ma gcig pu 'od stong mnga'/ /ri rtse 'char ba bdal legs bkra shis pa/ /

yon tan mthu stobs khyad par rnam par grag /nor bu chen po nor sdug nor bu'i 'od/ /nyi ma'i nor bu tshul spyod nor bu 'bar/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'gro kun mgon gcig pu/ /nam mkha'i dkyil na nor bu gcig snang ba/ /sems can

rnam dag yang shing rnam par grag /srid gsum bsrungs ma gcig pu rgyal sras mchog /zhi ba rab tu zhi ba skyabs 'os rtag /skye dgu'i bdag po pad 'byung pad ma skyes/ /kun nas 'od bzang leg bshad chos mnga' ba/ /dar ba

legs bshad rab brtul legs bshad phyag /blo bzang 'od bzang bde ldan skye gnas bzang / /mkhas rab zhi rab mchog gi chos dang ldan/ /zhi mdzad rgyal 'byung bde ba 'byung ba'i gnas/ /'od kyi 'byung gnas bde mdzad dbang du

mdzad/ /legs 'byung shes rab 'byung gnas stobs bskyed pa/ /snying rje'i 'byung gnas blo bzang rnam grags mdzad/ /rnam grol nges grol shin du grol ba'i blo/ /blo yangs rnam par bkram zhing rnam par grag /kun du longs spyod sgo ste blo

yi mchog /blo gros brtan pa dkon mchog gsum las bsgrubs/ /sangs rgyas pad ma 'dab rgyas 'dra ba'i zhal/ /dag cing spyan yangs cha lugs yid tu 'thad/ /snying po gsal ba'i snying po brtan zhing dul/ /ngo bo nyid kyi rgyun brnyes rab

gsal ba/ /spyan zur mnga' ni rab du gtang legs pa/ /'jigs med zhal ras ston kyi zla ba 'dra/ /mdung thung brgya yi mtshon mchog mtshon cha rdzogs/ /drag po 'jigs pa sdig sel gsum las skyes/ /rab dul mkhas pa 'grog dga'

'dris par sla/ /rab tu drag pa gnyen rab gser mdog can/ /lha chen bde byed gsal shing phyag na bsnams/ /spyan gsum rig pa gsum ldan me gsum sel/ /'dod bzang me tog mtshon thogs me tog mnga'/ /na bza' bzang mnabs

g.yas 'phen tshabs cher 'phen/ /legs bris sna tshog mtshon cha sna tshogs mnga'/ /na bza' sna tshogs sna tshogs brgyan gyi dpal/ /zhal ras zla ba 'od zer rgyas pa 'dra/ /zhal mdangs bstan pas 'jig rten kun 'byor mdzad/ /bzhad pa nyi

ma'i 'od zer rab 'jebs mnga'/ /zhal mdangs rgya mtsho gsal mdzad lam me ba/ /dbang chen rdo rje'i thog lags 'jig pa'i sgra/ /rdo rje drag po nor bu g.yo ba 'dzin/ /sgra brnyan snang bar mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan/ /blo gros chen po blo

gros rno ba'i mchog /brgyan 'dzin dpal 'dzin rin chen zhal dang ldan/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba kun gyi gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mgon sras phreng ba bzang / /stobs chen 'jig rten blo gros ngo bo nyid/ /skye dgu'i bdag po bka'

lung mnyam zhing brtags/ /mi yi mnga' bdag mtho ris bskyed pa'i rgyu/ /sgyu 'dra 'dod pa'i mda' dang rdo rje can/ /mthu stobs mnga' zhing spyan bzang sdug par ltan/ /ston pa bzang po stong nyid lam gyi stegs/ /gces gsum 'phel ba'i rgyu la

'jug pa mdzad/ /brtan po rgyu la rab tu nges gyur pa/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa kun gyi slob dpon lags/ /gcig pu skye dgu'i dkyil 'khor cho ga mkhyen/ /rnam par snang mdzad zhing gi gnas nas skyes/ /dbang bskur brnyes shing sa

bcur legs par gnas/ /gnas chen son pa mchog gnas gcig pu lags/ /skye dgu rnams kyi nyon mongs sel ba dang / /sdig 'joms mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di thos nas/ /bde gshegs sras mchog su zhig 'don byed pa/ /

'jig rten zla ba gcig shar bzhin du snang / /nam mkha'i snying po sems can gcig pu yi/ /mdun 'dug nang par bstod pa 'di brjod gang / /de ni srid gsum sems can mchog 'gyur zhing / /dri ma'i gnas kun las kyang thar

bar 'gyur/ /g.yul dang 'thab rtsod shin tu mi bzad dang / /mu ge'i gnod pa mi nad byung ba na/ /mkhas pa su zhig sngar langs dad bskyed nas/ /nam mkha'i snying po la ni bstod byed pa/ /de ni 'jigs pa'i 'byung gnas

thams cad dang / /sdug bsngal 'byung 'dren sdig pa rnams las grol/ /de ni zhi mchog mchog bde kun gnas dang / /bde ba rgya chen nges par thob par 'gyur/ /bde 'thob long spyod 'phel bar bya ba 'am/ /rgyal srid 'thob

dang byed gzugs nor 'thob dang / /rig 'thob yon tan kun gyi gzhi bsgrub phyir/ /bton na 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med/ /de phyir ji ste rtag tu 'dod bde kun/ /'dod na 'gro ba kun la gcig dpa' ba/ /nam mkha'i snying po

srid gsum mgon po la/ /rtag tu brtan cing sngags kyang bsten par bgyi/ /'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya sa man+ta

b+ha du aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa kun du bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa kun

tu bzang po nam mkha'i dkyil kun du rab 'byam ma lus pa dang mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi snang ba gsal ba brnyes pa/ sa'i dkyil 'khor kun du 'phros pa'i sku tha dad pa med cing dus gsum gyi sku mnyam pa nyid

brnyes pa/ gzugs sna tshogs can byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog dang / rab mchog dam pa sbyin pa/ yon tan chen po'i skus kun dul mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog kun du bzang po gzugs sna tshogs can/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rab 'byam sa'i dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po snyoms par zhugs ma thag pa de'i tshe stong chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed ky-i sku rab 'byam kun du yongs su rgyas par gyur te/ nam mkha'i

khams kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sku rnams sa'i dkyil 'khor du ma dag tu kun nas 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam thams cad ky-i khongasu gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag

g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i mgo bo la byugs nas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legaso/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen mo shod cig /de nas byang

chub sems dpa' chen po'i mchog lus 'od zer 'bum gyis sna bar byas pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad g.yo bar byas nas gzungs 'di bshad do/ /tad+ya thA/ \u0f00 na mo na ma s+t+ri b+hu ba ne shwa re/ ma hA b+ho gA ya/ a sa

ma sa ma sa/ a mr-i ta sa ma/ A nan ta sa ma/ ga ga na sa ma/ tri b+hu ba na sa ma/ a she Sha sa ma/ be Sha sa ma/ pa ra ma ar+tha sa ma/ swA b+ha ba sa ma/ ta thA tA sa ma/ a ra dze sa ma/ shud d+hi sa ma/ bud d+hi sa ma/ d+harma ta thA tA sa ma sa

ma sa ma/ a b+hi sha ma sa ma/ sa ma sa ma/ e ga nA ya/ sA ga ra bi shud d+ha/ A lo ka hi hi la b+ha la b+ha/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ \u0f00 pra sa ga ta/ na ya na ya/ hi nir a d+hiSh+Tha na saM b+ho ga /aM a na la ya la ya/ d+ha rma a gra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ dza ya dza

ya/ hU~M hU~M/ d+ha ma d+ha ma swA hA/ de nas rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo 'jig rten thams cad kyi mgon po gcig pu sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du ltas

te/ sa'i dkyil 'khor g.yo bar byas nas de skad ces smras te/ 'jig rten gsum po kun du gang bar byas so/ /de nas lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas

gser gyi 'od zer 'bar zhing snang la rab tu g.yo bas brgyan pa'i lus can sa steng kun gyi rdo rje me tog thod stan chen po las bskyod de/ dkyil 'khor nas langs nas ha ha zhes sgra phyung ste smras pa/ kye ma snying rje chen po dang

yon tan grangs med pa'i rgya mtshor rab tu 'byam pa'i gzungs chen mo/ kye ma sangs rgyas 'byung ba chen mo/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sa gsum dang mnyam zhing sems can gyi khams grangs med pa yongasu smin par bya ba'i

phyir gnas pa/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa med pa'i gzungs chen mo/ /bskal pa mtha' yas pa nas 'phangs pa'i sdig pa'i bag chags sel cing nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skems la lta ba'i ri bo 'thor bar byed pa'i

gzungs chen mo bskal pa mtha' yas par dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs 'byung ba yang dag par ma bsags shing bde bar gshegs pa 'bum phrag du ma mngon sum du mthong bas byang chub kyi sa bon ma bsgrubs la/ thams cad

mkhyen pa'i sa'i khyad par gyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongasu rdzogs pa rjes su thob pa ma yin pa gzhan ni sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen mo 'di mnyan par yang mi nus na/ bzung ba 'am/ bklag pa

'am/ kun chub par bya ba lta ci smos/ gzungs chen mo 'di'i ming tsam yang bskal pa bye ba phrag stong gi bar du thos par dka'o/ /kye ma gzungs chen mo 'di ni sems can gang dag gi lag na 'dug pa de dag gi ni rnyed pa legs

par rnyed pa'o/ /'tsho ba bzang pos 'tsho ba'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi gzhi bzang po'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa'o/ /yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs

pa'o/ /'di lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar 'gyur/ lan gnyis brjod pa tsam sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gsum brjod pa tsam kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad las

grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na brjod pa tsam gyis gong nas gong du yon tan rnams thob par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'chag bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar

'gyur ro/ /shing gcig 'phreng gi drung du bzlas brjod byas na grub pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /'gro bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /nags 'tshal chen po'i nang du dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug

la lan bdun brjod na bsam tan chen po thob par 'gyur la nyon mongs pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa kun du bzang po'i sku gzugs kyi drung du skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug la me tog la sogs pa ji snyed pas mchod nas lus

ngal bar gyur gyi bar du gzungs chen mo 'di brjod la/ ngal bar gyur nas de nyid tu nyal na rmi lam tu byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po mthong bar 'gyur te/ phyag g.yas pas de la byugs nas yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de

chos kyi snang ba chen po yang stsol bar mdzad do/ /'di skad du rgyal ba'i sras legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa yin te/ khyod tshe brjes nas sa chen po thob par 'gyur ro zhes

kyang gsung ngo / /de nas lus bde ba dang / sems bde ba dang / dga' ba chen po dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po dang ldan bzhin du sad par 'gyur ro/ /mthu che ba dang / dbang che bar grags par yang 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyang de la

blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo / /nang par langs nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i mdo sde rnams baglag par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la yang phan pa dang bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas pha rol

du phyin pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs shing sdig pa thams cad dang bral te/ nyon mongs pa'i phyogs rnams bcom la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang bsngags par 'gyur ro/ /lha la sogs pa yang de la bsrung ba dang /

bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir brtson par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de ni ring po mi thogs par kun du bzang po'i sa chen po la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje gtsug phud la sog pa stong

gsum gyi bdag po rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams dang / spyan chen mo la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen mo rnams dang / rdo rje snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rdo rje zhag pa la sogs

pa rig sngags kyi lha chen po rnams dang / rin chen dra ba can la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha mo chen mo rnams dang / lha mo sgrol ma la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang / dar chen dang / gzugs bzang

dang / shin du blta na sdug pa la sogs pa gzhon nu rnams dang / gzhon nu ma rnams dang / bran rnams dang / bran mo rnams dang / mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa log 'dren chen po rnams dang / lus mchog la sogs pa srin po'i

dbang po rnams dang / ma mo la sogs pa srin mo rnams dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i dbang phyug rnams dang / rdo rje me tog thod la sogs pa dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa tham

cad langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog 'phags pa kun du bzang po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bla na med pa'i yon tan gyi snang ba zhes bya bas bstod pa/ kun du bzang po kun gyi mchog /sna tshogs

kun gyi 'byor pa che/ /dkyil 'khor chen po rdo rje mchog /sna tshogs gzugs can phyogs kyi bdag /rdo rje chen po dgyes pa che/ /gzi brjid chen po stobs po che/ /gnod dang rab gnon dpal gyi rab/ /khyab bdag rgyal ba'i blo gros

rgyal/ /rdo rje chen po rab tu bzhad/ /sgrub dka' chen po bsgrub mdzad pa/ /rol mo chen pos rnam par rol/ /rab dga' chen po 'dul ba po/ /lha chen dbang phyug chen po ste/ /brtsan po khyab 'jug skye dgu'i bdag /sa steng sa 'og

sa la dgyes/ /de bzhin sa 'dzin sa gsum pa/ /dul dang sbyin pa'i go rim thabs/ /rab mkhyen stong gi mnga' bdag lags/ /bshes gnyen can te bzod la dgyes/ /btson 'grus 'byung ba 'byor pa che/ /brtson 'grus

bcu dang thabs bcu pa/ /stobs bcu'i sras chen thu bo ste/ /mthu stobs stong gis spro ba dang / /yongs su ldan zhing bcu sel ba/ /rdul sel rgyal po chen po ste/ /rgyal po dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho pa/ /rdul rnams rab tu zhi ba'i

thabs/ /cho ga mkhyen pa blo mnga' ba/ /mkhas pa mdzes pa skal pa bzang / /shin du sdug pa dga' bskyed pa/ /snying po chen po las byung ba/ /nyon mongs bral ba thub par dka'/ /sa dang mnyam pa mkha' dang mnyam/ /rlung dang mtshungs pa'i

spyod yul can/ /gzi brjid nyid de gzi brjid mtshungs/ /rgya mtsho bzhi yi chu dang 'dra/ /rmugs dang smyo ba zhi bar mdzad/ /thub par dka' ba'i nyon mongs 'jil/ /g.yul sel g.yul la dgyes pa ste/ /g.yul gyi nyes pa rab 'joms pa/ /

gsung bzang ngang pa'i gdangs su bzhad/ /dbang po nye dbang dbang chen sras/ /dbang po las lhag thub dang mnyam/ /chos 'dzin 'byor dang ldan par bstan/ /rab dga' bu lon zhi mdzad pa/ /nyon mongs 'dam rdzab skems par mdzad/ /dba'

bo rgyags pa'i rims nad sel/ /khro bo'i dregs pa rnam par 'joms/ /gsung snyan 'jam pa nyid dang ldan/ /mnyam pa mi mnyam mnyam pa dang / /mnyam med g.yul las rnam par 'das/ /sangs rgyas kun dang spyod yul gcig /

byang chub snying por rgya cher rol/ /rim pa rab ston dge ba ste/ /spyan bzang phun sum tshogs pa dge/ gtsang ma lam bzang sbyin mdzad pa/ /dag mdzad bsreg sbyin mchog sbyin po/ /'joms byed bgeg rnams rnam par 'joms/ /

'thob mdzad dpe med gsung ba po/ /rdo rje'i 'jig rten gcig snang ba/ /skyes pa bud med tshogs kyi bdag /nges par yon tan 'byor mdzad pa/ /sems can 'khor ba zhi mdzad pa/ /brtan po sdig pa rnams dang bral/ /kun du rnam rgyal

snang ba po/ /kun du rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ /kun du rgya mtsho'i snang ba mdzad/ /kun du nyes pa sel ba lags/ /mi bzad sa 'og rnam par dkrugs/ /de bzhin zad mdzad thug par mdzad/ /nyon mongs rgya mtsho
rnam par dkrugs/ /nyon mongs phyogs rnams zad par mdzad/ /'bar ba'i dka' ba 'phro mdzad pa/ /rgyags shing bdo ba zhi bar mdzad/ /rdo rje chen po stobs bskyed pa/ /sdang ba thams cad nges par 'joms/ /

pha rol bzhugs pa sdig sel ba/ /dag pa nam mkha'i spyod yul can/ /dag pa sbyin zhing yon tan sbyin/ /'bras bu sbyin zhing kun sbyin pa/ /ye shes sbyin zhing bsod nams sbyin/ /longs spyod sbyin zhing rgyal sbyin pa/ /

dbang phyug sbyin zhing tshig sbyin la/ /nor sbyin tshogs ldan rdo rje can/ /gzugs sbyin dpa' bo rnam par rgyal/ /dag cing dge ba'i tshul sbyin pa/ /bde 'byung gtsug na nor bu thogs/ /sa 'dzin gzung bar dka' ba po/ /

dkyil 'khor mgu bar sgrub mdzad pa/ /'bab cing de bzhin 'bebs par mdzad/ /rin chen dra ba rin chen mnyam/ /sgron ma mun sel rgyal ba can/ /yon tan ye shes theg chen ldan/ /brtan mchog che ba'i chos nyid can/ /gsung

ba chen po shes rab che/ /sangs rgyal tshul ni rab ston pa/ /mchod pa chen po theg chen gyi/ /theg pa bla na med par ldan/ /mchod pa chen po'i chos shes pa/ /'bras bu chen po'i chos kyi mchog /ston mdzad 'dul mdzad ston pa po/ /

zhi ba de bzhin zhi mdzad pa/ /bzang po bzang dang mtshungs pa nyid/ /kun du rab 'byam sel mdzad pa/ /snying rje ye shes snying po mkhyen/ /snying rje'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/ /snying rje chen po yongasu rdzogs/ /dus chen rnam par

dag par mdzad/ /mtshon mchog dang ba rab mtho ba/ /rtsod chen 'das pa'i spyod yul can/ /skye dgu bsrung zhing spyan yangs pa/ /rnyed par dka' ba'i 'byor pa can/ /kun du spyod pa khong dge ba/ /dga' ba'i dam pa sbyin pa po/ /kun

du yul kun mnga' ba ste/ /zhe sa bzang po rtag tu mnga'/ /dul ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i pad ma lags/ /zla ba lta bur sim mdzad thabs/ /mkhas pa rgyags spangs cho ga mkhyen/ /
spyod yul gcig la gnas pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mnga'/ /dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen/ /slob dpon chen po grags pa che/ /dam pa nyid de bla na med/ /gsang sngags rlabs ni rgyas par
mdzad/ /de ltar khyab bdag chen po ni/ /yon tan brgya yi spos kyis rgyas/ /dag cing byang la mkhas la sogs/ /yon tan 'byung la rig sngags rgyal/ /gtsug na nor bu thogs la sogs/ /mchog rnams

kyis ni bstod nas kyang / /sdug bsngal chu bo bcom pa yi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs/ /kye ma bstod pa chen po brgya/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yin/ /mi rnams la la gang zhig gis/ /sdig bsal

kun du bzang po la/ /snying nas 'di yis bstod byas na/ /des ni sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don/ /mi de yon tan yongs rdzogs shing / /de bzhin gshegs tshul che ba yi/ /ye shes ma lus

smra bar nus/ /de ltar thub mchog sras po yon tan brgya yi spo las nges par byung gyur cig /yon tan sna tshogs 'byung dang 'jig rten yan chad dag gis yon tan rgyas rnams la/ /bstod pa chen pos snang byas rgyal

ba'-i sras la bstod pas nyin re bstod byas na/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba'i skur 'gyur snang ba thob cing rnam dag yon tan 'byung gnas 'gyur/ /'phags pa kun du bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang

bcas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badzra pA Ni aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po smras pa/ \u0f00 badzra tsaN Da sarba du Sh+TAn ta ka /ha na da ha/ pa tsa hU~M phaT/ de nas

gzungs sngags 'di bshad ma thag du sa chen po g.yos par gyur te/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang skrag nas nyam thag pa'i skad phyung ngo / /dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa thams cad kyang ha ha zhes 'dzer to/ /

lha las sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams kyi kyang rgyan gy-i char chen po phab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal 'dzum bzhin du rdo rje 'chang la gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ sdang ba sel ba 'khor 'di dag ha cang skrag

par ma byed cig /rdo rje 'chang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gzungs 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba lags so/ /rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog dang / bgegs thams cad bzlog pa dang / snang ba thams cad sel ba dang dam pa

stsol ba dang / 'byor pa stsol ba dang / sdang ba rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dang / thos na don mchis pa dang / brjod na don mchis pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis na don mchis pa dang / stobs skyed pa dang / gzugs bzang bar bgyid pa dang / spobs pa bskyed pa dang /

dbang phyug thob par bgyid pa dang / nor dang ldan par bgyid pa dang / dbang bgyid pa dang / sdang ba 'jom pa dang / sdang ba 'jig par bgyid pa dang / dug sel ba dang / rgyal bar bgyid pa dang / dga' bar bgyid pa dang / mchog tu dga' bar bgyid

pa dang / dang bar bgyid pa dang / nga rgyal 'joms pa dang / pha rol pham par bgyid pa dang / sdig pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / nongs pa bgyis pa sbyong ba dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang /

mtshams ma mchis pa bzlog pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / bkra mi shis pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / dpal bskyed pa dang / skal pa bzang por bgyid pa dang / sems can thams cad dga' bar bgyid

pa dang / gzhan la dbang bgyid pa dang / ci 'tshal ba stsol ba dang / yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang / char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus kyi gnod pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags

te/ g.yul chen po dang / mi nad chen po dang / rtsod pa chen po dang / mi ma lags pa la sogs pa 'jigs pa dang / sdang ba dang / byad stem dang / ro langs kyi sbyor ba chen po dang / skrod pa dang / srog 'jig pa'i tshe dang / 'jigs pa

chen po byung ba na nang par langs nas lus khrus bgyis la/ gos dkar po 'tshal te/ kha shar phyogasu bltas la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi gdong du lta zhing lan bdun brjod na/ brjod pa tsam gyis 'jig pa thaMd las

thar bar 'gyur zhing grub pa chen po yang thob par 'gyur la/ thams cad du yang rgyal bar 'gyur te/ sems can rnams la bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa ni gzungs chen mo 'di las lhag pa ma mchis so/ /de nas

'khor thams cad ngo mtshan du gyur nas rdo rje 'chang la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che/ /rdo rje 'jigs pa dgyes pa che/ /rdo rje snying po stobs po che/ /

rdo rje 'khrug pa zhags pa che/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par mdzad/ /rdo rje hUM gi hU~M lags te/ /rdo rje sa 'og 'jigs pa po/ /chags pa'i rdo rje chags pa che/ /chags pa'i zhags pa mgyogs pa che/ /phyag dmar phyag ni ring ba ste/ /

spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa lags/ /rdo rje mthon ka mthon ka che/ /mthon ting dbu skras brgyan pa lags/ /ral gri sngon po ral gri che/ /dkyil 'khor sngon po'i dkyil 'khor can/ /mthon ka'i spyan te dbu sngo ba/ /'od chen mthon ka'i

'od dang ldan/ /rdo rje sngon po stobs mi mtshungs/ /rdo rje spro ba'i stobs po che/ /khro bo'i rdo rje khro bo che/ /sel mdzad khro bo'i rgyags pa sel/ /khros pa'i spyan ni rab tu bstod/ /khro bo bgegs rigs sel bar mdzad/ /gzhu bsnams zhags

pa bsnam pa te/ /rdo rje'i mdas ni nges par 'gum/ /dbyig thogs rdo rje'-i ral gri bsnam/ /rdo rje'i zhags pas rab tu 'joms/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo 'khor lo che/ /'jig pa'i sgra sgrogs rab tu khro/ /sna tshogs sku te thig les bris/ /gzi

brjid bskyed pa grags mdzad pa/ /bzod par dka' ba reg mi bzod/ /sdig dang bgegs rnam gcod mdzad pa/ /drag po chen po rdo rje khro/ /skyel byed drag po skyel bar mdzad/ /gting dpag dka' ba ring du gshegs/ /rin chen rgya mtsho

rab tu dga'/ /rgya mtsho lhun po'i dpung dang ldan/ /pad ma ti se lhun po'i rtse/ /gad rgyang chen pos bzhad pa po/ /spyod yul bskal pa grangs med gsum/ /rig sngags 'chang mchog rdo rje can/ /rig sngags 'chang chen mnga' bdag lags/ /

na bza' lcang lo rtsa dmar gsol/ /mthon ka na bza' mthon la dgyes/ /srin po bsrung ba drag po ste/ /me tog phreng ba'i brgyan la dgyes/ /nyi ma chen po nyi ma'i 'od/ /'od zer brgya phrag rab tu 'gyed/ /grol mdzad mgon po ston

pa po/ /rab mchog rab mchog rnams kyis mchod/ /mgrin chen mgrin pa'i mdog sngo ba/ /mgur bzang zhal bzang dam pa lags/ /cod pan chen po rdo rje'i 'od/ /phun sum tshogs ldan sems dag pa/ /ye shes che ldan

bsrung ba che/ /rlung mar langs te spyod yul ring / /gtso bo sgrol mdzad pha rol gshegs/ /'jigs las grol ba rab 'jigs pa/ /rgyal chen gtsug na nor bu thogs/ /mtshon cha chen po sna tshogs mtshon/ /'jig rten gsuM

gyi tshul chen gcig /gsum gzigs rtse gsum gtsug pud gsum/ /'dod pa'i lha ste snang chen mtshan/ /za ba po ste 'jigs par mdzad/ /mtho ba sku mchog zhal gsum pa/ /tsham tshom med de srid las byung / /rtag pa skar

dgyes dus 'byor pa/ /rgyu skar rgyal rigs 'phel bar mdzad/ /rgyal po sngags 'chang chen po ste/ /bgegs kun dbang phyug mkhas pa lags/ /bai dUr+ya ltar dri med sku/ /mdzes shing stobs bskyed sna tshogs stobs/ /dga'

ba bskyed pa dga' ba mdzad/ /dkon mchog gsum po 'dzin pa'i mchog /lha chen dpa' bo chen po ste/ /brtan po dpa' bo lham me ba/ /bde ba chen po 'ching ba gcod/ /dam du 'ching ba'i rtsal mnga' ba/ /mtshon cha che tshogs cod

pan can/ /rig sngags 'chang ba'i tshogs dga' ba/ /pad ma chen po'i phyag ring ba/ /pad ma las byung pad ma'i mchog /nag po chen po 'byung po che/ /gtum chen thog thog chen po te/ /rlung chen bzhad mo 'byung ba dang / /rdo rje'i mtshon cha

brgya rdzogs pa/ /rdul phod thub dka' brtson pa ste/ /'byung po chen po'i tshogs kyi rje/ /zhi ba dbang po rdo rje'i mtshon/ /grag gi rtse mo rnam par 'gems/ /rgyal ba'i sras po gzugs che ba/ /rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor brgyan/ /rdo rje'i lcag mdas

bsreg mdzad pa/ /rdo rje'i mdas ni rnam par sbyong / /rdo rje don yod rdo rje'i dbang / /rdo rje dbang po rdo rje'i rtsal/ /ye shes dag pa theg pa che/ /thabs brnyes snying rje chen po lags/ /rdo rje chen po rtsed mo can/ /spyan bzang rnam par gzig

pa po/ /rdo rje dril bu rnam dag spyan/ /mdza' bo sdug pa dam tshig mkhyen/ /rdo rje chen po mgon po pa/ /rdo rje sa 'og 'jigs par mdzad/ /rdo rje chen po gad rgyangs sgron/ /me tog chun po 'od gsol ba/ /dag pa zas gtsang sras kyi

sras/ /des pa skal bzang gtsang ba lags/ /sna tshogs can te lha kun mchog /rdo rje'i dpung gi dkyil 'khor ldan/ /rdo rje gtsug sdug shes rab can/ /rdo rje'i bkod pa rab tu mdzes/ /mdzes pa shin du rnam par dag /

bskal pa'i rlung chen lta bu lags/ /dpa' bo gsang ba chen po 'chang / /rig sngags 'chang gi mchog gis rjed/ /gsang ba po ste gsang ba gsung / /skyes pa bud med tshogs dga' ba/ /rdo rje thog thog sgra chen sgrogs/ /rdo rje'i

sgrog ste rnam par 'joms/ /rdo rje'i lcags kyu dgyes pa che/ /rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba/ /nor bus spras pa'i na bza' gsol/ /spos dang me tog phreng gis brgyan/ /dbu yi snyan cha gdub kor btags/ /sangs rgyas bstan

pa ston pa po/ /rgyal po sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /dbang phyug chen po grags pa che/ /dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ston pa po/ /dbu rgyan cod pan kun nas bcings/ /sna tshog rgyan gyis brgyan pa

lags/ /de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug mgon/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod/ /de nas rdo rje don yod pas gsung pa/ /rdo rje gsang bas brgyan pa yi/ /rdo rje mtshan rtsa brgyad pa 'di/ /ming ni rdo rje don yod 'byung / /sdang ba thams cad bzlog byed pa/ /

ming ni brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di/ /dad pa gang zhig 'chang byed pa/ /grub pa thams cad thob 'gyur zhing / /nyes pa kun las rnam par 'grol/ /lag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/ /lag na rdo rje'i yon tan che/ /gang zhig nang

par langs nas brjod/ /de ni sdig pa kun las 'grol/ /ngan song kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /gsang sngags thog mar smos pa 'di/ /su zhig nang par langs nas 'don/ /rgyal po blon po grong khyer ba/ /gnyen rnams kyang ni dga'

bar 'gyur/ /bstod pa'i mchog ni su 'don pa/ /'jig rten thams cad de dbang 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad zad pa dang / /tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'dod pa dam pa yi/ /bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig

nang par langs nas ni/ /lag na rdo rje'i drung du brjod/ /de ni ji ltar 'dod pa dang / /ldan 'gyur 'di la the rtsom med/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa la/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / /'jigs byed rgyal po rnams kyis kyang / /

zil gyis mnan par mi nus so/ /shes rab can ni gang zhig gis/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na/ /gzugs bzang stobs ni skye ba dang / /bde ba 'phel ba de yis 'thob/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di/ /nges par gnas

shing gtsang mar 'don/ /mdor na yon tan rgyas pa yi/ /bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur/ /'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/

Ar+ya many+dzu shrI ku mA ra b+hU tASh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ phyogs bcu'i yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' dag ma lus par khyab cing mchog tu rmad du byung ba rnam par dag pa'i blo mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa thugs dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang

bral ba/ yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs gyi 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ zhabs rten gyi pad ma la lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi thor tsugs dang cod pan gyi rtse mos bsdugs

pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs ngan song gis 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM b+ho ma hA ma Ni ru tsi ra ka lA pa bi rtsi tra/ mug ta dA ma/

a laM kr-i ta sha ri ra/ pa ra satwa mo tsa ka /ta thA ga ta ma hA d+harma ko Sha d+ha ra/ pra bar d+harma la b+ha/ bi dza ya su ra ta/ saM b+ho ga u pa de sha ka /kle sha ga ra pra sha ma ka /shUn+ya tA swa b+ha ba/ a nu swa ri/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra/ ba ra ta/ ba ra Na

da da/ oM ma hA pA sha pra sa ra/ a sa ma sa ma/ a nan ta sa ma/ sa man ta b+ha dra/ sa man ta san d+ha ra/ sa man ta a ka ra/ sa man ta pra sa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ he he/ many+dzu ra ba/ ma hA badzra khaDa ga ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ bi ra dza bi ra

dza/ karma a ba ga ma ka /ku ru ku ru/ hU ru hU ru/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ d+ha d+hu d+ha d+hu/ d+hu d+hu d+hu d+hu/ ma hA ma hA ma hA ma hA/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ b+ho b+ho/ b+hi ma b+hi ma/ nA da nA da/ sa ra sa ra/ ma hU bi d+hi sa twa/ mo tsa ya/ ma ma nA tha/ ma nu sri ta/

a pA ya duHkhaM/ su ka da/ ma hA ka ru N-i kA/ a nA tho haM/ duHkhi to haM/ sa ra dzo haM/ u pa dru to haM/ a bi big to haM/ ku si d+ho haM/ mA ra na d+harmo haM/ twa na b+ha ga bAM/ duHkhi ta nA~M/ su khan da da/ a nA tha nA~M/ sa nA thA ka ra/ sa ra dza saM/ bi ra dza

ska ra/ ud pad dru tA mA~M/ swa ra u pa dra ba pra sha ma ka /a bi bi ka ta nA~M/ ku sha la sa~M b+ha ra/ pa ri pU ra yi tA/ ku si da nA~M/ ma hA bir+ya d+ha tA/ mA ra Na d+harme Na/ ma ma ti pa dA dA tA/ ma ma bi b+ha ga bAn/ nA tho b+ha ba/ sha ra nA~M/ pa ra ya nA~M/ tra tA/ sarba duH

khA ni me pra sha ma ya/ sarba kla sha rA dzA~M si mi/ a ba na ya/ sarba san sa ra u pa dra ba/ duHkha ni me nA sha ya/ sarbaM ku sha la d+harma pa ri pU ra me ku ru/ sarba karma a ba ra Na/ kle sha pa ra ba ta me bi ki ra/ mA hA bo d+hi satwa si bi d+hi/ bIr+ya

pA ra mi tA/ yo goM me san ni yo dza ya/ a ra Na d+harma/ bi ra ka bi ra dza/ san dza ha/ pra dza ha/ d+ha ra Ni sa ma/ kha sa ma/ dza la ni d+ha sa ma/ me ru sa ma/ ma hA bo d+hi sa twa pa ra da swA hA/ rig sngags don kun bsgrub pa 'di/ /'jam pa'i

dbyangs kyis bshad pa na/ /de ma thag tu sems can rnams/ /skye dang rga ba zad par 'gyur/ /ngan 'gro thams cad zhi gyur nas/ /bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu 'dar/ /lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga'/ /log 'dren

rnams ni skrag par gyur/ /sdig pa zhi bar byed pa yi/ /gzungs 'di bshad pa'i mod la yang / /grangs med phrag ni dung phyur snyed/ /'khor ba'i btson ra dag nas thar/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yis/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni

rab bsgrags shing / /gang tshe rig sngags bshad pa na/ /brag dang nags dang tshal du bcas/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i/ /sa gzhi de yi tshe na g.yos/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyi snang ba yis/ /sa yi steng yang khyab par gyur/ /bgegs dang log

'dren thams cad dang / /srin po mi bzad gzugs can rnams/ /stobs bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /skad phyung tshig ni 'thun par smras/ /lha rnams zhi ba'i cha lugs can/ /thams cad yid ni dga' gyur nas/ /gang na

rdo rje'i ral gri che/ /de yi drung lhags smras pa ni/ /phyag 'tshal mchog sbyin rdo rje'i mchog /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni stobs chen la/ /shugs stong ldan pa rgyal ba can/ /bgegs kyi yul 'khor rab 'joms pa/ /sngags 'chang
gsang sngags chen po 'chang / /sna tshogs gzugs can mi yi bdag /shin du stobs ldan gzugs mdzes 'jigs/ /drag po drag po rab 'joms pa/ /gzi brjid gzi brjid mnga' ba'i dpal/ /dpal ldan mnyam
pa med pa'i dpe/ /rdo rje can te snying sbyong ba/ /mi shes pa yi rab rib sel/ /sgeg pa'i cha lugs mchog mnga' ba/ /skye dgu'i bdag po sgeg par dgyes/ /gzhu stobs can la phyag ring

ba/ /nyon mongs dgra rnams sel bar mdzad/ /mdzes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol/ /me tog phreng rgyan sna tshogs can/ /spyan bzang dbu ni mdzes pa ste/ /dgyes shing na bza' mdzes par gsol/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs de

rab tu bzhad/ /dkar nag 'byes pa'i spyan mnga' ba/ /ha ha'i sgra ni grags par bsgrags/ /rab tu dang bas bstan pa dga'/ /rgya chen gser gyi mdog dang ldan/ /rgya mtsho snying po'i spyod yul can/ /tshul mkhyen tshul ldan 'jigs

pa te/ /sdang ba'i snying ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /cha lugs sngo la sa skyong ba/ /lha yi bdag po dga' bar mdzad/ /'dod pa'i lha ste 'dod sel bstan/ /rgyal po'i 'jig rten sa 'dzin pa/ /brtan po rnams la brtan par grags/ /

yon tan dag gis phyogs su bzhad/ /btud pa yis btud phyag bgyis pa/ /rtag tu mchod cing rjed pa lags/ /stobs po che la shugs che ba/ /phyag ring g.yul chen mnga' ba po/ /sgeg chen rdo rje dam pa ste/ /'dzem shes rab

bsrung ngo tsha shes/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po'i mchog /dkyil 'khor chen po ston pa po/ /dkyil 'khor chen por grags pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pa lags/ /dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can/ /

zhabs la rjed pa'i tshogs dang ldan/ /ha ha swA hA'i bdag che ba/ /mchod pa chen po sa dang mnyam/ /hUM gis 'jig mdzad 'jigs pa ste/ /'jigs pa'i 'od kyis gsal ba po/ /lha dang lha min rnams kyis btud/ /de bzhin

mchod cing ri mor bgyid/ /zham ring gad rgyangs chen po can/ /rlung drag mun pa sel mdzad pa/ /'jig rten gsum du snyan par grags/ /gnod sbyin srin pos bsnyen bkur ba/ /drag po dkar mdzad bde 'byung ba/ /

mnga' bdag gtsug gi nor bu can/ /'dzum zhing sgeg par kun du ston/ /spyod pa sa ltar brtan pa lags/ /nor bu'i dkyil 'khor 'od mdzes pa/ /nyi ma gsal ba lam me ba/ /nyi ma'i 'od 'dra 'ja' khugs bzhin/ /tha ler

zhugs shing rgya cher bzhad/ /mthong na dga' zhing dga' bar mdzad/ /nor sbyin de bzhin gsang sngags sbyin/ /dbang phyug sbyin zhing rgyal srid sbyin/ /gzugs sbyin de bzhin stobs sbyin pa/ /dpal ldan dpal mdzad bgegs gnon ri/ /

kun du rmongs pa sel bar mdzad/ /'dus pa'i nang du gdan gshegs pa/ /zhabs la mchod pa'i tshogs bsags pa/ /dpung rgyan snyan cha gdub kor can/ /nor bu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba'i
sgron/ /rab rib sel bar mdzad pa po/ /ston pa ston mdzad skyong mdzad pa/ /dbang po mnga' bdag dmag gi mchog /'jigs pa sel bar mdzad pa te/ /'jigs pa med pa'i gnas sbyin pa/ /dkar ba sngo ba 'od

bzang ba/ /mgrin sngon gyi ni ston pa lags/ /ji ltar 'dul ba 'dul 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin cha lugs rab tu ston/ /shes rab ral gris 'debs par mdzad/ /stong nyid chos ni lhur 'dzin pa/ /byams pa mchog dang tha ma

mkhyen/ /rnam par grags pa gsan pa nges/ /rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis bstod/ /rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che/ /shin du rnam rgyal 'khor los bsgyur/ /'jigs med blo gros shes rab can/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa chos 'dzin pa/ /mgur bzangs 'dul mdzad zhi ba ste/ /zhi ba'i lam ni ston mdzad pa/ /lha dang lha min bcas pas bkur/ /sems can thams cad 'jigs med mdzad/ /sems can kun la rab ston pa/ /

brtan po sems can kun gyi mchog /sems can rnams kyi blo la mkhas/ /sred med bu ste drag shul stobs/ /me yi 'od dang 'dra ba ste/ /byis pa sku mchog mchog sbyin pa/ /rtsed mo rol mo ston par mdzad/ /phyag

rgya mdzad pas gsang sngags mdzad/ /bdag gir mi 'dzin rdul med brtan/ /mkha' 'dra dpe med smra mkhas pa/ /bdud dpung nges par 'joms pa po/ /mi mchog brtsan ba bskyod du med/ /de bzhin thub med rnam par rgyal/ /brtan po

sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs/ /mya ngan med cing gnas pa med/ /'jom med tshig bzang cha lugs bzang / /dpa' bo dgra rnams rab 'joms pa/ /tshan chen nges 'joms rnam 'byor pa/ /'dod pa gnod pa khyab par gshegs/ /mgon

po rgyal ba'i sras kyi mchog /gshin rje pham mdzad skye dgu bsrung / /las dang nyon mongs rab bsreg pa/ /ston mdzad nyon mongs sel ba lags/ /legs pa khyod kyi mchog gi mtshan/ /brgya rtsa brgyad pa rab gsal zhing / /dad pa bskyed par

byed pa 'di/ /lha mchog rnams kyis rab tu bshad/ /bgegs chen dang ni log 'dren dang / /gnod sbyin lha min srin po dang / /mdangs 'phrog gtum po rgod rnams kyis/ /de ring legs par bstod par gyur/ /'jam dpal rdo rje mchog gis

rab/ /bsgyings pas bltas pa'ang bde bar gyur/ /de dag kun la bltas nas kyang / /'di skad du ni tshig smras pa/ /khyed kun rtag tu bgegs med cing / /nges legs thar pa thob gyur la/ /'jigs med bkra yang shis par shog /nga la 'jigs

par ma sems shig /de nas rab tu cher bzhad cing / /'brug chen sgra ni sgrogs pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsal bas/ /shar phyogs gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ /kye ma gsang sngags mchog gi yul/ /sems can

gti mug bsal ba'i phyir/ /sems can rnams kyi bsod nams tshogs/ /shin tu rgyas pa byung bar gyur/ /kye ma bsod nams cher byas pa'i/ /sems can rnams ni rab sbyang phyir/ /dam pa sbyin pa'i grub pa'i gzungs/ /
'jam pa'i klog gis rab tu bshad/ /la la gang zhig mnyam bzhag nas/ /sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba yi/ /grub pa'i gzungs 'di 'don pa 'am/ /yang na nyan tam sems kyang rung / /de yi don kun 'grub
'gyur zhing / /sdug bsngal kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag pa/ /de yis nges par thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa chen yang / /ring por mi thogs de yis
'thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa/ /rab dga' shin tu dri ma med/ /'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can/ /sbyang dka' de bzhin mngon du gyur/ /ring du song dang mi g.yo ba/ /legs pa'i blo gros
chos kyis sprin/ /sa chen dam pa de dag kyang / /gang zhig nges gnas 'dod pa yi/ /sems can chen pos mi thogs par/ /tshe zad nas ni thob par 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag dang / /sems can kun

la sdug pa dang / /spros pa thams cad zhi ba yi/ /byang chub bla med thob par 'gyur/ /rig sngags 'chang kun bskyed pa dang / /sdigs pa thams cad zhi byed cing / /bkra shis mchog tu dge ba yi/ /ming brgya tsa brgyad yid 'ong
'di/ /sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar nas/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis mdun 'dug la/ /shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su/ /nang par langs nas su brjod pa/ /de la rig sngags 'chang kun dang / /de bzhin lha'i bdag

po rnams/ /gnod sbyin srin po mang po dag /rtag tu yang ni bsrung bar byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kun dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rnams dang / /de bzhin rdo rje'i mtshon 'chang rnams/ /de la nges par
bsrung bar byed/ /de nas sangs rgyas skur bzhugs shing / /mnyam par bzhag par snang bar 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin lha'i bdag po rnams/ /bgegs dang log 'dren chen po dag /dga' zhing bsam pa dam pa yis/ /
rgyang ma dag nas phyag kyang 'tshal/ /de phyir bgegs rnams dga' gyur pas/ /'tshe bar byed kyang mi nus so/ /lan gcig klags na tshangs chen dang / /bsod nams mnyam pa thob par 'gyur/ /
shes rab chen po gang zhig gis/ /nyin re mtshan mchog brjod byas na/ /dri ma med cing rab dag la/ /rab tu 'od gsal sgra snyan dang / /sems can thams cad dga' ba'i/ /yid du 'ong ba'i
gnas kyang 'thob/ /mtshungs pa med cing stobs bskyed lam mchog 'gro ba dang / /'od gsal dam tshig can gyi lha rnams kyis bstod cing / /yid 'phrog lha dang lha min tshogs te 'dun pa yi/ /
gzungs 'di rgyal ba rnams kyi legs par gsungs pa yin/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya sarba ni

ba ra Na bi ska~M b+hi nI nA mA Sh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka d+hA rA NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgrib pa thams cad rnams par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzung sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /\u0f00 a mr-i ta bin tu dza ba ma hA su ka swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis phyag
g.yas pa brkyang ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la tshim par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/ yon tan rin po che'i tshogs can khyod kyi gzung sngags 'di phyung
bas sems can rnaMs kyi bde ba chen po bskyed pa leg so legs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gang la la/ gzung sngags 'di thos pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa gang gI klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi spyan sngar

dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang la la'i rna lam tu grags par gyur pa de yang sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyuro/ /sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bcwa lnga

la smyung bar 'dug cing gso sbyong dang ldan par byas te/ spos dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / me tog dang / me tog phring dang / byug pa sogs pas mchod la bskor ba byas nas bzlas brjod byas na dam pa ci 'dod
pa thob par 'gyur te/ sdig pa thams cad dang sdug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la spos la sogs pas mchod de
bzlas brjod byas na rmi lam du ston par 'gyur te/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / /nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal ba thams cad sel bar byed do/ /de nas rdo rje me tog thod chen po
sa gsum gyi dbang phyug dang thabs cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de'i nang nas/ stan las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la btud nas

mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par stod pa/ sems can kun gyi gtso bo che/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul che ba/ /nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das/ /chos dbyings khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrib pa kun las nges par

grol/ /nyon mong dri ma kun sel cing / /nyes pa kun las rnam par grol/ /skyon bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lam srung cig spu'i tshul ston cing / /theg pa cig pu'i tshul gcig pa/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul brnyes te/ /

theg pa dag khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /snang ba chen po snang ba bsnyes/ /yon tan dkyil 'khor 'jig rten bdag /zla ba bzhin du 'od dkar ba/ /'jig rten 'das pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /theg pa chen po dag pa che/ /sangs

rgyas theg pa rtog gyur cing / /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnams grags pa/ /rdo rje chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /dpa'o bo chen po bdud las rgyal/ /dar ba chen po nyon mongs choms/ /bgegs thub gshen rje thub pa ste/ /

rin chen dra ba khyod phyag 'tshal/ /zla ba chen po nyi ma che/ /lhun po chen po dbang phyug che/ /lha chen mgon po chen po ste/ /'byor pa chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sgrib pa thams cad gcod mdzad cing / /sgrib pa thams cad sel

mdzad pa/ /kun mkhyen yon tan bdag nyid che/ /rnam sel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul zhugs pa ste/ /chos kyi spyod yul gshegs pa lags/ /ye shes dbang phyug ye shes che/ /sred bral khyod
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku mdzes yon tan snying po mkhyen/ /rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor brgyan/ /sangs rgyas lam ste don yod che/ /ye shes dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /bstan pa gnas pa dbang bdag po/ /bde

mdzad thug kyang zhi ba ste/ /yangs pa dri med shes rab can/ /snang ba dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /zab cing brtan la rnam par gnon/ /zhi la 'jig rten dag par mdzad/ /ston pa skyabs 'os srid gsum na/ /dpa' btsan

khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skal ba chen po nyon mongs bcom/ /'khor ba'i dkyil 'khor 'joms pa ste/ /zhi ba zhi mdzad bde 'byung ba/ /chu bo zhi mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal/ /thar pa'i rgyu ste chos lugs che/ /bde 'gror gnas

pa dri ma med/ /rnam dag thugs mnga' zhi ba mkhyen/ /nyes sel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtse mo yang par rnam par grags/ /sngags chen mang pos 'dul mdzad pa/ /snying po chen po dkyil 'khor mchog /dkyil 'khor
mkhyen pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sdug bsngal gsum sel gsum gyi mchog /dkon mchog gsum dang spyod yul 'dra/ /rnam gsum mkhyen pa rnyed pa'i bdag /rnam thar gsum khyod phyag 'tshalo/ /

byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi/ /'byor pa brnyes shing mnyam nyid brnyes/ /bskal pa dag ni grang med par/ /tshogs chen bsags pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sa la gnas pa sa chen brnyes/ /sa yi 'bras bu phun

sum tshogs/ /yang dag sa 'dzin las byung ba/ /ye shes sa khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa/ /nyes gsuM spangs zhing sdig pa sel/ /ting 'dzin mkhyen cing rgya che ba/ /mnyam pa nyid mnyam

khyod phyag 'tshal/ /mgon po chen po snang ba che/ /sdug bsngal chen po'i dri ma sel/ /zhi gyur ma lus zhi mdzad pa/ /yon tan pha mtha' khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas kun mtshungs gsung ldan pa/ /chos kun zhi ba
phun sum tshogs/ /dkon mchog gsum rigs dpe med pa/ /rin chen mtha' yas khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje chen po dri med mchog /rdo rje'i mtshon bsnams sdig mi mnga'/ /nam mkha' ma lus yul dang

ldan/ /ye shes spyod yul rgya mtsho mnga'/ /de bzhin gsheg dang yul gcig pa/ /sel ba po ste dri ma sbyong / /shes rab chen po rgyal ba'i sras/ /srid bcod khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i mchog /

rdo rjes 'dul ba rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje rtsal can rnams kyi rtsal/ /rdo rje snang ba khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen chen po rin chen blo/ /rin chen rdo rje 'od che ba/ /rin chen 'od mdzes rin chen 'byung / /rin chen bstan pa bsrung mdzad pa/ /

stong pa nyid kyi yul brnyes pa/ /ye shes stong pa nyid kyis ston/ /stong nyid longs spyod yul dang ldan/ /stong nyid mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab mtshungs med shes rab can/ /dge ba rnam dag sa dang bral/ /
chos gcig las byung snang ba po/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul chen lags/ /'jig rten snang mdzad smra mkhas pa/ /'jig rten chos las rnam par 'das/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa'i yon tan brnyes/ /
brgyan par mdzad pa dkyil 'khor dag /nyes pa ma lus bsal ba te/ /phal chen skye bo kun la phan/ /sa 'dzin rnam par grags pa po/ /kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dga' mkhyen dga' la longs spyod
pa/ /dga' ba'i rig mchog rnams kyi mchog /dga' bar mdzad pa'i rtog pa can/ /dga' la snang ba khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sgeg chen 'jam zhing dgongs par ldan/ /rnam par bsgeg la spyod pa brtan/ /
rdo rje'i rig pa bsgeg pa'i mchog /sgeg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog /rdo rje mchog gi dkyil 'khor che/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/ /

bla med mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa'i mchog /sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad la/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor rnams kyi ni/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas/ /rdo rje'i
bstan pa rnam grags pa/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /kye ma 'byor chen snang ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal bas dkyil 'khor pa/ /gang zhig mi brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ /'di dag so sor brjod byed na
na/ /nga ni nyes pa kun bzlog cing / /rtag tu de'i phyi bzhid 'brang / /nang par langs nas gtsang ma yis/ /sgrib pa thams cad sel ba la/ /blo ldan gang zhig bstod byed pa/ /de'i sdig pa med par
'gyur/ /gang zhig mi brgya rtsa brgyad mchog /nang par langs nas brjod byed pa/ /sdang ba thams cad de dbang 'gyur/ /gagegs rnaMs kyis kyang yongs su btang / /sdig pa dag pa 'thob pa dang / /

de bzhin bsod nams 'phel ba dang / /ye shes rgya mtsho longs spyod cing / /sa mchog chen po thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig nges par gnas byas la/ /ming rgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'don pa/ /des ni 'byor chen sangs

rgyas sa/ /ring por mi thog thob par 'gyur/ /rgyud chen ldan zhing blo che ba/ /gang zhig ming mchog 'don pa ni/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa la/ /ring por mi thogs 'jug par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems

dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad pa gzung sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya k+Sha ti gar+b+he aSh+Tot+ta ra sha tu ka nA ma d+hA ra Ni man+t+ra sa hi ta/
bod skad du/ 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag

'tshal lo/ /oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha/ ha ra tsa ra/ ma hA pA sha ma ru tA/ a mo g+ha badzra satwa swA hA/ de nas yon tan sbyin pa'i/ /gzung 'di bshad ma thag tu yang / /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /

ti se'i gang bcas g.yos par gyur/ /sa'i snying po tshogs dbang dbang la/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis smras/ /bskal ldan chen po legs so legs/ /sa steng khyod kyis yangs par byas/ /khyod kyi gzungs ni rnaM grags shing / /
yon tan dpag med tshogs bskyed pa/ /sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal dang / /nyes pa zlog byed thos pa ni/ /'khor bar rab tu rgyu ba na/ /nyes pa kun gyis mi gos te/ /ji ltar 'dam gyi pad ma dag /
'dam gyi nyes pas mi gos bzhin/ /lus can dag las su yang rung / /khyod kyi gsang sngags 'chang byed pa/ /de dag las ni gcig tsam yang / /byang chub las ni ldog mi 'gyur/ /mkhas pa gang zhig gzungs
sngags mchog /thos nas mos par byed pa ni/ /nges par yon tan thams cad kyang / /thob par 'gyur te the tshom med/ /de nas thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor/ /langs te sa'i dbang phyug po/ /sa'i snying po

sa mchog la/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad smras pa ni/ /sa'i snying po gtso bo che/ /glog 'gyu lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba/ /cod pan can te sa bsnyes pa/ /phun sum tshogs ldan 'byor pa mchog /rig ldan rig mdzad

mchod pa'i gnas/ /gtso bo dge sbyong ston pa po/ /gzhi bcas ldan pa'i rlung gi tshul/ /swA hA'i blo ldan snying rje'i rab/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyi ma'i mchog /snying po snying po mkhyen par grags/ /gsang
sngags rol cing rgya cher rol/ /sa'i dbang phyug gar thabs can/ /sgeg po zhal bzang gar mkhan ldan/ /'bras bu mngon sum ston pa po/ /rab 'byor blo gros snying po mkhyen/ /snying po brnyes pa 'jig pa

med/ /mgon po sangs rgyas gzugs mnga' ba/ /shes rab kyi ni ma lus gzigs/ /'dod chags la sogs skyon bsal cing / /gar thabs chen po ston pa po/ /ston pa dpag bsam shing dang 'dra/ /nam mkha'i dbang phyug

gsung snyan pa/ /nyi ma chen po nyid yin te/ /dbang phyug chen po 'bar bas bskor/ /yon tan mtha' yas longs spyod pa/ /sa'i dbang phyug spyod yul can/ /chos kyi longs spyod longs spyod che/ /yon tan rgya mtsho'i gangs chen

mtsho/ /yon tan sna tshogs longs spyod pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig kyi mchog /thabs tshul zab la mkhas pa ste/ /theg pa chen po 'jigs pa med/ /mchod pa chen po sgra che ba/ /zla ltar grags pa'i dkyil 'khor can/ /

rdo rje 'chang chen mtshan rgya pa/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor me tog thod/ /blo gros chen po phyag ring ba/ /pad ma chen po stobs po che/ /gsang sngags chen po tshogs chen po/ /sa bzhi chen po lhun po lags/ /lags na rdo rje yon tan nges/ /nor bu'i me

tog thod gyis brgyan/ /mnyam nyid 'byam la longs spyod pa/ /rgya chen zhing gi rgya mtsho can/ /rdo rje'i 'od mnga' rdo rje ldan/ /sa'i bdag po lhun po bzhin/ /sa la longs skyod longs spyod bzang / /mtshon cha g.yo ba phun suM tshogs/ /rab 'byams snod ni

rnam par grags/ /smra mkhas rdo rje rab 'joms pa/ /spyan rtsa yid tsam dmar ba ste/ /me tog sngon po'i thod kyis cings/ /spro ba chen po phyag ring ba/ /brtan po brtan la bde sbyin pa/ /ded dpon dpal bzang chen po ste/ /gang can lhun po lta bu lags/ /

dbang po gshin rje rgyal chen dang / /btsan po khyab 'jug stobs dbang phyug /'jig rten mchog rigs sangs rgyas tshangs/ /de bzhin nyid tshul spyod yul can/ /r-in chen rtog ste cher bzhad pa/ /dgyes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol/ /gzigs

pa ring pa spyan yangs pa/ /naM mkha' bzhin du thog pa med/ /thogs pa mi dpogs rin chen gtsug /srid gsum 'dod pa med pa'i rgyu/ /dul ba nyon mongs ma dri ma bsal/ /dag pa gtsang ba gso sbyong can/ /rnaM par gnon pa'i

g.yul las 'das/ /ljang mdog skyabs mdzad snying rje che/ /stobs kyis grags pa rgya che ba/ /bsams na shes pa'i spyod yul can/ /dpa' bo seng ge 'jig par byed/ /sdang ba rnam kyi snying 'joms pa/ /mnga' bdag

grags pa yul dang ldan/ /dga' ba brgya chen rab 'byung ba/ /rig mkhyen rig kyis snying po mkhyen/ /rig kun du ni mchod pa lags/ /rgyal po rigs mchog skyes pa'i rten/ /rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor brgyan/ /

rdo rje sa 'og rab grag pa/ /rig sngags 'chang ba stob po che/ /mngon par 'phags pa khyab pa mchog /mgrin bzangs nad dang bral ba lags/ /skyong mdzad ston pa dag pa te/ /sangs rgyas lam ni rab ston pa/ /grol

ba smin mdzad 'dud par mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus rnaMs kyi brgyan/ /rab zhugs dkyil 'khor rnaM la mkhas/ /rdo rje'i slob dpon yon rtan rten/ /grub pa sbyin pa rnaM dag mchog /tshul dang tshul min rtogs pa po/ /dkyil 'khor tsa ser

mnga' ba ste/ /'od zer ljang gu'i 'od dang ldan/ /ser la na bza' ser po mnabs/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus kun gyi rgyan/ /spyan tsa dmar ba zla ba'i dpal/ /nor bu sna tshogs 'od 'byung ba/ /rdo rje brgya'i stob kyi spro/ /mnyaM nyid

mnyam pa dr-i ma med/ /sku yang dag cing na bza' dag /dag pa mkhyen cing dag par ldan/ /dag pa'i chos mnga' snang ba te/ /'byung ldan srid pa sel mdzad pa/ /'khor ba zad mdzad shes rab can/ /tshul shes tshul la spyod yul ba/ /rdo rje rgya mtsho'i

snying po lags/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dge ba che/ /'byung ldan rab 'byaMs shes rab can/ /ma lus grags pa'i 'od bzang ba/ /sa'i snying po snying po che/ /rdo rje'i snying po rnam par 'dren/ /dpag tu med pa dpag med rdzogs/ /khyad par

'phags pa'i yul la gnas/ /zab cing gsal ba'i gtso bo te/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer bsil/ /dga' dang dang ba bskyed pa ste/ /ye shes rgya chen spyod yul ba/ /rlung gis drag shul lta bur drag /drag po lags

te drag bsel gtsang / /rgyal bar byed cing rgyal ba zhi/ /rgyal ba'i dpal mdzad dga' bar mdzad/ /lhun po ti se ma la yas/ /spyod yul zab mo non pa ste/ /rin chen rdo rje snying po che/ /sa bzhi'i spyod yul mnga' ba lags/ /rin chen

brag las byung ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dag gis brgyan/ /de bzhin gshegs la lhur dgyes pa/ /shugs drag dpal gyi gzhi rten lags/ /rab gsal dpal mdzad gtsang ma ste/ /phyogs bcu'i dbang phyug dbang

phyug che/ /de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen la/ /mi brgya tsa brgyad mchog rnams kyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' stod nas ni/ /rdo rje'i sa gsum dbang mchog smras/ /yon tan snying po shes rnams kyis/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog brjod cing / /

nyes pa zlog pa 'di las bzhan/ /sa yi sting na nges ma mthong / /ming rgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/ /thams cad 'grub byed dga' ba ste/ /sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang / /dri ma kun bral yon tan nges/ /de phyir sgrim pa thams cad kyis/ /phun

pha suM tshogs pa 'dod pa'i mis/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dge ba 'di/ /rtag tu yang ni brjod par gyis/ /ming rgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/ /bsam pa kun dang 'byor pa yi/ /gnas mchog bla na med pa ste/ /dpal yon
rgya chen sbyin pa yin/ /yid ni shin du dang ba yis/ /sa yi snying po'i mtshan gsal ba/ /'dod pa thams cad rab bsgrub pa'i/ /yon tan mchog ni gang brjod dang / /dpal yon rgya chen 'dzin pa yi/ /ming
brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/ /mi ni gang zhig brjod byed pa/ /sdug bsngal kun las myur tu 'grol/ /'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas

pa rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas 'khor brgyad dang bcas pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra s+ya nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka /

bod skad du/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig

na/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas/ ri gru 'dzin gyi rtse mo me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs bkram pa/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser kha dog bzang po ltar snang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs

sna ba'i sa phyogs na bzhugs te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis/

bcom ldan 'das la sti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas te/ mchod cing rjed nas/ yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar
dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
bstod pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ dgongs pa mdzad pa/ mdzad rgyu mdzad pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su brnyes pa/ srid par kun du sbyor ba yongs su bas ba/ yang dag pa'i mkhyen pas/
thugs shin du rnam par grol ba/ cang mkhyen pa/ glang po che chen po dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol du byon pa/ ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa/ srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal
ba/ bzhan la sman pa/ thugs rje dang 'brel ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ skye dgu la mchog tu mnyes gshin pa/ bde ba rab tu stsol bar mdzad pa/ byams pas zhugs pa/ sems can mtha' yas pa sgrol ba la mkhas
pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po/ srid pa gsum gyi rtsa lag gcig pu/ 'dod chags mi mnga' ba/ zhe sdang mi mnga' ba/ gti mug mi mnga' ba/ dri ma gsum spangs pa/ rig pa gsum gyi pha rol du gshegs

pa/ mngon par shes pa drug brnyes pa/ shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zhing gab pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus brgyan pa/ lpags pa srab cing mdog ser ba/ sku ring rgyu

bzang zhing dkar ba/ sku shing gi me tog sar pa dang / dmar ring lta bu'i dbu thor tshugs mnga' ba/ lcang lo 'khyil ba mang pos dbu khebs pa/ 'od dpag med kyis 'od zer btang ba/ 'bar ba'i 'od 'dom gang gis

gser gyi ri bo ltar snyan par grags pa/ gzi brjid rgya che ba/ gzugs 'char ka'i ri lta bu gtsug tor mnga' ba/ nor bu rab tu 'bar ba/ mchod phyir thogs sku la se ral du thogs pa/ sa rab tu rnam par 'byed

pa/ pha rol du phyin pa bcu'i zhabs dang ldan pa/ tshul khrims ma nyams pa/ tshul khrims ma zhig pa/ seng ge ltar thong ka phel ka che ba/ sku 'jam zhing mdzes pa/ gzigs pa dang gshegs thabs khyu chog

gi dpang po 'dra ba/ mkhur ba g.yas su 'khyil pa/ dpral ba che zhing zla ba kham pa 'dra la thig le mnga' ba/ phyag pus mo slebs pa/ smin ma bar ma chad pa/ shangs mtho ba/ mgur bum pa'i mgrin pa 'dra

ba/ phyag sor mo dang tshigs ring ba/ sen mo 'jam zhing zangs kyi mdog dang 'dra ba/ phyag dra bas 'brel pa/ phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor los brgyan pa/ ston ka'i pad ma 'dra ba/ sku 'jam zhing rgyal
pa/ tshangs pa ltar dbyangs zab pa/ yid tu mchi ba sdug pa/ blta na sdug pa/ nyams dga' bar bgyid pa/ 'od pad ma 'dra ba/ pad ma las 'khrungs pa/ pad ma las byung ba/ pad ma'i
gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag na pad ma mnga' ba/ phyag na ril ba spyi'u blugs bsnams pa/ ri dgas nags po'i lpags pa mnabs pa/ phyag mkhar bsnams pa/ bgrang ba'i nor bu bsnams pa/ gcung bstsangs

pa/ gsong por gsung ba/ bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu/ blta na sdug pa'i shing 'dra ba/ sems can thams cad mos par mdzad pa/ dga' bar mdzad pa/ sems can thams cad nye bar mtsho ba/

sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i cha byad mnga' ba/ bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin pa/ spu re re skyes pa/ sems can gyi snying po/ bsod nams mdzad pa/ dge ba mdzad pa/ nges par mdzad pa/

brtson 'grus 'bar ba/ 'khor ba las shin du gnas pa/ dam pa'i chos la rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba/ sgrol ma zhabs drung na gnas pa/ khro gnyer can bka' bzhin bgyid pa/ rgyal ba dang ldan pa/ tshul dang ldan pa/ dran

pa dang ldan pa/ mthu rtsal che ba/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ byams pa dang ldan pa/ zhi ba dang ldan pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ skal pa dang ldan pa/ don dang ldan pa/ don rnams thugasu chud pa/ the rtsom rnams gcod pa/ chos

rnams gsung ba/ 'jig rten rnams kyi ston pa/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas pa/ sku rked pa'i phyogs rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu/ sku nyi ma stong bas lhag par mdzes

pa/ tshangs pa'i dbang po la sogs pas phyag bgyis pa lags so/ /gang la la zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa sgrub pa byed pa de'i mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi

sgrib pa rnam par byang bar 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad tu zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /de la gsang sngags thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag du mar ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /

mtshams med par 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /su zhig nang par langs nas 'dod tam/ klog gam/ kha ton byed na de'i lus la mdze dang / rkang shu dang / lud pa dang / mi bde ba mi 'byung zhing nad thams cad las thar bar

'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs so cog tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'jig rten kyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs so cog tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhungs par 'gyur/ dpa' bar 'gyur/ skad snyan par 'gyur/ skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/ /bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/

tshig btsun par 'gyur ro/ /bstod pa sgrub pa 'dis bstod pa byas na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung drug bcu rtsa gnyis snyed kyi bye ma snyed dag la mchod pa byas par 'gyur te/ rnam par smyin pa mtshung
shing bye brag med par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi ring bsrel kyi za ma tog ces bya ba rdzogs s+ho// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kan/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shin du dang ba'i
sems kyis su/ /thub la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa yi/ /mtshan rnams 'dir ni brjod par bgyi/ /gzugs mdzes gzugs dang ldan pa ste/ /gzugs rnams kun gyi
bla na med/ /mtshan rnams thams cad kun du rdzogs/ /'jam dpal dpal gyi dam pa lags/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bsam dang bral/ /mthu rtsal bsam yas rmad tu byung / /sku gsung phrin las bsam mi
khyab/ /de bzhin thugs kyang bsam mi khyab/ /stong nyid bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid can/ /stong pa'i chos dang yang dag ldan/ /stong pa nyid la lhag par mos/ /srid pa gsum po stong par ston/ /thams cad

mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/ /sa rnams kun gyi bdag dang ldan/ /sems can kun gyi mchog tu gyur/ /sems can kun kyis phyag bgyis pa/ /ngan 'gro kun dang de bzhin du/ /mu stegs can rnams thams cad 'joms/ /

phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod pa/ /smra ba'i seng ge mi yi mchog /dul zhing nyon mongs rnams dang bral/ /sgrib pa dri ma kun mi mnga'/ /sems can thams cad yongs su skyob/ /grol zhing 'jig rten grol mdzad pa/ /ral pa mun dza brtul

zhugs can/ /tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gnas na bzhugs/ /bgrang nor thogs shing phyag mkhar bsnams/ /dag cing dag la rnams dang ldan/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs can mnga' dbang mdzad/ /pad ma las 'khrungs pad ma'i spyan/ /

pad ma'i ze ba'i kha dog 'dra/ /bzhugs pa'i gdan khri pad ma lags/ /gtsang ma ud pal sngon po bsnams/ /bsam dag zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas/ /khyod ni dang po'i sangs rgyas

lags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing mnga' dbang brnyes/ /bden pa bzhi dag ston pa po/ /'jig rten skyong ba spyan stong mnga'/ /khyod ni dbang phyug skye dgu'i bdag /khyod ni zhi ba'i sems can rnams/ /kun gyi mnga' bdag yon

tan gtso/ /khyod ni khyu mchog skye dgu'i gtso/ /thu bo de bzhin tshe rabs dgongs/ /rnam par 'dren dang 'dul mdzad pa/ /rgyal sras rgyal ba nyid las 'khrungs/ /'od zer stong ldan nyi ma khyod/ /zla ba dang ni phur bu

'ang khyod/ /rnam thos bu dang chu lha'ang lags/ /dbang phyug che khyod khyab 'jug khyod/ /klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas khyod/ /de bzhin sde dpon skem byed lags/ /lha min dbang po thags zangs ris/ /mi dmar gza' lag

pa ba sangs/ /spen pa dpa' bo lha kun lags/ /lha rnams kun gyis phyag bgyis pa/ /'jig rten chos kyi dri ma bral/ /khyod ni 'jig rten gang zag mchog /'jig rten mkhyen pa 'jig rten rig /ye shes can gyi dam

mchog pa/ /dam pa sbyin dang gnas dang skyabs/ /bdud kyi las kyis yong mi rdzi/ /kha na ma tho mi mnga' zab/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen kun du grags/ /khyod ni sman pa zug rngu 'byin/ /mi 'dul kha lo bsgyur ba'i mchog /blo gros
