ldan zhing rtogs dang ldan/ /blo dang ldan zhing mkhas pa lags/ /khyod ni bsod nams dpag bsam shing / /byang chub yan lag me tog brgyan/ /rnam grol 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/ /lus can kun gyi mchog tu gyur/ /

yid tu 'ong zhing yid 'phrog pa/ /sdig pa mi mnga' tshangs par spyod/ /khyod ni mjug rings gza' mchog lags/ /khyod ni drang srong thub pa mchog /khyod ni rgyal tshab dbang bskur ba/ /sa bcu'i mnga' bdag gtso bo lags/ /

ded dpon 'gro ba rnams kyi gtso/ /mya ngan 'das pa mchog ston bzhin/ /khyod ni nam mkha' sa chu bzhin/ /khyod ni me dang rlung lta bu/ /khyod ni yid bzhin nor bu ltar/ /sems can re ba kun rdzogs mdzad/ /'byung po

kun gyis phyag bgyis pa/ /rin chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam dpal gyis ni bka' stsal pa/ /\u0f00 bA kyai da~M na maHswA hA/ /ji skad smos pa'i mtshan rnams dang / /rig sngags bcas par 'dzin na ni/ /sdig

'gyur rnam dag rab tu thob/ /brgya las rtsa brgyad lhag pa'i mtshan/ /skyes bu dus gsum su klog pa/ /de 'dod bsam dgu yid bzhin du/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /bzang po'i mtshan rnams dran na ni/ /mtsham

med skal ba mnyam pa yi/ /las rnam mi bzad gang byas pa/ /de dag thams cad myur du byang / /'jig rten pha rol 'pho ba dang / /'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe/ /sems can dag pas dran byas na/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyang thob par

'gyur/ /blo dang ldan pas dran byas te/ /nges par gnas nas su klog pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni 'dod na yang / /thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// //

rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mai tri na pra ti dz+nyA nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rata na tra

yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga bA te/ shAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te sa~M myaka sa~M bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a dzi te a dzi te/ a dzi tan dza ya/ ha ra ha ra/ mai tri a ba lo ki te/ ka ra ka ra/ ma hA sa ma ya sid d+he/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma hA bo d+hi

maN Da bI dze/ sma ra sma ra/ asma kang sa ma ya bo d+hi bo d+hi/ ma hA bo d+h-i swA hA/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags so/ /oM mo hi mo hi/ ma hA mo hi swA hA/ snying po'o/ /oM mu ni mu ni swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /gzungs 'di nyan pa tsam dang /

klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la sems pa dang / bsgom pa tsam gyis gang gi tshe bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa na/ bdag gis sems can de

nges par btsal bar bgyi ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyi'o/ /tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnasu gyur pa'i ri dgas dang / bya rnams kyi rna khung du sgrogs par byed na/ de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob bo/ /'di thos pa tsam gyis nam du yang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyuro/ /ngan song gi dri mas mi gos so/ /ma'i mngal du yang mi skye'o/ /lha'i bskal pa stong du 'khor los

bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyuro/ /dge ba bcu'i las kyi la~M dang ldan par 'gyuro/ /ji ltar bsa~Ms shing don du gnyer ba'i longs spyod 'grub par 'gyuro/ /bcom ldan 'das bdagis kyang seMs can kyang seMs can de bskyud par mi bgyi lags so/ /

nges par bdag byang chub kyi snying po la mchis nas/ de ji ltar gyur kyang rung bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyi'o/ /'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //

rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA Ni dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dzam b+ha la nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka / bod skad du/ 'phags pa gnod

'dzin gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa gnod 'dzin la phyag 'tshalo/ /de nas gnod sbyin 'brog gnas po/ /gser dag gis ni legs par brgyan/ /rin chen gyis ni rab mdzes shing / /me ni shing du 'bar

'dra ba/ /lcang lo can du zhugs nas kyang / /gsang bdag rdo rje 'chang ba yi/ /zhabs gnyis la ni rab 'jus nas/ /shin du mnyaM bzhag dris pa ni/ /bcom ldan gnod 'dzin rgyal dbang po/ /gsang sngags tshogs ni kun gyi

bdag /rig sngags 'chang rnams kun gyis mchod/ /lha dang lha min phyag byas pa/ /ma rungs 'dul la brtson pa po/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan/ /mgon po sems can kun don mdzad/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba

'dzin/ /sems can rnaMs la phan 'dod pas/ /snying rjes non pa'i yid kyis su/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyir/ /bdag gis kyang ni sems bskyed de/ /mi rnams nor ni nyung ba dang / /bsod nams chung zhing dbang chung ba/ /mthong

nas sdug bsngal chen po yis/ /rab tu gzer to gsang ba'i bdag /de nas gnod 'dzin gyis smras nas/ /bcom ldan gsang ba gsang ba'i bdag /snying rjes non te smras pa ni/ /legs par nyon cig gsang ba pa/ /mgon po gnod

'dzin dpal dang ldan/ /sems can kun gyi don byed pa/ /dbul ba'i nyon mongs sel ba po/ /nor ro cog gi dbang phyug gi/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bsod nams ldan/ /dbul ba'i nyes sdig sel byed pa/ /gang gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed kyis/ /

rgyal mchog rnams kyis sngon gsungs pa/ /'od zer brgya pa zhes pa yi/ /zhing na sangs rgyas nyi ma'i zhal/ /chos ston pa na bdag gis kyang / /de ni rung gis sngon thos te/ /dbul ba sel cing bsod nams ldan/ /de ni bdagi

shes rab kyis/ /sems can kun don brtson pa po/ /khyod la legs par bstan par bya/ /khyod ni mnyam zhag rab tu nyon/ /'phags pa lha dang lha min bla/ /shes rab ldan zhing chos la gus/ /snying brtse'i bdag nyid bzod ldan brtan/ /

dbang po zhi ba dbang po thul/ /dge bas sdig 'joms shes nyen can/ /des shing don kun sgrub pa po/ /mi gnod mi slu dpal dang ldan/ /mdzod bdag gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi skyabs gcig pa/ /

sangs rgyas kun gyis gzigs pa po/ /gter rnams skyong ba gzi brjid can/ /rtag sbyin nor ni 'phel byed pa/ /rin chen 'byung gnas skye bo 'dul/ /chu yi bdag po chu 'bebs pa/ /gnod sbyin chu spyod bdag nyid can/ /

gter don nye bar ston pa po/ /gser gyi ri bo lhun po ste/ /dbul ba'i gdon las thar byed pa/ /dbang po nye dbang 'gro ba'i mgon/ /chu yi dbang po sprin mdog can/ /'jig rten mig dang 'jig rten bla/ /nyi ma zla ba ther

zug pa/ /nor chen rgyal po chen po ste/ /lag na ne'u le rab gnas pa/ /gzhon nu seng ge tog can te/ /gnod sbyin chen po rdzu 'phrul che/ /tshig gi bdag po bzhin 'dzum pa/ /gsong por snyan par smra ba po/ /bram ze
'dod pa'i lcags kyu ste/ /che ba don grub grub pas mchod/ /rig sngags 'chang ba 'khor los sgyur/ /ku be ra dang mi la zhon/ /bum pa'i lto can mig yangs pa/ /lha yi dri ldan yid ltar mgyogs/ /khyab
bdag bde 'byung nor bzangs sras/ /sems can rna~Ms ni skyong la dga'/ /'dod dgur bsgyur gzugs yid kyi lha/ /cod pan can de rigs dga' ba/ /g.yon phyogs cod pan lag na dbyug /lag pa brgya pa stobs po

che/ /sa brgyad dbang phyug lha yul pa/ /zla ba nya ba'i zhal mdog can/ /ded dpon tshogs kyi bdag po ste/ /gnas brtan tshong pa skal bzang ba/ /yid bzhin nor bu bum pa bzang / /dpag bsam ljon shing mi yi bdag /

mchog don 'os pa gtso bo ste/ /mchog sbyin mi'u thung khyab 'jug pa/ /skyabs 'os bkra shis srung ba po/ /rin chen phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /lha yi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi

bdag /rab du dar ba nor mi zad/ /seng ge'i rtsal gyi mthu rtsal can/ /ston pa 'jig rten gsum las rgyal/ /gtso bo tshong pa rigs kyi mchog /pad ma'i lte ba thub med rgyal/ /tshangs par spyod pa rgya mtsho che/ /gnod

'dzin bdag nyid che ba yi/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad ngas bshad 'di/ /sdig pa thams cad 'joms byed cing / /dbul ba'i nyon mongs sel byed pa/ /'byor dang skal bzang skyed pa po/ /glang po rta nor 'phel byed pa/ /gza' dang rgyu

skar rmi lam ngan/ /ltas ngan sel bar byed pa ste/ /nags saM gal te grong dang ni/ /dur khrod yang na ri yang rung / /mkhas pa gang na klog pa der/ /g.yul dang dgra ni nyam nga ba/ /sbrul dang me chu chom rkun sogs/ /stag dang

dom dang 'jigs pa che/ /rgya mtsho bgrod dka' mi bzad las/ /mi ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /dbang po me dang chu lha dang / /gshin rje srin bdag rlung lha dang / /nor sbyin dpal ldan ku bai rA/ /nor bu bzang sras lnga rtsen dang / /

rtsed mo can dang 'brog gnas dang / /lha dang gnod sbyin gzhan dag kyang / /g.yel ba med par nyin mtshan du/ /rab tu dga' bzhin srung bar byed/ /gang na ming 'di klog pa der/ /glang chen rta dang ba lang dang / /lo tog rnam pa sna

tshogs dang / /'bras bu me tog rnams kyang 'phel/ /mi nad dang ni 'go ba'i nad/ /gnod pa kun las byung ba rnaMs/ /tha~Md du ni bde legs 'gyur/ /lhag par byis pa rnams la shis/ /de la yi dgas klu rnams dang / /

ma mo dang ni gdon drag dang / /mkha'agro ma dang mi 'am ci/ /srin po rnams kyang 'tshe mi byed/ /nad do cog las rnam par grol/ /de bzhin bde zhing nor dang ldan/ /bu dag dang ni tsha bo dang / /dpal dang gtong ba

rnams kyis rgyas/ /rigs mchog rgyal ba 'byung ba dang / /longs spyod chen po'i nang du skye/ /tshe dang dpal dang ldan pa dang / /nad med rims dang bral bar 'gyur/ /tshe rabs kun du skye ba dran/ /lobs skyen

thos pa 'dzin pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan/ /skal ba bzang po nyid tu 'gyur/ /phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal gnod sbyin rje/ /gsang bdag khyod la phyag 'tshal te/ /ma rungs 'dul la brtson pa
po/ /lag na rdo rje khyod la 'dud/ /sems can dad la mnyes gshin pa/ /nor bzang sras kyi grags pa 'di/ /dbul ba'i nad ni zhi byed pa/ /rab tu bshad pa legs par gsungs/ /don kun grub pa gsang
ba'i sngags/ /bdagis kyang ni 'dir dbul te/ /de ni legs par dran tsam gyis/ /mi ni dbul las grol 'gyur zhing / /gzhan gyis mi tshugs srung bar 'gyur/ /dgra rnams kyis kyang mi choms shing / /

skal ba bzang dang skal dang ldan/ /lo brgya yang ni 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /lha yi glang po rin chen dang / /rgyal dang rgyal srid 'os rnams kyang / /nges par myur du thob 'gyur te/ /rgyal srid kyang ni the tshom med/ /

na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo ma Ni b+ha drA ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ oM hri~M hri~M k+ShA dzrA~M hri~M hra~M/ de ba bya rad no+o ga ba ri sha na a ta b+ha ga de ba yak+Sha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hrI hUM phaT swA hA/ 'phags pa gnod 'dzin gyi mtshan brgya rtsa

brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA sa mA dza su tran nA ma ma hA sU tra/ bod skad du/ mdo chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis

thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal na/ dge slong lnga brgya tha~Md kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi

don rjesu thob pa/ srid par kun du sbyor ba yongasu zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bac+do~Ms dge slong gi dge 'dun la mya ngan las 'das

pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtaM ston par mdzad de/ de'i tshe na phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khaMs dag nas/ dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dag lhags nas/ bac+do~Ms dang dge slong gi dge 'dun

la bsnyen bkur byed do/ /de nas tshangs rigs kyi lha tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa bzhi zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ sang+yas bac+do~Ms de ni shAkya rnaMs kyi ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal na/ dge slong lnga brgya tha~Md kyang dgra

bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdagi don rjesu thob pa/ srid par kun du sbyor ba yongasu zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu

bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun la mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtaM ston par mdzad de/ de'i tshe na phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags

pa'i lha dag lhag nas bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed kyis bdag cag kyang song la/ bcom ldan 'das la re re nas tshigasu bcad pas mngon par bstod par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi

po dag 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur cing / bac+do~Ms kyi spyan sngar lhags te/
phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ tshangs ris kyi lha gcig gis tshigasu bcad de gsol ba/ 'dus pa che la gzhol ba yi/ /lha tshogs kun nas lhags gyur pas/ /gzhan gyis mi thub dge 'dun la/ /blta ba'i

slad du bdag cag mchis/ /tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis pas tshigasu bcad de gsol ba/ drang por gyur pa'i seMs kyis ni/ /'di na dge sbyong rab brtson pa/ /kha lo ba ltar mig blangs shing / /dbang po rnams ni legs sdom bgyid/ /

tshangs ris kyi lha gsum pas tshigasu bcad de gsol ba/ dbang phur 'od ba 'obs 'dra ba'i/ /phur bu rab bcom bkrir mi tshugs/ /de dag sred bral dag spyod cing / /'dren pas glang po gzhon ltar btul/ /tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi

pas tshigasu bcad de gsol ba/ gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchi ba/ /de dag ngan 'gror mi mchi zhing / /mi lus spangs par gyur nas kyang / /lha'i lus ni thob par 'gyur/ /tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi po dag gis de skad ces

gsol nas de nyid na bag bcum ste 'khod do/ /de nas bac+doMs kyis lha'i 'khor tha~Md la rnam par gzigs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag kye ma lha rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni che ba yin no/ /dge slong dag

kye ma lha rnaMs kyi 'dus pa 'di ni shin tu che ba yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bac+doMs de dag la yang 'di lta ste/ dper

na da ltar nga'i lha rnaMs kyi 'dus pa chen po 'di kho na lta bu dag 'dus par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sang+yas bac+doMs de dag

la yang 'di lta ste/ dper na da ltar nga'i lha rnaMs kyi 'dus pa chen po 'di kho na lta bu dag 'du bar 'gyuro/ /dge slong dag lha rnaMs kyi ming dag brjod par byas/ lha rnams kyi mi dag zung shig /gang dag sa la gnas pa dang / /gang dag ri khrod gnas

pa rnams/ /seng ge bzhin du tha dad la/ /sems bsdus mnyam par bzhag byas shing / /kun nas 'dus par gyur pa ni/ /spu dag zing zhes byed pa yin/ /gang dag sa la gnas pa dang / /gang dag ri khrod gnas pa rnams/ /seng ge bzhin du tha

dad la/ /sems bsdus mnyam par bzhag byas shing / /kun nas 'dus gyur spu zing zhes/ /byed pa bdagis brjod par bya/ /yid byad dag cing rab dang la/ /rnyog med 'chi bdag spangs ba rnams/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mthar thug pa'i/ /

lha dang mi yi bar na 'khod/ /slob ma lnga brgya phrag gnyis dang / /gzhan yang brgya dang bcu dag dang / /stong phrag du ma rnams dag gi/ lha rnams 'dus par gyur pa dag /mtha' nas mtha' ma mi mthong zhing / /phyogs rnaMs tha~Md khyab gyur pa/ /

sangs rgyas kyis ni de mkhyen nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rnaMs gzigs te/ /de nas ston pas bstan dga' ba'i/ /nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag /lha tshogs mngon par lhags gyur kyis/ /nges par rtogs shes bka' stsal pa/ /

tshigasu bcad pas mthar chags kyis/ /de dag rnams kyi ming brjod kyis/ /rtse gcig gyur pa'i yid kyis ni/ /nga yi bshad pa mnyan par gyi/ /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal gyi/ /gnod sbyin stong phrag bdun po dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nag tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /

gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /

gser can stong phrag drug po kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang

ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnaMs/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshul du mngon par zhugs/ /shar phyogs rnam rgyal tshal gyi ni/ /ri mnyam stong phrag gsum po dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /

snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /

'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /de ltar stong phrag bcu drug kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnaMs dang / /de dag kyang ni

'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnaMs/ /dge slong rnaMs la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /gnod sbyin chu srin rgyal po'i khab/ /yangs pa la ni

rtag gnas shing / /brgya stong phrag ni mang po yi/ /gnod sbyin bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnaMs dang / /de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnaMs/ /

dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /kun gyi bshes gnyen lnga brgya dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po kun gyi lha/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de gnyis kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu phrul

ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnaMs/ /dge slong rnaMs la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /shar phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /dri za'i bdag

po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bya/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnaMs dang / /de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags

ldan rnaMs/ /dge slong rnaMs la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /de la bu ni mang yod de/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/ /lha dang lha

min g.yul 'gyed par/ /kun du gzhan gyis mi thub par/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnaMs dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la

phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /lho phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /

glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnaMs dang / /de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnaMs/ /dge slong rnaMs la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du

mngon par zhugs/ /de la bu ni mang yod de/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par/ /kun du gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /gang dag de

yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnaMs/ /dge slong rnaMs la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /nub phyogs

mngon par skyong byed pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnaMs dang / /de yang 'dus

pa'i nang du 'ongs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnaMs/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /de la bu ni mang yod de/ /brgyad bcu dang ni

bcu dang gcig /de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par/ /kun du gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /

rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /byang phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /

gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni lus ngan po zhes bya/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /

kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /de la bu ni mang yod de/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ /dbang po

zhes bya stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par/ /kun du gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnaMs dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan

rnams/ /dge slong rnaMs la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung / /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang / /byang phyogs na ni lus

ngan po/ /rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag /'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar byed/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnaMs dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan

zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /de dag gi ni khol po rnams/ /mchod rten mang la gnas bcas pa/ /slu byed g.yon can

sgyu ma can/ /sgyu ma shes dang rnaMs shes dang / /ngan spong khro gnyer lhan cig tu/ /de tshe rdzu 'phrul ston cing lhags/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /

kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon dang / dmag dpon 'di dag kyang der kun nas

lhags te/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang / /b+ha ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag /dbang ldan tsan dan 'dod gtso dang / /mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang / /spobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang / /sgra rab dang ni nye lnga dang / /ri mnyam gser can

gang po dang / /seng ldeng ba dang g.yon can dang / /gnod sbyin ba skyong 'brog gnas dang / /rgyal ba'i khyu mchog mi rgyal po/ /dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ /lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang / /tshigs lnga ser po yid dga' dang / /

gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas/ /'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum pa/ /'gro gnas ji snyed yod pa yin/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /

kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /lhan cig 'byung ba'i klu dang ni/ /'jog po dang ni yangs pa 'ang 'ongs/ /la ba dang ni mgyogs mchog

dag /srung byed 'gro dang lhan cig lhags/ /klu bdag bran bzang bu dang ni/ /yul 'khor srung dang glang po che/ /'jigs byed che dang sa srung bu/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i klu yang 'ongs/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /

de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnaMs/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /gang zhig klu rgyal zil mnan len/ /

stobs ldan mig rnon 'dab chags bya/ /de min 'dab bzang khra bo yang / /mkha' las tshal du mngon par 'ongs/ /de tshe klu rgyal mi 'jigs byin/ /ston pas 'dab bzang bde mdzad cing / /gsung 'jam brjod pa de nyid la/ /

sangs rgyas skyabasu nye bar song / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /

'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /lag na rdo rjes pham byas shing / /rgya mtshor rten pa'i lha min rnams/ /thaMd nor lhas skrag gyur cing / /mtsho la skyabasu 'du shes pa/ /thags zangs ris dang rab bkra dang / /

rab sim byed dang btang zung dang / /stobs ldan bu ni rgyal po kun/ /rnam snang byed pa'i bu rnams dang / /stobs ldan sde dang sgra gcan bzang / /dpa' chen khyod kyi dus lags shes/ /dge slong 'dus pa'i nags tshal du/ /go cha dgos

te lhags pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phruldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnam la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par

zhugs/ /chu lha mo dang bu mo dang / /zla ba mo yang phyi bzhin 'ongs/ /mdza' bshes ma dang chu lha can/ /lha mo grags ldan nyid kyang 'ongs/ /sa dang chu dang rlung gi dang / /me yi lha mo 'ang 'ongs gyur te/ /bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/ /kha dog

sna tshogs ldan pa dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nag tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnaMs/ /

dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /khyab 'jug lha dang gshol can lha/ /'tshe ma gnyis kyang lhags par gyur/ /zla la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis/ /zla ba nyid ni mdun du bdar/ /nyi la gnas

pa'i lha rnams kyis/ /nyi ma nyid kyang mdun bdar cing / /char pa 'bebs par byed pa dag /rgyu skar rnams kyis mdun bdar lags/ /thaMd bzang po rdo rje can/ /brgya byin khyer 'jig 'ongs gyur te/ /bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/ /

kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing

grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /lha mo tshogs can ma dang ni/ /me lce'i rtse 'dra 'chi ltas can/ /zhi ba mo dang dka' bzlog ma/ /me tog gos can 'ong

gyur cing / /rgyu ba mo dang mtshan mchings bzang / /'chi med rnam pa du ma dang / /gang zhig phyogs su char 'bebs pa/ /'dod lha'i dbyangs can ma yang 'ongs/ /bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /

ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong

rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /sngo bsangs sngo bsangs chen mo dang / /mi 'dra mi 'dra dam pa dang / /rtsed mos myos dang de bzhin du/ /yid khrug ma yang 'ongs gyur cing / /phag mo phag mo chen

mo dang / /slong ma nges ma lhan cig lhags/ /bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor
rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par

zhugs/ /dkar mo rgyags byed snying rje dang / /gos sngon mo yang 'ongs gyur cing / /skra dkar mo la sogs pa dang / /gos ser mo yang 'ongs par gyur/ /'phrog ma rtag tu myos pa dang / /spel ma rnams pa du ma dang / /

dag pa dang ni 'od can ma/ /lha mo grags ldan rnams kyang lhags/ /bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /

gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /

bde byed dga' ldan 'thab bral dang / /nag po btab pa du ma dang / /lum bi ni dang lum bi mchog /skar ma zhes bya legs smon dang / /'phrul dga' rnams dang de bzhin du/ /dbang bsgyur rnams kyang lhags par gyur/ /bcu

tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul

ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /lha tshogs drug bcu de dag kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /

ser skya'i gnas gyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan

rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong dag gi/ tshangs pa chen po zhes bya ba/ /kun bged gzhon nu skar rgyal de/ /so sor dbang

bsgyur dbang phyug bcu/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de dag dang / /lhan cig 'grogs te der lhags pa/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing

grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /dbang bsgyur byed pa'i 'phrog ma mo/ /kha dog gzugs mchog ldan pa yang / /bu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing / /

de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin 'ongs/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /

'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /dbang por bcas dang dbang ldan bcas/ /skye dgu'i bdag dang bcas pa yi/ /lha rnams de dag der lhags shing / /dge slong rnams kyang der lhags so/ /nag pos smras pa'i tshig la ltos/ /

'dod chags kyis ni 'di zung la/ /bcing ba gyis dang khyod la legs/ /'di dag kun nas yongs bsdus la/ /'di dag gson por ma btang zhes/ /de na nag po sde bo che/ /sde rnams la ni skul byed cing / /khros shing rang dbang

med gyur nas/ /rang yang mngon par zhugs gyur te/ /lag pa sa la brdabs nas ni/ /shin du 'jigs pa'i sgra phyung ste/ /de nas lha yis sprin phreng dang / /glog dang bcas pa'i char yang phab/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni de
mkhyen nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rnams gzigs te/ /de nas ston pas bstan dga' ba'i/ /nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag /bdud sde mngon par lhags gyur gyis/ /mngon par rtogs shes bka' stsal pa/ /

brtson par byed pa de dag gis/ /sangs rgyas gsungs pa thos nas ni/ /de dag spu yang mi g.yo bas/ /de dag chags bral yin par rtogs/ /rgyal sras nyan thos de dag ni/ /slob ma rnams dang lhan cig dga'/ /de dag g.yul

las rnam rgyal zhing / /'jigs bral grags dang ldan pa yin/ /bar gyi sdom ni/ bdun stong gser can ri mnyam dang / /de bzhin gnod sbyin chu srin dang / /kun gyi bshes dang rgyal po rnaMs/ /de bzhin khol po gnod sbyin dang / /

klu dang 'dab bzang lha min dang / /chu lha mo dang khyab 'jug dang / /tshogs can ma dang sngo bsangs dang / /dkar mo bde byed dbang phyug dang / /kun bged gzhon dang 'phrog ma dang / /dbang bcas bdud dang dge slong ngo / /

de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha shin du dbang che bar grags pa rnams mdo sde bstan pas yid rangs par gyur nas de'i tshe tshig 'di dag gis 'dus pa chen po'i mdo bshad do/ /bac+do~Ms bdag cag gis kyang tshig 'di dag

gis mdo sde 'di yang dag par bsnyad par bgyi zhing yang dag par brjod par bgyi lags so/ /de la gzung sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lagaso/ /tad+ya thA/ te dze te dza ba ti/ tsid tre tsid tra ba ti/ la te la ta ba ti/ kha me kha ma ba ti/ k+She me k+Sha ma ba ti/ b+ha dre b+ha dra ba ti/ ya she

ya sha ba ti/ dU te dU ta ba ti/ tsa pa le tsa pa la ba ti/ kha tse kha tsa ba ti/ bac+doMs 'di dag ni gnas gtsang ma pa rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams lags te/ bac+doMs gang zhig mdo sde 'di dang / gsang sngags kyi

tshig 'di dag rmongs pa ma mchis par 'dzin par bgyid na 'di ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byung po tha~Md las bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lagaso/ /'byung po tha~Md kyang dga' bar 'gyur lagaso/ /de la bro nad tha~Md kyis

mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so/ /gang du klog pa der dge bar 'gyur zhing de dag la dgung lo bdun du bsrung ba bgyis par yang 'gyur lagaso/ /ji tsam 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de tsam gyis dgung char 'bab par yang

'gyur/ 'chad par yang 'gyur/ dgung ser 'bab par yang 'gyur/ 'chad par yang 'gyur lagaso/ /bro nad tha~Md la byab pa bgyis sam/ chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te stsal na/ des de'i bro nad tha~Md rab tu zhi

bar 'gyur lagaso/ /de nas bac+doMs la tshangs pas gsol pa/ bac+doMs gnas gtsang ma pa dag ma gtogs pa gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i ris gong ma rnaMs kyi rig sngags kyang 'di dag lags la/ gsang sngags kyi cho ga

zhib mo yang 'di dag lags so/ /'di ni 'dir mdo sde yongasu 'dzin par bgyid pa lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ b+ha le b+ha la ma le/ du ra du le/ hi me/ phu ba phe se/ kA tsAk+Shi ku tse si/ ma mi Ni She re tho ra Ni/ bam phi bam pho Ti ste ke /

ta ra ke/ gu ru ga ro/ gu ga gu mi Ti/ tA re rak+Sha/ sU tra ma nu pA la ya tha/ 'di ni bdag cag gi rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo lags te/ gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di dang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dum bur ma gyur par 'dzin

tam/ klog par bgyid na de la mi dang / mi ma lags pa dag mchi bar mi 'gyur zhing gdug pa yang mi mchi/ sbrul yang mi mchi/ dug kyang mi mchi la/ de'i lus la gnod pa dag gis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so/ /'byung po

tha~Md kyang dga' bar 'gyur lagaso/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byung po tha~Md las bsrung ba bgyis par yang 'gyur lagaso/ /gang klog par bgyid pa dang / gang nyan par bgyid pa de la gung lo bdun du bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur

lags so/ /chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor tam/ 'tshal du stsal na/ de'i bro nad tha~Md nye bar zhi bar 'gyur lagaso/ /de nas bac+doMs la 'dod pa'i bdag po tha~Md kyis gsol pa/ bac+doMs 'di ni bdag cag gi yul

yang lags te/ mdo sde 'di yongasu gzung ba'i rig sngags ni 'di lagaso/ /tad+ya thA/ lin te/ li pe/ lo pe/ ba pe/ pad ke ka me/ kA tse kA tsA k+Shi/ kA tsa pi ga le/ du me du me/ ta Te tad tra Te/ tra TA k+Shi/ go la/ ki li/ ki ka ko li

ke swA d+hU/ sU tra ma nu pA la ya tha/ ud gr-ih+Na ya tse ti/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang / mdo sde legs par gsungs pa 'di dum bur ma gyur pa dang / mnyam par bzung ste bsrung bar bgyid

na de ni tha~Md las bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lagaso/ /'byung po tha~Md kyang dga' bar 'gyur lagaso/ /ji tsam 'tshal bar de tsam gyi dgung char 'beb par yang 'gyur/ 'chad par yang 'gyur/ dgung ser 'bab par yang 'gyur/
'chad par yang 'gyur lags so/ /'byung po dang gdon rnams las yongasu thar bar yang 'gyur lags so/ /dug 'byin par yang 'gyur lags so/ /chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor

tam 'tshal du stsal na des bro nad tha~Md nye bar zhi bar 'gyur lagaso/ /de nas bac+doMs la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bac+doMs bdag cag gi rig sngags 'di yang de bzhin du mdo sde 'di yongasu 'dzin
par bgyid cing / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha gong ma rnams kyis ni rjesu yi rang bar bgyis la/ 'og ma rnams kyis kyang legs par rjesu yi rang bar bgyis pa lagaso/ /tad ya thA/ bI re bI ra ba ti/

to Te to Ta ba ti/ b+ha dre b+ha dra ba ti/ go n-i go na ba ti/ me g+he me g+ha pa ti/ dz+wa la ne dz+wa la na pa ti/ b+hu ti b+hu ta pa ti/ kho ra te kho ra ta pa ti/ i dan sU tra ma nu gra N+ha Tha/ a nu pA la ya tha tse ti/ bac+doMs gang zhig mdo

sde 'di dang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dum bur ma gyur par 'dzin par bgyid na de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byung po tha~Md las bsrung bar bgyid par 'gyur lagaso/ /de la mi dang mi ma lags pa 'ga' yang 'tshe bar
mi 'gyur lags so/ /gang du klog pa der ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung ba bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /sems can tha~Md kyang dga' bar 'gyur lagaso/ /de la zil gyis gnon pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi
'gyur lags so/ /de'i lus la bro nad rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lagaso/ /sems can tha~Md la phan 'dogs par yang 'gyur lagaso/ /gang du klogs par 'gyur ba der dgung lo bdun du bsrung
ba bgyis par 'gyuro/ /'byung po dang gdon rnams las thar bar yang 'gyur lags so/ /dug 'joms par yang 'gyur lagaso/ /bro nad tha~Md sel bar yang 'gyur lagaso/ /skud pa'aM chab la bzlas
brjod bgyis te bcings sam gtor na bro nad tha~Md dang bral bar yang 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bac+do~Ms la rgyal po chen po bzhis gsol pa/ bac+do~Ms bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rig sngags
'di yang mdo sde 'di yongasu 'dzin cing grub par bgyid pa lagaso/ /rnam thos kyi bus gsol pa/ tad+ya thA/ ku re bu ra NI/ mo re mo ra NI/ kA tse kA tsa NI/ kri mi kri mi ni/ yul 'khor srung gis
gsol pa/ pu re po re pu ra tI/ ho re ho ra NI/ pra ho re pra ho ra NI/ 'phags skyes pos gsol pa/ ke she ke she ba ti/ ka sha na mi ke/ sha The ti The ni ma ri ti/ mig mi bzang gis gsol pa/

tsakre tsakri Ni/ tsakra ba gi Ni/ b+hi ti rirmi ni/ shi mi shi m-i/ sha ma ne ti/ bac+doMs gang zhig rgyal po chen po bzhis brjod pa'i rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di bzhi dang / mdo sde 'di dum bur ma gyur pa

dang / ma bkol bar legs par bzung ste bsrung bar bgyid na/ de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lagaso/ /de la 'byung po tha~Md dang / bro nad tha~Md kyang slar ldog par 'gyur lagaso/ /
gdug pas zin pa dang / dug tha~Md las kyang thar bar 'gyur lags so/ /skud pa 'am/ chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te/ bcings sam/ gtor cing 'tshal du stsal na/ cho ga des de la 'grub
par 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bac+do~Ms la lha ma yin dang / rlung lhas gsol pa/ bac+do~Ms bdag cag gi rig sngags 'di yang yongasu 'dzin par bgyid pa lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ ga le ga ga

ga le/ ga le ga ni/ khi ni khi ni/ g+hu She g+hu She g+hu g+hu Sh+ya/ kha na kha kha ne/ kha na kha ni/ lu pe lu pi/ lu pa lu pi ti/ bac+doMs gsang sngags 'di dag dang / mdo sde 'di dum bur ma gyur cing / ma bkol bar

bzung na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung bar 'gyur lagaso/ /de'i bro nad tha~Md kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lagaso/ /lus la dug gis mi tshugs par yang 'gyur lagaso/ /de nas bac+do~Ms la gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha

rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa mdo sde 'di'i dgongs pa yongasu gzung ba'i slad du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas lhags pa rnams kyis rig sngags dag smras lags na/ bac+do~Ms nyan thos kyi tshogs

dang bcas pas kyang yang dag par rjesu yi rang bar mdzad cing / kun du gzung ba dang / bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dag legs par bshad du gsol/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu de dag gi sbyin par bgyi ba'i chos kyi mdo sde 'di 'bras bu dang

bcas par 'gyur lagaso/ /de nas bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyis gsang sngags kun du bzung ba 'di ni grub pa yin te/ nga nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas kyang mdo sde 'di'i grub pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsgrub

pa dag bshad par byas/ de nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/ /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bac+doMs de bzhin lags te/ bac+doMs nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas mdo chen po 'di grub par bgyi ba'i slad du bsrung

ba dang / bsgrub pa dag bshad du gsol/ de nas bac+doMs kyis mdo sde 'di grub par bya ba'i phyir bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dag bka' stsal pa/ de la rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/ /ta la ta la/ ta na ta la/

ta to ta le ma te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/ /sa les sa li ti/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/ /la te la te lo la te/ dgra bcom pa rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/ /d+hu pu d+hu pu/

d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ka tsa bi ka tsi/ ka tsa bi ka tsa ti/ de nas bac+doMs kyis grub pa ni 'di yin no/ /d+ha me d+ha me/ d+ha me d+ha me/ d+ha se d+ha se/ d+ha re d+ha d+ha re/ d+ha ro d+hi d+hi ti/ de la bsrung ba ni 'di yin no/ /ti na ti ri tsa ri Sha / bing+ga la k+Shi rak+Sha/ mtshams

bcad pa'i ni 'di yin no/ /bad d+ha bad d+ho ti/ bad d+ha si ri mi ti/ bad d+ha ku Sha bad d+ha/ g+hu g+hu She bad d+ha/ g+hu Sha ga She ya~M bad d+ha b+hi/ bsgrub pa ni 'di yin no/ /bi She sA d+ha ya/ tu tu le sA d+ha ye ti/ zhag gsum smyung ba byas pas tshes

bcwa lnga'i nyin par gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang / mdo sde 'dis bac+doMs la mchod par byas te/ kha shar phyogasu bltas la bsrung ba lan brgya brjod par bya zhing / bzlas brjod lan brgya byas la/ mdud pa re re pa brgya

rtsa brgyad byas na bsrung ba byas pa yin zhing / lan gsum spu zing zhes byed par yang 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/ /zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis la bac+doMs la mchod pa byas

la skud pa de lag tu blangs te bzlas shing mtshams bcad par byas te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod cing mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas te mtshams gcod par byed na lan bdun spu zing zhes byed par yang 'gyuro/ /lho phyogs

nas ce spyang mos lan gsum sgra phyung ste 'dug par gyur na/ de nas mtshams bcad par shes par bya'o/ /des de bzhin du smyung ba byas te/ tshes bcwa lnga'i nyin par khrus byas la/ bac+do~Ms la mchod pa byas ste/ skud pa blangs

la/ nyan thos kyi tshig rnams dang / bac+doMs kyi cho ga zhib mos lan bdun bzlas te/ bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod cing mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/ skud pa lag tu blangs te/ rig sngags tha~Md lan cig bzlas

brjod byas shing sgrub pa byas na char pa chen po dang / rlung chen po yang 'byung ste/ mtshams kyi phyi rol du ldang zhing 'bab par 'gyur la/ skad cig gis chad par yang 'gyur te/ lan bdun gyi bar du yang brjod par bya'o/ /de nas lha'i

bu sprin chen zhes bya ba dang / sprin bzang shes bya ba gnyis 'ongs te/ de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing grub pa sbyin pa dang / rjesu yi rang bar yang 'gyuro/ /de la grub pa ni 'di dag yin te/ ku cu ku tsa zhes bya'o/ /sprin bzang

kyi ni 'di yin te/ ka ra ka ra kA ra ra zhes bya'o/ /tshig 'di dag dang skud pa lag tu blangs pas mdo sde dang / gsang sngags rnams bsams na gang bya bar 'dod pa de dag thams cad byed par 'gyuro/ /bac+doMs kyi mdo sde dang /

rig sngags 'di dag tha~Md kyis chu 'am skud pa la bzlas na gang byed par mi 'gyur ba de med de/ las tha~Md 'grub par 'gyuro/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag dang / gzhan dag bsrung ba'i phyir mdo sde 'di bzung bar bya'o/ /bac+doMs

kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing / /sa dang bar snang dag la 'khod pa rnaMs/ /

skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byas cing / /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /mdo chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA bar ma dang /

zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ A TA nA TI ya ma sU trA na nA ma ma hA ya sU tra/ bod skad du/ mdo chen po kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun du rgyu ba ma
yin pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa du cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun

dga' ra ba na bzhugaso/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu kha dog 'phags pa/ g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma

dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang / bac+doMs ga la ba der song te phyin nas bac+doMs kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dugo/ de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnaMs

thos kyi bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal tha~Md snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /rkang gnyis

dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /blo ldan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ /lha rnams kyis ni de ma 'tshal/ /dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshalo/ /sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang / /da ltar byung dang ma byon pa/ /thams
cad la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /khyod la 'ang bdag ni skyabasu mchis/ /btsun pa bac+doMs kyis nyan thos kyi dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon
pa dang / nags 'dab dag dang / bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/ de la gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bac+doMs kyi gsung rab la mngon
par dad pa dag dang mngon par ma dad pa dag kyang mchis te/ gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bac+doMs kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa de dag ni shin du nyung la/
gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bac+doMs kyi gsung rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni ches mang lags te/ btsun pa bac+doMs kyi nyan thos dge slong rnams dang /
dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags

pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bgyi ba dang / mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar zhing 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du kun du rgyu ba kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang /
bsrung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher 'dzin cing / kun chub par bgyid na legs so/ legs so zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnaM
thos kyi bu la cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag

'tshal te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / bsrung ba dang / rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher gsol to/ /

skye bo gang dag gtong phod cing / /phra ma ma mchi ser sna bral/ /gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pas/ /mi de rnams kyi rnyed pa lags/ /gang gi 'char la brten nas ni/ /des na nyin mor brjod pa yi/ /

nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can/ /nyi gdugs gang 'char 'gyur ba yi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi/ /

de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /dri za rnams kyis yongs bskor cing / /dri za rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming
'thun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun du gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i
gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su

gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs

ldan ba/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /gang na yi dgas

zhes bgyi ba/ /rgyab kyi sha 'tshal phra ma can/ /srog gcod bgyid pa ma rungs pa/ /'jungs shing mi snyan smra bgyid pa'i/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /grul bum
bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /grul bum rnams kyis yongs bskor cing / /grul bum rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /
de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad bcu dang n-i bcu dang gcig /de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun du gzhan gyis mi 'thun lags/ /
de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /

rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol

gcig /gau gtam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar lho yi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /

rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /gang zhig nub pa kho na las/ /des na mtshan mor brjod pa yi/ /nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can/ /nyi gdugs gang du nub 'gyur ba/ /de na mtsho chen zab mo ni/ /shin du 'da' bar

dka' ba ste/ /de ni chu sngon rgya mtsho zhes/ /skye bos rtogs pa mchis pa yi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi/ /

de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing / /klu rnams kyis ni mdun gyis ltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag mi 'thun grags

pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun du gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyi rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes
khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigasu gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /

de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam khyod la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar

nub kyi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid cing / /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /gang na byang gi sgra mi snyan/ /dga' zhing lhun chen lta mdzes dang / /gang na

mi rnams tshe lo ni/ /brgya phrag bcu pa skye 'gyur zhing / /de dag mi rmo mi 'debs la/ /gshol yang 'cha' bar mi bgyid cing / /tshe ring mdog dang ldan pa dang / /nges par yongasu spyod bgyid cing / /zasu sA lu kha dog dang / /

dri dang ro dang ldan pa dang / /dri bda' me tog tshogs 'dra zhing / /lha yi bdud tsi 'dra ba 'tshal/ /na li ke ra bskol bgyis nas/ /tshod mar de 'tshal sran tshod min/ /gang na me lce'i rtse 'dra ba'i/ /sman dag 'khrung bar

'gyur ba yi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po te/ /ming ni lus ngan po zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyi rtag tu rtse/ /gnod sbyin rnaMs

kyis yongs bskor cing / /gnod sbyin rnams kyi mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis ste/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag mi 'thun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min
g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun du gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal
zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigasu gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag

ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni/ /bzang

ba la shes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung / /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang / /

byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/ /rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag /'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid/ /rgyal po dag gi mngag gzhug pa/ /

gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams/ /de dag glang po che 'tshal zhing / /phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyu/ /de dag ni chibs rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang /

bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma la 'tshal zhing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/ /glang po che gcig gis shing rta drang shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lagaso/ /chibs

rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma gcig gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags

so/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che'i/ /gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams/ /bzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid/ /rgyal po dag ni grong khyer dag /sna tshogs mkha' la rgyu ba mchis/ /

'di lta ste/ kun du rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / sa la kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / gar bcas sa sting kun tu rgyu ba dang / sbubs can dang grong khyer sbubs can zhes bgyi ba dag lags so/ /byang phyogs
na mtsho ka pi bang ka zhes bgyi ba yang mchis lags so/ /nub phyogs na grong khyer sar pa gsar ldan dang / gos can dang / gos mchog can dang / pad ma can dang / pad ma bzang po can dang / sa gzhi can

zhes bgyi ba dag kyang mchi lags so/ /chab rgyun mang po'i gnas gyur pa/ /'dzin pa zhes bgyi'i mtsho mchis te/ /chab rgyun tha dad de las byung / /de las dgung char 'bab par 'gyur/ /btsun pa grong khyer

u sha ra'i sbubs kyi pha rol na/ lus gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang / /de bas gnas yang rgyun lugs can/ /rgyun lugs mang dang de bas mang / /bar snang mkha' la bya ltar gda'/ /btsun pa grong khyer sbubs can gyi

pha rol byang phyogs na mdun sa bya gar can zhes bgyi ba de mchis te/ der ni gnod sbyin rnams 'du zhing gnas lags so/ /rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phyangs dang / /'jigs rung lto sbu can dag mchis/ /de na ljon

shing 'bras bu rtags/ /rma bya khrung khrung sgra snyan dang / /khu byug sgra skad chen po dang / /shang shang de'u dag sgra 'byin cing / /rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag kyang / /gau'u kum b+ha dang chun lag dang / /bya rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin

cing / /me tog sbrang rtsi'i ro la dga'/ /lus ngan po de glu gar gyis/ /pad ma can dang lhan cig rtse/ /btsun pa grong khyer lcang lo can gyi pha rol na rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bgyi ba yul 'khor mu khyud na mchis lags so/ /

bdag gang na mchis pa'i mdun sa de ni khyu mchog can zhes bgyi ste/ bdagis ming ni rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ i li mi li i li mi

li/ kid Ti mU le/ hi li kid Ti mU le/ hu du me/ hu dur du me/ gau ri/ gan d+ha ri/ go do ha ni/ o ke mo ke swA hA/ btsun pa bac+doMs kyis spyan sngar bdagis dri za rnams dang / dri za chen po rnams dang / dri za'i sde dpon

rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ 'dod myos dga' bas myos pa dang / /glu yi myos pa spun dang ni/ /phreng bas myos dang sbrang rtsis myos/ /me tog myos pa spun

rnams dang / /rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos/ /nor gyis myos dang dga' byed dang / /ud pal pad ma zla ba dang / /lnga 'dzin dang ni khu byug sgra/ /tu bu ru dang gtsug lnga dang / /gser spyod bu mo gser can dang / /

pa ba sangs dang phur bu dag /'gro gnas ji snyed rgyal po lags/ /de dag bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag dri za 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/ /dri za 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/ /
bdag la 'tshe ba'i dri za dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i dri za yis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ /a dza ka yi dog pa bzhin/ /de yi mgo tshal bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag

lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ kun tu le/ kun tu le/ kun tu le/ kun tu le/ e hi/ e hi/ sa dA mad ti ke/ sa dA b+haN Ti ni ke/ tiSh+Tha duSh+Ta bad d+ho si swA hA/ tsun pa bac+doMs kyis nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'aM/

dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ /rig sngags dang / bsrung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung

mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te dri za 'am/ dri za mo 'am/ dri za rgan po 'am/ dri za rgan mo 'am/ dri za'i bu pho 'am/ dri za'i bu mo 'am/ dri za'i 'khor pho 'am/ dri za'i 'khor mo 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhugs

pa 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glag mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ dri za rnams kyis

dri za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa bac+doMs kyi nyan thos dge slong

ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / bsrung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur

ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par rgyud pa de la/ gal te sha za 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ sha za rgan po 'am/ sha za rgan mo 'am/ sha za'i bu pho 'am/ sha za'i bu mo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor pho 'am/ sha za'i 'khor

mo 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glag 'tsho ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing

gnas mi rnyed la/ sha za rnams kyi sha za 'du ba'i nang du mcher mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la

gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ hu me hu me/ hu me le/ hu mi la bA te ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis grul bum rnams dang / grul bum chen po rnams dang /
grul bum gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ byin dang nye byin kri mi sha /rtsibs lobs che dang gsus po che/ /lag bcu dang ni sa la rgyu/ /g.yon

phyogs nag po dmar po dang / /sprin mdog dang ni dri med dang / /rna ba ring dang 'brug sgra sgrogs/ /ral pa can dang stobs bcu dang / /srid sgrub dang ni 'dod dgur mchi/ /'jog po dang ni bya ba sbed/ /la ba bzang
ldan gsum po dang / /tshon kun dang ni mig bkra po/ /'gro gnas ji snyed mchi ba lags/ /de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag grul bum 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/ /grul bum 'di ni bdag
mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i grul bum dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i grul bum gyis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ /ardza ka'i rdog pa bzhin/ /

de mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lagaso/ /tad+ya thA/ si le bi si re/ si re bi sa re/ kriSh+Na tsha ga le/ ka rA Di/ piM ga le swA hA/ btsun pa bac+doMs kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/
dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / bsrung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar
'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te grul bum 'am/ grul bum mo 'am/ grul bum rgan po 'am/ grul bum rgan mo 'am/ grul bum gyi bu pho 'am/ grul bum gyi bu
mo 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor pho 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor mo 'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig

nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ grul bum rnams kyi grul bum 'dus ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo
can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa bac+doMs kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/
dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / bsrung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung
mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te yi dgas sam/ yi dgas mo 'am/ yi dgas rgan po 'am/ yi dgas rgan mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi bu pho 'am/ yi dgas kyi bu mo 'am/ yi dgas
kyi 'khor pho'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi mngag gzhug ma 'am/ yi dgas kyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing

nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ yi dgas rnams kyi yi dgas 'dus ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/
de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ yu me yu me/ yu mi li/ yu mi la bA ti ye swA hA/ btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis klu rnams dang / klu chen po rnams dang / klu'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ dga' dang nye

dga' kun dga' dang / /nor rgyal dang ni 'dzam bu bzang / /ser po dang ni zho rna dang / /dbang po lag dang bkra shis dang / /mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral/ /rab grol dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag /ngos yang po
dang ngos bkra dang / /yang pa can dang bkra 'dud rgyal/ /gdengs ka che dang skar dga' dang / /nag po che dang lag 'gro dang / /ra skyong dang ni 'jog po dang / /g.yon phyogs de bzhin nag po dang / /
sngo bsangs dkar dang 'grogs pa ni/ /'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/ /de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te de dag la bdag klu 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/ /klu 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes
mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i klu dag dang / bdag mi gtong ba'i klu rnams kyis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ /ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin/ /de'i go

tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ tsi li bi li li tsi li bi tsi li/ gau ri/ gan d+ha ri/ ma ta~M gi/ tsaN Da li swA hA/ btsun pa bac+doMs kyi nyan thos dge
slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / bsrung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag

'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ klu rgan po 'am/ klu rgan mo 'am/ klu'i bu pho 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ klu'i 'khor pho 'am/ klu'i

'khor mo 'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar 'chi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing

gnas mi rnyed la/ klu rnams kyi klu 'du ba'i nang mcher mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa bac+doMs

kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun du rgyu ba dang / kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / bsrung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa
la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur bar 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te lus srul po 'am/ lus srul mo 'am/ lus srul rgan po 'am/ lus srul rgan mo'am/ lus srul po'i bu pho'aM/
lus srul po'i bu mo 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor pho 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor mo 'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing

glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ lus srul po rnams kyi lus srul po 'du ba'i nang du mcher mi chud cing rgyal po'i
pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ a be ba ha na

ti ye swA hA/ btsun pa bac+doMs kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/

dbang po zla ba chu lha dang / /b+ha ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag /dbang ldan tsan dan 'dod gtso dang / /mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang / /stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang / /sgra rab dang ni nyer lnga dang / /ri mnyam gser can gang

po dang / /seng ldeng ba dang g.yon can dang / /gnod sbyin ba skyong 'brog gnas dang / /rgyal ba khyu mchog mi rgyal po/ /dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ /lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang / /tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang / /
gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas/ /'bras bu gsum pa mgul gsum pa/ /'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/ /de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te de dag la bdag gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/ /

gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la bdag go bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i gnod sbyin dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ /ardza

ka'i dog pa bzhin/ /de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ hi le mi le/ hi le mi le/ kIr ti mU li/ hi le kIr ti mU le/ o tum be tum be/ o tum be/

tum be/ o g+he mo g+he/ go de he/ b+h+ri~M g+ha re/ ri She sad ta me swA hA/ btsun pa bac+doMs kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'aM/ dge bsnyen naM/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i

mdo/ rig sngags dang / bsrung ba dang / sug pa da rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am/ gnod sbyin

rgan po 'am/ gnod sbyin rgan mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug pa'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngagazhug

ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar bgreng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi

chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa bac+doMs kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/

dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa

de la/ gal te srin po 'am/ srin mo 'am/ srin po rgan po 'am/ srin po rgan mo 'am/ srin po'i bu pho 'am/ srin po'i bu mo'aM/ srin po'i 'khor pho 'am/ srin po'i 'khor mo 'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/

srin po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ srin po rnams kyi srin

po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lagaso/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/

hu lu hu lu/ yu me yu me le/ yu mi la bA ti ye swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa

rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher brjod nas bac+doMs kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bac+doMs 'das kyi de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi

gtso la gdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas kyang bac+doMs 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mdang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu kha dog 'phags pa/ g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin

brgya phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dung / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa/ nam sros pa dang / nga ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs

gcig tu 'dug go/ de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal tha~Md snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa

'di dag gsol to/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogasangs rgyas/ /blo ldan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ /lha rnams kyi ni de ma 'tshal/ /dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang / /da ltar byung dang ma byon pa/ /

tha~Md la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /khyod la'ang bdag ni skyabasu mchi/ /btsun pa bac+doMs kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'aM/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon pa dag dang / nags 'dab dag dang / bas

mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/ de na gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bac+doMs 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag dang / mngon par ma dad pa dag kyang mchis te/ gnod sbyin dang mi ma

lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa de dag ni shin du nyung la/ gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bac+doMs 'das

kyi gsung rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni ches mang lags te/ btsun pa bac+doMs kyi nyan thos dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang /

bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bgyi ba dang / mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar zhing phel

bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid brgya cher 'dzin cing kun chub par bgyid na

legaso legaso zhes gsol pa dang / dge slong dag nges rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus ngas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ nga'i zhabs

la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ nga'i spyan sngar kun du rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher gsol to/ /skye bo gang dag stong phod

cing / /phra ma mi mchi ser sna bral/ /gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa/ /mi de rnams kyis rnyed pa lags/ /gang gi 'char la brten nas ni/ /des na nyin mor brjod pa yi/ /nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can/ /nyi gdugs

gang nas 'char 'gyur ba'i/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyi rtag tu rtse/ /

dri za rnams kyis yongs bskor cing / /dri za rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang
lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun du gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag

'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigasu gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di

skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau gtam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags shes skye bo

mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /gang na yi dgas zhes bgyi ba/ /rgyab kyi sha 'tshal phra ma can/ /srog gcod bgyid pa ma rungs pa/ /'jungs shing mi snyan smra bgyid pa'i/ /

phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyi rtag tu rtse/ /grul bum rnams kyi yongs

bskor cing / /grul bum rnams kyi mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig / de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed

pa/ /kun du gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag

bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigasu gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa

rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau gtam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar lho yi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de

mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /gang zhig nub pa kho na las/ /de la mtshan mor brjod pa yi/ /nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can/ /nyi gdugs gang du nub 'gyur ba/ /de na mtsho chen

zab mo 'di/ /shin du 'da' bar dka' ba ste/ /de ni chu mngon rgya mtsho zhes/ /skye bos rtogs pa mchis pa yi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni

mig mi bzang zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing / /klu rnams kyis ni mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang cig /

de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun du gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyi rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong

nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigasu gsol/ /khyod la mi min

phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sang+yas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /

de ltar nub kyi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /gang na byang gi sgra mi snyan/ /dga' zhing lhun chen blta mdzes dang / /

gang na mi rnams tshe lo ni/ /brgya phrag bcu pa skye 'gyur zhing / /de dag mi rmo mi 'debs la/ /gshol yang 'cha' bar mi bgyid cing / /tshe ring mdog dang ldan pa dang / /nges par yongasu spyod bgyid cing / /zasu sA

lu kha dog dang / /dri dang ro dang ldan pa dang / /dri gda' me tog tshogs 'dra zhing / /lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba tshal/ /na li ke ra bskol bgyis na/ /tshod mar de 'tshal sran tshod min/ /gang na me lce rtse 'dra ba'i/ /sman

dag 'khrung bar 'gyur ba yi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni lus ngan po zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar
gyis rtag tu rtse/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor cing / /gnod sbyin rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis ste/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ /
dbang po zhes bgyis stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes
bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yi phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la
mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /

mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar byang phyi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor sru~M/ /

lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang / /byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/ /rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag /'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che/ /phyogs bzhi

dag ni skyong bar bgyid/ /rgyal po dag gi mngag gzhug pa/ /gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams/ /de dag glang po che 'tshal zhing / /phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyu/ /de dag ni chibs rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog

dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma la 'tshal zhing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/ /glang po che gcig gis shing rta drangs phyogs

phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/ /chibs rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma gcig gis shing rta drangs shing
phyogs phyogs dag du yang mchi lags so/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che/ /gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchu ba rnams/ /bzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid/ /rgyal po dag ni

grong khyer dag /sna tshogs mkha' la rgyu ba mchis/ /'di lta ste/ kun tu rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / sa la kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / gar bcas sa steng kun du rgyu ba dang / sbubs can dang / grong
khyer sbubs can zhes bgyi ba dag lags so/ /byang phyogs na mtsho ka pi bang ka zhes bgyi ba dag mchis lags so/ /nub phyogs na grong khyer sar pa gser ldan dang / gos can dang / gos mchog

can dang / pad ma can dang / pad ma bzang po can dang / sa gzhi can zhes bgyi ba dag mchis lags so/ /chab rgyun mang po'i gnas gyur pa/ /'dzin pa zhes bgyi'i mtsho mchis te/ /chab rgyun tha dad de las
'byung / /de las dgung char 'bab par 'gyur/ /btsun pa grong khyer u shi ra'i sbubs kyi pha rol na/ lus gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang / /de bas gnas yang rgyun lugs can/ /rgyun lugs mang dang de bas
mang / /bar snang mkha' la bya bltar gda'/ /btsun pa grong khyer sbubs can gyis pha rol byang phyogs na mdun sa bya gar can zhes bgyi ba yang mchis ste/ der ni gnod sbyin rnams 'du shing gnas lags

so/ /rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phyangs dang / /'jigs rung lto spu can dag mchis/ /de na ljon shing 'bras bu rtag /rma bya khrung khrung sgra snyan dang / /khu byug sgra skad chen po dang / /shang shang te'u dag sgra 'byin cing / /

rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag dang / /kau kum b+ha dang chun lag dang / /bya rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin cing / /me tog sbrang rtsi'i ro la dga'/ /lus ngan po de glu gar gyis/ /pad ma can dang lhan cig rtse/ /btsun pa grong

khyer lcang lo can gyi pha rol na rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bgyi ba yul 'khor mu khyud na mchis lags so/ /bdag gang na mchis pa'i mdun sa de ni khyu mchog can zhes bgyi ste/ bdagis ming ni rnam thos kyi bu zhes

bgyi lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lagaso/ /tad+ya thA/ i li mi li i li mi li/ kid Ti mU le/ hi li kid Ti mU le/ hu du me hu du ra du me/ gau ri/ gan d+ha ri/ go do ha ni/ o ke mo ke swA hA/

btsun pa bac+doMs kyi spyan sngar bdag gis dri za rnams dang / dri za chen po rnams dang / dri za'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ 'dod mos dga' bas myos

pa dang / /klu yis myos pa spun dang ni/ /phreng bas myos dang sbrang rtsis myos/ /me tog myos pa spun rnams dang / /rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos/ /nor gyis myos dang dga' byed dang / /ud pal zla ba pad ma dang / /lnga 'dzin

dang ni khu byug sgra/ /tum bu ru dang gtsug lnga dang / /gser spyod bu mo gser can dang / /pa ba sangs dang phur bu dag /'gro gnas ji snyed rgyal po lags/ /de dag ni bdag gis spun lags te/ de dag la bdag dri za 'di bdag

la 'tshe'o/ /dri za 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i dri za dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i dri za yis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ /ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin/ /de'i mgo

tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ kun tu le/ kun tu le/ kun tu le/ kun tu le/ e hi e hi/ sa dA mad ti ke/ sa dA b+haN Ti ni ke/ tiSh+Tha duSh+Tha bad d+ho si swA hA/ btsun pa bac+doMs ldan 'das

kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ /rig sngags dang / bsrung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar

'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te dri za 'am/ dri za mo 'am/ dri za rgan po 'am/ dri za rgan mo 'am/ dri za'i bu pho 'am/ dri za'i bu mo 'am/ dri za'i 'khor pho 'am/ dri za'i 'khor mo 'am/ dri za'i

mngag gzhug pa 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags 'tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchi bar gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ dri za rnaMs

kyi dri za 'du ba'i nang du mcher mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lagaso/ /btsun pa bac+doMs kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/

dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la/ kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par

bgyid pa de la/ gal te sha za 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ sha za rgan po 'am/ sha za rgan mo 'am/ sha za'i bu pho 'am/ sha za'i bu mo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor pho 'am/ sha za'i 'khor mo 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ sha

za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing / gnas mi rnyed la/ sha za rnams kyi sha za
