su bi ni sh+ci ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te sa~M myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta a yur pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM ska ra pa ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa

b+ha ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na de sems can dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du

nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur de nam du yang mi khom par skye bar mi 'gyur te/ gang dang gang du skye ba thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nya na su bi ni sh+ci ta te rA dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya

a ra ha te sa~M myag saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ra mi ta a yur pu N+ye dz+nya na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM ska ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri ba re swA hA/

gang la la zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na des chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong 'drir 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ra mi ta a yur dz+nya na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te

dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te sa~M myaka sa~M bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ra mi ta a yur pu N+ye dz+nya na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM ska ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA

re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na des chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong byed du bcug pa dang rab tu gnas par byas pa yin no/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ra mi ta a yur

dz+nya na su bi ni sh+ci ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te sa~M myaka sa~M bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ra mi ta a yur pu N+ye dz+nya na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM ska ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+he ma hA/

na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na de'i mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta

A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+ci ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te sa~M myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta a yur pu N+ye dz+nya na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA

ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na de'i sdig pa'i phung po ri rab tsam yang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ra

mi ta a yur dz+nya na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te sa~M myaka sa~M bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta a yur pu N+ye dz+nya na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM ska ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te

swa b+ha ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na de la bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang gnod sbyin dang srin pos glags bltas kyang glags rnyed par mi

'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM bud+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra

pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus

mngon sum du lung ston pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas stong gis de la phyag rkyong bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mdzad par 'gyur te 'di la the tshom dang som nyi dang yid gnyis ma za shig /oM na mo b+ha ga

ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta a yur pu N+ye dz+nyA na sa~M b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga

na sa mud ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na rgyal po chen po bzhi de'i phyi bzhin 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sbed

pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+ci ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM

sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na de de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu

med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye

pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ sa phyogs gang du mdo sde 'di 'dri ba'i sa phyogs de yang mchod rten du

'gyur te phyag bya bar yang 'os par 'gyur ro/ /byol song gi skye gnas su song ba dang bya dang ri dgas gang dag gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang

rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+ci ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri

shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma ha na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na de bud med kyi lus su nam yang skye bar mi

'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta a yur pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri

shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir kAr sha pa Ni gcig sbyin pa byin na/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin

po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin par 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nya na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri

mi ta a yur pu N+ye dz+nya na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba des dam pa'i chos

mtha' dag mchod par 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi

te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad sel dang /

gser thub dang / 'od srung dang / shAkya thub pa la sogs pa la rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrangs bar nus kyi tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di'i bsod

nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+ci ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta a yur pu N+ye

dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste dper na rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam spungs te sbyin pa byin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i

tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM

myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ye dz+nya na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM ska ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho

chen po bzhi chus yongs su gang ba'i thigs pa re re nas bgrang bar nus kyi tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur

dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta a yur pu N+ye dz+nya na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM ska ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud

d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ bsti stang du byas te mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa yin no/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu

pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta a yur pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ sbyin pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /

mi yi seng ge sbyin pa'i stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /sbyin pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng ge tshul khrims

stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /tshul khrims stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /bzod pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng ge bzod pa'i stobs rtogs nas/ /snying rje can gyi

grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /bzod pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /brtson 'grus stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng ge brtson 'grus stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /brtson

'grus stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng ge bsam gtan stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /bsa~M gtan stobs kyi sgra ni grag par

'gyur/ /shes rab stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng ge shes rab stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /shes rab stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta a yur

dz+nya na su bi ni ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta a yur pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he

ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tha~Md dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang te/ bac+doMnas

kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na nA ma ma hA ya na s+'u tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa

tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal

bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po de dag dang thabs cig tu

bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal steng gi phyogs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gsheg+sa

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /tshe 'dzin cing tshe mthar phyin par bzhed de/ sems can rnams la

chos kyang ston to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig /'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i sems can rnams ni tshe thung ba la lo brgya thub pa sha stag ste/ de dag las kyang phal cher ni dus ma yin par 'chi bar bstan to/ /'jam dpal seMs

can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa de'i yon tan dang bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ ming tsam nyan tam/ klog pa

nas glegs ba~M la bris te/ khyim na 'chang gi bar du byed dam/ me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / phye ma rnams kyis mchod par gyur pa de dag gi tshe yongasu zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal sems can gang dag tshe dang

ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos pa de dag tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag tshe yongs su zad kar mtshan 'chang bar gyur pa

de dag gi tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo tshe ring por 'dod pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa de'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan tam/ yi ger 'dri

'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ de dag gi yon tan dang legs par gyur pa ni 'di dag go/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba

saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na yA pa ri bA re swA hA/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag gang la la zhig gis yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/

gleg+sa bam la bris te khyim na 'chang ngam/ klog par gyur na/ tshe zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /de shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can yon tan

dpag tu med pa la sogs par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa

b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta a yur

dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oMM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis dgongs pa gcig

dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nya na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te

ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun bcu rtsa bdun gyis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te

a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba

phrag drug bcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/

tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di

gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ yang de'i

tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te

saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i

mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nya na su bi ni sh+ci ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri

wa re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA

ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis dgongs

pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba

saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud d+he ma hA na yA pa ri wa re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ 'chang na de tshe zad pa las

tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur te/ tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te

ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na de sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten

du nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ nam du yang mi khom par skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM mya

ka saM bud d+hA ya tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+ha wa bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang la la zhig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ des chos

kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong 'drir bcug par 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud

ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ des chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong byed du bcug pa dang / rab tu gnas par byas pa yin no/ /

na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang

zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ de'i mtshams med pa lnga yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra

ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM ska ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wa re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ de'i sdig

pa'i phung po ri rab tsam yang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud

ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na de la bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang gnod sbyin dang / srin pos glags btsal kyang glags rnyed par

mi 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na suM bi ni sh+ci ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri

wa re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger bri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug bcu rtsa dgus mngon sum du lung ston par mdzad de/ sangs rgyas stong gis de la

phyag rkyong bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mdzad par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom dang som nyi dang / yid gnyis ma byed cig /oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+ci ta te dzo rA dzA ya

ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi

ger 'drir 'jug na/ rgyal po chen po bzhis de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing / bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM

bud d+hA ya tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ de bzhin gshegs pa

'od dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te sa myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM

skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na yA pa ri bA re swA hA/ sa phyogs gang du mdo sde 'di 'dri ba'i sa phyogs de yang mchod rten du 'gyur te/ phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i

bya dang ri dgas gang dag gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo

rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te saM myaka saM bud d+ha ya tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wa re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri

'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ de bud med kyi dngos por nam du yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA

ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+ha wa bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir kAr sha pa na gcig sbyin pa byin na/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig

rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin par 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha

d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod par byed pa de dag gis dam pa'i chos thams cad chub par 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni

sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug

tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad sel dang / 'khor ba 'jig dang / gser thub dang / 'od bsrung dang / shAkya thub pa la rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams kyi tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med

pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+ci ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa

mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang mnyam pa'i rin po che'i phung por byas te/ sbyin pa byin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu

med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te

ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po chus yongs su gang ba'i thigs pa re re nas bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang

bar mi nus so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+ci ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/

gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ gus par byas te/ mchod par byed pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang mchod

pa byas pa yin no/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ sbyin

pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng ge sbyin pa'i stobs rtogs nas/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /sbyin pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/

mi yi seng ge tshul khrims stobs rtogs nas/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /tshul khrims stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /bzod pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng ge bzod pa'i stobs rtogs

nas/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /bzod pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /brtson 'grus stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng ge brtson 'grus stobs rtogs nas/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer

'jug pa na/ /brtson 'grus stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng ge bsam gtan stobs rtogs nas/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /bsa~M

gtan stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /shes rab stobs kyi sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng ge shes rab stobs rtogs nas/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /shes rab stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /

oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+ci ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/

bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a pa ra mi ta a yur

dz+nyA na hr-i da ya nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos

pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gA tas bskor ba'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na/ dge slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhug te/ de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'di nas nub kyi phyogs rol na/ /bde ba can gyi 'jig

rten khams/ /de na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med/ /su zhig de yi mtshan brjod na/ /de ni de ru skye bar 'gyur/ /'chi ba'i dus su ston pa ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun bcas te mthong / /de na bud

med yod ma yin/ /mngal na gnas pa yod ma yin/ /rin chen rnams kyi pad mo las/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zas dang gos dang sman rnams dang / /chos gos mal cha lhung bzed rnams/ /sems kyis

bsam ma thag tu ni/ /de dag mod las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /bde ba can gyi bsngags pa brjod/ /de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab/ /

'phags pa'i dge 'dun bsam mi khyab/ /bsam mi khyab la dad byas na/ /rnam par smin pa bsam mi khyab/ /rnam dag zhing du skye bar 'gyur/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

tshe dpag med kyi pho brang 'khor dang bcas pa zhes bya ba rgyar dpag tshad khri yod pa zhig yod de/ rgyal rigs su skyes so/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi yab

ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzang po'i mchog ces bya bar gyur to/ /de'i yum ni gzi brjid can zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de'i btsun mo rgyal rigs bzang skyong ma zhes bya bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag

med kyi sras ni zla ba'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to/ /rim gro pa ni snyan pa dri ma med ces bya bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi shes rab can gyi mchog tu gyur pa ni bzang po'i tog ces bya bar gyur to/ /

rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog dang / /brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa'i mchog ni bkod pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi bdud ni mchod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /lhas byin

gyi ming ni dang ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po ni nyan thos chen po drug khri yod do/ /dge slong dag sems can thams cad kyis legs par bsams te/
de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi mtshan legs par bzung la/ zhag bcur sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la ma yengs par sgom zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
tshe dpag med rgyun du yid la bya'o/ /dpal 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yang rtag tu bzlas brjod bya'o/ /nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum yan lag lngas phyag byas la sems can
thams cad kyis bsams na/ zhag bcu 'das pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /

dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du yongs su bsngos na/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i sangs

rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs de gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ sha ba le/ a ba le/ sa ma dza le/ nirde she/ nir dzA te/ ni rug te/ nir mu khe/ dz+wa la ba ra ts+tshe da ni/ su kha

ba ti nirde she/ a mi te/ a yur gar+b+ha nir hA ni/ a mi te a yur pra sA d+ha ne/ nir bud d+hi a ka Sha nir de ta she/ a ka sha nir ku sha le/ a kar sha nir da sha ni/ a ka shA d+hiSh+Tha ne/ a ka shA a d+hiSh+Tha ne/ su kha ba te a d+hiSh+Tha ne/

ru pa ni de she/ tsA twa ri d+harma pra sA da ni/ tswa twa ri Ar+ya sat+ya pra sA d+ha ne/ tswa twa ri mArga b+ha na pra sA da ni/ ba la bir+ya pra sA d+ha ni/ d+harmA tshe d+ha ni/ ku sha le/ ku sha la ni de sha /ku sha la pra tiSh+Tha ni/ bud d+ha ku sha le/ bi shud d+ha pra b+hA/ sa d+harma

ka ra ni/ nirdza te/ nir bud d+he/ bi ma le/ bi ra dze/ rA dzA se/ ra sa gre/ ra sa gra ba le/ ra sA gra/ a d+hiSh+Thi te/ ku le pra ti ku le/ bi ku le/ dan to sud+han ta tsi te/ su pra shan ta tsi te/ su pra tiSh+Tha te/ su le su mu khI/

d+harme tsa d+haH bi le tsa ba le/ a nu sha a ba le/ bud d+ha a kA shA kuN bud d+ha/ A kA shA nir gu Ni/ a mr-i ta dun du b+heHswa re swA hA/ dge slong dag dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la 'chi med rnga sgra'i

rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skad bstan pa de bzhin du kha ton byed pa des/ gos gtsang ma bgos te sa phyogs gtsang zhing dri ma med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la me tog dang spos kyis mchod

par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi snying po pad ma'i gnas dang / byang chub kyi shing phun sum tshogs pa yang yid la bya'o/ /de la yang 'dod pa bskyed par byas te/ 'dod pa dang dad pa byas na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe

dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi shing gi rgyal po ni rin po che'i pad ma rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba shing de me tog dang 'bras bu
phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /pad ma'i gdan ni dag cing gsal la bzang zhing bkra ba'i 'od zer can zhes byas te/ rin po che du mas bskor ba la de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bzhugs so/ /g.yas na ni
byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go/ g.yon na ni byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas bskor to/ /dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs

kyi bu mo gang la la mos pa dang dad pa dang gus pa mang ba de/ der skye bar 'gyur te/ gser gyi sa bzhi chen po la rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma chen po dag la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong

ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pha 'am/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i mtshan yang dag par 'dzin pa de la/ me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / chu'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / dug gi 'jigs pa mi

'byung / mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / srin po'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni gang la yang ma gtogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'

stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /
'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pu N+ya sa~M b+ha wa dang / lo tsa ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /

@#/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs rtsa ba'i rgyud pad ma dra ba bzhugs s+ho/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra pad+ma dzA la mU la tan tra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa
ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma dra ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag

gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das hi ma la ya'i tshal chen po tsan dan sdong po dang myu gu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od

srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa brlangs / tshe dang ldan pa kun 'ged gzhon nu dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa

maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste/ pad ma dkar po dang / nyi 'od dang /

gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / pad ma'i spyan dang / ye shes dbang phyug dang / pad ma'i dbang phyug dang rdo rje snying po dang rin chen snying po dang / kun tu bzang po dang / sgrib pa rnam par sel dang / nam mkha'i snying

po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / blo gros rgya mtsho dang / mthu chen po thob pa dang / zla
'od dang / dra ba can gyi 'od dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad sel ba'i blo gros la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa dang / gzhan yang
gtsor byams pa la gnas pa'i dge slong mang po dang / dge slong ma mang po dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma mang po dang / lha'i tshogs dang / klu'i tshogs dang / de bzhin du gnod sbyin dang /

dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum dang / sha za dang / mi dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba phrag drug dang / khro bo chen po rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang / rdo rje

gshin rje gshed dang / rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / rdo rje rta mgrin dang / rdo rje bgegs mthar byed dang / rdo rje gtsug tor dang / rdo rje gnod mdzes rgyal po la sogs pa bdun bcu dang / spyan ma dang /

mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dang / 'od zer can dang / dbyangs can ma dang / phag zhal ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / ri khrod ma dang / dug sel ma dang / nor rgyun ma dang / dkar mo dang /

yid bzang ma dang / rnam par rgyal ma dang / dpal phreng mo dang / sa 'dzin bzang mo dang / rdo rje dbang phyug ma la sogs pa stong phrag drug brgya dang thabs cig tu bzhugs s+ho/ /de'i tshe 'khor de dag thams
cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la bla ma dang / bkur sti dang / rim gror bya ba'i phyir mchod pa du mas mchod cing bsngags pa du mas bstod par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po thugs rje chen

po yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing ltas bcwa brgyad du gyur to/ /de'i ltas de mthong nas lang ka'i
rgyal po sgra sgrogs shin tu snyems pa dang ldan nas rang gi 'khor du ma dang der lhags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das sgra sgrogs kyi sems kyi rtog pa thugs su chud nas sku'i gnas thams cad nas 'od zer
bye ba phrag du ma byung ngo / /'od zer de dang sa g.yos pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang gsal bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe sgra sgrogs snyems pa dang bcas pas de'i
'khor thams cad kyis 'dzam bu'i gling du yams nad la sogs pas rnam par 'tshe ba de thugs kyis dgongs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug gdong bcu gcig pa drang srong rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag brgya stong dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig

tu 'khod do/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i tshogs rnams kyi nang nas lha'i bu rin po che pad ma'i dra bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba bzhengs te thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye ma mgon po thugs rje can/ /rig sngags 'chang ba'i tshogs dang bcas/ /che ba'i byin brlabs ldan pa rnams/ /sgra sgrogs snyems pa gzhom pa dang / /

nyon mongs rtsad nad gdon pa dang / /sems can rnams la phan pa dang / /bdag la shin tu sman pa'i phyir/ /sku dang rjes su mthun pa yi/ /rig sngags sbyor ba khyad par can/ /snying po dam pa bshad du gsol/ /de tshe 'khor

tshogs thams cad kyis/ /mkha' phyogs me tog char gyis bkang / /bcom ldan thub pa'i dbu la ni/ /rin chen me tog gdugs su gyur/ /lha rnams gtsang mar sbyar ba yi/ /yon chab bdug spos dri dang bshos/ /ci 'byor
dad pa'i stobs kyis phul/ /thub pas nam mkha'i mdzod du brlabs/ /lha yi bu mo du ma yis/ /rol mo sil snyan 'phan gdugs dang / /bla re rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang / /lda ldi na bza' du mas mchod/ /
de nas mgon po spyan ras gzigs/ /pad ma gzhon nu'i zhal mnga' bas/ /bzhengs 'dzum thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /ston pa la ni 'di skad gsol/ /sgra sgrogs bzhin gyis snyems pa dang / /mda' dang

rtsal gyis dregs pa ste/ /'di ni legs brtsams las byung min/ /shin tu log pa las kyang min/ /sngon dus sangs rgyas gdong mdzes kyi/ /bstan pa la yang mgo btang ba'i/ /bsod nams grangs kyis byung ba yin/ /

lag pa du mar 'khrul pa ni/ /zas dang snod dang gos nor rgyan/ /bskal pa bzhi bcu'i mchod sbyin te/ /de nas rtsal dang shugs kyang yin/ /mda' ni b+h+riM gi ri ti yi/ /byin brlabs sngon du byed mod kyang / /grangs

med tshul khrims bral bas ni/ /srin po'i rigs su 'khrungs pa dang / /'khor bcas gzhan la gnod gyur yin/ /ngas ni ngang tshul rmad byung ba'i/ /lus kyis bde gshegs sbyin pa dang / /sgrub brtson legs byas

mtha' yas pa/ /spyod bzang la gnas bsgral ba'i grangs/ /gang gA klung gis rdul dang mtshungs/ /de skad 'bras bu de tsam ste/ /dang po'i las can ci snyed la/ /phan bdags gzhi ni bya ba'i phyir/ /cung zad bsdus
nas brjod bya ste/ /legs par nyon la yid la zung / /sngon tshe 'das dus bskal pa ni/ /gang gA klung bcu'i snga rol gyi/ /cher 'das pa yi snga rol na/ /bde gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan/ /man

dA ra yi dri zhes bya/ /'jig rten ston pa byung ba'i tshe/ /bdag ni khyim bdag drag por gyur/ /thub pa de la rig sngags mnos/ /thob ma thag tu bskal pa'i grangs/ /bzhi khri snyed kyi 'khor ba snyil/ /de rjes

bskal pa gang gA klung / /bye ba snyed gcig snga rol na/ /bde gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan/ /thogs med pad ma brgya yi spyan/ /gtsug tor yon tan rab rgyas pa'i/ /'od zer rgyal po zhes bya ba/ /'jig

rten ston pa bzhugs pa'i tshe/ /bdag nyid drang srong bdag por gyur/ /rig sngags 'di mnos bsgrubs pa yis/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhal mthong zhing / /skye med chos la bzod pa thob/ /de rjes 'das dus bskal
pa ni/ /bye ba phrag brgya'i snga rol na/ /bde gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan/ /tshe dpag med ces 'jig rten du/ /ston pa byung ba bdag gis mnos/ /de tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /bdag

la dbang bskur lung bstan mdzad/ /khyod kyi sngon du bskal pa'i grangs/ /brjod mi lang nas rig sngags phyir/ /yang dag stong phrag stong snyed kyang / /dang po'i mchod sbyin chen po byas/ /bye ba phrag grangs bcu gcig tu/ /

phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dbang bskur blangs/ /de dang de yi rnam smin mchog /sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byam du/ /yang dang yang du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /phyis ni 'dren pa shAkya zhes/ /mi mjed 'jig rten
khams 'khrungs tshe/ /mi yul las kyang khyad par du/ /yi dgas gling du skyes pa 'ga'/ /gtan la 'dud 'phel bya ba'i phyir/ /mtshan mo mun nag sprin rum du/ /skad cig glog 'gyu ci lta bar/ /rig

sngags 'chang ba gdong bcu gcig /yan lag stong dang ldan pa la/ /spyan ni chig stong sum bcu pa'i/ /mtshan dang ldan pa'i sku 'byung 'gyur/ /de tshe skal ldan la la zhig /mtshan nas brjod cing sku la mos/ /

rig sngags zlos pa po gang zhig /'jig rten 'dod pa kun grub cing / /phyi nas ye shes nyis 'gyur ro/ /lung bstan de skad thos pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gcig /grangs snyed zhal nas gsungs

pa yi/ /rig sngags snying po gdong bcu gcig /mthu chen thogs pa med pa ste/ /'gro la sman cing bde ba dang / /nad kun sel byed sdig kun sbyong / /bkra shis med pa kun zlog cing / /rmi lam mtshan ma ngan
kun sel/ /dus min 'chi dang ngan sems zlog /rtag tu dpal dang sems bde thob/ /mya ngan sdug bsngal ngal ba sel/ /rtsod 'khrug thams cad zhi ba dang / /bdud dang gdon bgegs zhi bar 'gyur/ /

'jig rten smon pa kun grub cing / /bdud dang bar chad mtshon cha'i nad/ /dbyig pa brdeg dang bcing ba dang / /btson rar bcug dang mtshon chas brtsal/ /gsod sar khrid dang yan lag bcad/ /mig 'bru mtshon gyis

btsab pa dang / /chu dang me dang rlung sa g.yos/ /dug dang byad stem ro langs dang / /chom rkun mi ma yin rnams gnon/ /rig sngags 'di yis bsrungs pa dang / /len dang 'dzin dang 'dri ba dang / /klog dang kha don bshad

sogs rnams/ /brtson la 'jig rten lhar bcas dang / /bdud dang tshangs pa dge sbyong dang / /bram zer bcas pas gnod pa med/ /sngon gyi las drag yod pa yang / /byang zhing bsrabs te med par 'gyur/ /nges pa'i

dngos po 'di lags pas/ /rig nas mngon sum yid ches par/ /rnam par rtog med sems kyis blang / /de slad skyabs dang skyob pa dang / /bsrung dang dbugs 'byin dpal mgon dang / /gling dang khang khyim 'di nyid yin/ /

nye ring sa phyogs ci srid par/ /mtshams bcad nas ni rig sngags dang / /'byung po rnams kyis 'tshe ba med/ /gang gis sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal mchod/ /skyabasu 'gro zhing sdig pa bshags/ /mngon par dga'

zhing gzungs sngags 'dis/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod pa la/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ma lus pa/ /mtshungs par yi rang legs par sbyin/ /rtsa ba bzhi dang mtshams med lnga/ /ma lus sdig kun byang bar 'gyur/ /

gnod sbyin srin po sogs snang yang / /bzung nas byams pa snying rje'i sems/ /dang po bskyed nas bla med kyi/ /byang chub sems mchog sa la dgod/ /gang ga klung brgya'i sangs rgyas kyi/ /mtshan nas brjod cing bstod

pa bas/ /rigs kyi bu 'am bu mo gang / /bdag gi ming brjod dran byed cing / /rig sngags rgyun du brjod na de/ /myur du mchog dga'i sa 'thob cing / /lag pa'i mthil nas mthong ba ltar/ /bla med byang chub myur du 'byung / /

rtse gcig dran pas gus byas te/ /rtag tu nang par sngar langs nas/ /chos bzhin du ni dge bgyis te/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du gang brjod pa/ /tshe 'dir phan yon bcu thob 'gyur/ /rtag par lus la nad med dang / /

lha dang sangs rgyas kun gyis bsrung / /nor 'bru rin chen gos rnyed dang / /dgra sdang dul zhing 'jigs med dang / /bza' rnams bkur cing rigs btsun thob/ /dug dang 'dre gshin gdon bral dang / /lus la dri zhim kun dga' dang / /

bsam ngan mi snyan rjod byed dang / /rims nad bral zhing dgang sla dang / /dus min 'chi ba sangs par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang yon tan bzhi thob ste/ /'chi khar sangs rgyas zhal mthong dang / /mkha' la 'od 'byung lhas mchod dang / /

nam yang ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing / /bde ba can nam bde 'gror skye/ /rig sngags 'di dang sangs rgyas kyi/ /ye shes snying po 'dzin pa la/ /byang chub sems dang sangs rgyas kyi/ /rnam par thar pa'i chos sgo 'thob/ /bskal

pa du mar dge bsags dang / /rig sngags 'di rnyed 'gyur ba ste/ /dad ldan khrel yod ngo tsha shes/ /blo bzang brtson ldan snying rje che/ /mdog dkar ngang bzang gsong por smra/ /sems 'jam lus ngag dal bar spyod/ /bla ma

la gus brtul zhugs che/ /sred pa chung zhing sbyin la dga'/ /sangs rgyas gus shing sems bcas pas/ /nyin mtshan rgyun du rig sngags 'don/ /bcu bzhi 'am ni bco lnga dang / /khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la/ /gso sbyong sku yi

mdun du blang / /skyon med tsan dan dkar sogs shing / /rigs bzang las byas sku gzugs sam/ /yang na sa rdo rin chen sogs/ /bzang las bde bar gshegs gzugs bya/ /yang na ris su bris kyang rung / /sku gcig po 'am

lha tshogs kyi/ /dkyil 'khor rgyas par byas pa la/ /mngon sum bzhin du dmigs byas na/ /myur du mngon sum mthong bar 'gyur/ /yon tan kun gyis brgyan pa yi/ /bum pa chu dang bcas pa la/ /sngags brjod pas ni 'dod
don kun/ /'grub 'gyur the tshom mi bya'o/ /nad dang 'phrod pa'i sman rnams la/ /sngags bzlas bza' 'am byugs pas sam/ /bdugs pa tsam yang gnod pa sel/ /srad bu 'am ni gos dag dang / /phyag rgyas gdags

kyang de bzhin no/ /'dod pa gang dang gang la yang / /me yi las kyi sbyor ba bya/ /gsang sngags 'dod 'dzin yid byed pa/ /bdag kyang rjes su 'jug par bya/ /de skad gsungs pa'i de ma thag /byang chub sems dpa'

'jam dbyangs kyis/ /sngags kyi ngo bo nyid la ni/ /ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma rang bzhin med pa'i chos/ /sna tshogs gzugs su snang ba la/ /brjod rtog bral ba'i skad cig ni/ /zhi ba'i che ba nyid yin no/ /srid
pa dngos po med pa la/ /dmigs par byed pa bsgom pa'o/ /dmigs pa mthar thug med mthong ba/ /de ni bsgom pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /kun du bzang pos gsang sngags kyi/ /don la ched du 'di ltar brjod/ /e ma sku

gsum tha dad par/ /lus ngag yid kyi don las byung / /don gcig pa yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /sku gcig tu ni nges par gzung / /gang la gang phan bskyed pa la/ /'ja' tshon bzhin du snang mod kyang / /tshig gis brjod

pa'i sprul tsam ste/ /ye shes sku la dbye ba med/ /sgrib pa rnam sel las la ni/ /ched du brjod pa 'di ltar brjod/ /e ma dngos po ngo bo nyid/ /ma byung ma skyes ma 'gags pa/ /skye 'gag lta bu'i cho 'phrul ni/ /sku

des phyag rgya sngags su snang / /yon tan chu yi brlabs bzhin du/ /skye ba'i ngo la gsal bar byed/ /nan tan gyis ni de nyid kyang / /rgyu ba med cing khong du chud/ /byang chub sems dpa' sa snying gis/ /rgyu la ched du

'di brjod do/ /e ma rang bzhin rnam dag la/ /thog med blo'i mun pa'i dbyings/ /rnam rtog bag chags kyis dkrugs nas/ /blo bur dkar nag las su snang / /dkar po sangs rgyas chos dge 'dun/ /de la sgro btags

byang chub sems/ /de las byung ba'i phrin las kyis/ /nyon mongs las kyi sgrib pa sbyong / /mgon po byams pas sngags sgrub kyi/ /lam la ched du 'di ltar brjod/ /e ma gdod nas grol zhi'i sems/ /chu ltar dang

bar snang mod kyang / /sna tshogs 'gro ba'i gzugs byung bas/ /mun pa thibs pos rnam par bsgyur/ /de nyid sems kyi snang ba'i phyir/ /'bad rtsol med pa'i seMs kyis grol/ /rtsol ba sems kyi dri mas ni/ /dri ma med pa'i

sems 'ching 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i snying pos sngags ming la/ /ched du 'di ltar brjod par mdzad/ /e ma stong pa mtshan ma bral/ /kha dog dbyibs bral chos nyid dag /dga' ba'i sems chen gsal byed pa/ /shes rab

chen po'i yi ge min/ /mtshan dpe ye shes bde ldan sku/ /gang gang don du de snang ba/ /snying rje chen po'i ring shugs kyis/ /'byung 'gyur yi ge ta yi don/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad mos ni/ /gnas lam 'di ltar

ched du brjod/ /e ma rgyu rkyen nam mkha' la/ /nyi zla skar rgyun 'khor ba yis/ /gsal nas nyin mtshan bye brag brjod/ /nyon mongs ma rig sred len gyis/ /'du byed srid pa'i las bskul te/ /rnam shes ming

gzugs skye mched drug /reg tshor skye rga shi sdug bsngal/ /gsal byed dag pa gnyis kyis dag /phyag na rdo rjes 'bras don la/ /ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma zab cing rgya che ba/ /sngags mthu bla na med pa ni/ /sang+yas

mu stegs kyis mi shes/ /shes pa nyid kyang rdzas med la/ /shes bya rdzas su ga la yod/ /shes pa yul gyi rnam par ni/ /rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis bsgos pa/ /de zad nas ni grol bar 'gyur/ /de nas rig pa'i lha mo'i

tshogs/ /spos dang me tog 'thor byed cing / /snyan pa'i sngags kyi glu yis ni/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la bstod/ /oM bcom ldan mgon po thugs rje spyan ras gzigs/ /zhal grangs mdog dbyib du ma cir yang snang / /

stong dang brgya dang bcu gcig drug dang gcig /byams pa'i zhal bzang mnga' ba'i mgon la 'dud/ /spyan ma'i'o/ /rab dgyes zhal mdog du ma cir yang 'gyur/ /la la byams pa snying rje dga' ba'i zhal/ /la la

'dod rmongs ser sna chen po'i zhal/ /khro sdang gtum chags lta ldan phyag 'tshal lo/ /mA ma kI'i'o/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dbang bskur rdzogs pa'i zhal/ /bstan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin rgyal po'i phyag /

mdzad pa grangs med chub pa'i phyag rgyar ldan/ /gdan gnyis zhabs gnyis gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na bza' dkar mo'o/ /oM mdzad pa thugs rje'i dbyings la thug med kyang / /rtsom pa rgya mtsho rgyun mi chad
mdzad pas/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par spyod pa yi/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrol ma'o/ /oM nyi ma gzi ldan 'od zer 'gyed pa ltar/ /'jug dgongs mi mnga' kun rtog mun
bral yang / /bskal pa rgya mtshor khyad par don gsal ba'i/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'od zer can no/ /oM sems kyi rgyud 'gags mya ngan 'das pa'i tshe/ /'dod chags byung ma

thag tu yal ba ste/ /nyon mongs rtsa ba bcad nas pha mtha' med/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbyangs can no/ /oM nyon mongs bdag tu bzung na 'khor bar skye/ /de la yang yang brtags na ngan
'gror skye/ /rang bzhin med par shes nas grol bar 'gyur/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phag gdong ma'i'o/ /oM chos rnams dag par mthong na mtho ris thob/ /gnyis 'dzin rtog pa

chad na mya ngan 'da'/ /sgyu ma'i sems dang ldan na gzhan don 'byung / /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khro gnyer can ma'o/ /oM rang tshul spyod la chags pas sa bon rul/ /gzhan tshul dman
par brjod pas zhing sa tshig /lus ngag gtsang sbra tsam las byang chub rig /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sa 'dzin ma'o/ /oM bdag la mun pa'i dug gis brgyal ba la/ /bdag med

phyogs bral ye shes bdud rtsi sman/ /pha rol phyin bcu spyod dang rtogs stsol mdzad/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dug sel ma'o/ /oM rang tshul bzang spyod nga rgyal zhen pa med/ /gzhan spyod

btang snyoms byas nas rang sems spyod/ /sred med bzod ldan ngang gis rgol ba lags/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ri khrod ma'i'o/ oM khrel yod ngo tsha shes shing gtong la dga'/ /dad dang

thos ldan tshul khrims shes rab bzang / /chog shes 'dod chung 'di dang gzhan du phyug /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor rgyun ma'i 'o/ /oM yi ge 'dri mchod sbyin nyan klog dang 'chad/ /kha don 'dzin
sems bsgom brtson de la chu'i/ /khrus sogs basmyung gnas dkar gtsang yon tan stsol/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkar mo'i 'o/ /oM rang sems dul zhing lus ngag bag yod spyod/ /
'jig rten 'jig rten 'das mchod dam pa 'dzin/ /thos bsam bsgom brtson de ni dgra las rgyal/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par rgyal ma'i glu'o/ /oM tha dad kyis 'ching dbyer med
grol ba yi/ /thabs dang shes rab bde chen byang chub lam/ /rnam thar ye shes mtha' yas dpal ster ba/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal phreng ma'i glu'o/ /oM bsam pa bzang po

gser gyi sa gzhi la/ /byang chub phyogs chos dpag bsam shing chen 'khrungs/ /ye shes thugs rje rgyun chu rlan mdzad pa'i/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yid bzang ma'i glu'o/ /sgra sgrogs

'khor bcas 'dar gyur te/ /rlung gis btab pa'i rtswa dang mtshungs/ /thal mo spyi bor sbyar nas su/ /ched du brjod pas 'di gsol to/ /oM mgon po rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /gtso bo rab tu che ba'i lha/ /bsod nams du mas bskyed pa'i sku/ /ye shes

mtha' yas thugs mnga' ba/ /blo ldan srid mthar mdzad pa po/ /tshul ldan tshul khrims la sbyor mdzad/ /gtsang ldan bram ze tshangs pa che/ /mdzad spyod mkha' mnyam spyod phyag 'tshal/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/ /'khor la legs so

legaso zhes/ /oM AHhrIHhUM swA hA bcas/ /yang yang brjod pas byin gyis brlabs/ /lcag kyu can gyis nya ra nas/ /klu phyugs 'bum phrag 'dren pa ltar/ /dge sbyong kun slong dkar pos ni/ /byang chub rin chen gling 'jog mdzad/ /'phags pa

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma dra ba zhes bya ba las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o/ / de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/ /mgon po yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sna tshogs snang ba zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

bzhugs nas/ /yan lag cha shas thams cad las/ /'od zer sna lnga bye ba phrag /drug bcu drug bcu'i mtha' gzhal ba/ /grangs med dag ni bkye bar mdzad/ /zhing khams grangs med bdun gyi mtha'/ /phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad du/ /

'od kyis gang nas 'od de las/ /snyan pa'i tshig bcad 'di snang ngo / /sangs rgyas dang ni chos la bsnyas pa spang / /le lo che dang spyod pa mchog 'dzin spang / /'gyod dang chos la ma nges 'byed pa spang / /nga rgyal che dang 'dod chags spyod pa spang /
/'gro rnams med na byang chub lam med do/ /'gro la brten nas byang chub che thob 'gyur/ /byang chub che lam thugs rje chen po ste/ /'gro rnams med na gang la skye bar 'gyur/ /
de skad grags pa'i de ma thag /phyogs bcu'i zhing bzhugs sangs rgyas sras/ /brjod kyis mi lang gtso bo mchog /spyan ras gzigs
dbang grangs med gtso/ /thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /mi mjed zhing 'dir lhag par gyur/ /'di nas shar phyogs zhing khams ni/ /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid nas/ /zhing khams seng ge
spungs par ni/ /sangs rgyas seng ge rol pa yi/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang seng ge'i sgra/ /mdog dkar shel gyi ri 'dra ba/ /byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag /bcu
dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /klog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /dngul gyi me tog du mas
gtor/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung chen po tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i gti mug mun pa bcom/ /

shes rab mtha' yas gsal bar mdzad/ /bdag kyang snying po 'di yi mthus/ /phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /oM hrI siM ha nA d+ha hU~M phaT/ /snying po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa ga la de logs su/ /'khor
bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /lho yi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi/ /zhing khams rin chen brtsegs pa na/ /sangs rgyas rin

chen dpal bzhugs pa'i/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang yid bzhin gyi/ /nor bu 'khor los bsgyur ba byed/ /gser gyi ri bo mdog 'dra ba/ /byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag /

bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /klog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /rin chen gser gyi me tog ni/ /

rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung che ba'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i ser sna 'ching ba bcad/ /

sbyin pa'i 'byung gnas gter chen rdol/ /bdag kyang snying po 'di yi mthus/ /phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /oM pad+ma d+ha ra d+ha ke hU~M phaT/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logasu/ /'khor bcas
dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /nub kyi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi/ /zhing khams pad mo brtsegs pa na/ /sangs rgyas pad ma'i

'byung gnas bzhugs/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje can/ /pad ma nir te shwa ri gtso/ /pad ma rA ga'i ri 'dra ba/ /byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig

mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /pad ma rA ga'i me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor bar mdzad/ /
bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i 'dod chags 'dam rdzab bsams/ /

tshul khrims byug spos char du phab/ /bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/ /phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /oM pad+ma nir te swa ra hrIHhU~M phaT/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang / thub pa ga la de logasu/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i

tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /byang gi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi/ /zhing khams rdo rje bkod pa na/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje thogs med bzhugs/ /

drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /thugs rje chen po mi shol ba/ /rin chen mar gad ri bo 'dra/ /byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /

glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /macom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /ma ra ga ta'i me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor bar mdzad/ /bde bar gshegs

so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bshad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i le lo'i nags tshal bsregs/ /brtson 'grus bskul ba'i

me phung sbar/ /bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/ /phrin las 'di nyid grog bgyid do/ /oM rat+na a gra a pra ti ha ta hU~M phaT/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i

tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsug thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /byang shar phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi/ /zhing khams gter chen brtsegs pa na/ /sangs rgyas don yod 'byung gnas
bzhugs/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /rje btsun don yod zhags pa can/ /shel gyi ri bo'i mdog 'dra ba/ /byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan

cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /rin chen shel gyi me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor

bar byed/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i zhe sdang ri bo bcom/ /bzod pa'i

nyi ma lha nger mdzad/ /bdag kyang snying po 'di yi mthus/ /phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /oM hrIHtrai lokya bi dza ya a mo g+ha pA sha a pra ti ha ta hrIHha hU~M phaT swA hA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs

su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /shar lho'i phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi/ /zhing khams bdud rtsi brtsegs pa na/ /sangs

rgyas sman gyi 'byung gnas bzhugs/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /rje btsun ha la ha la che/ /pu sha ra ka'i ri bo 'dra/ /byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag /bcu dang

lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan 'das mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /pu sha ka ra'i me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor bar

byed/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i phrag dog dug sdong sbrul/ /bsam gtan

bdud rtsi rgya mtsho rlabs/ /bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/ /phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /oM ha la ha la hrI~M pad+ma gar+b+ha hU~M phaT swA hA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas

dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /lho nub phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na/ /zhing khams pad mas brgyan pa na/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma'i snying po bzhugs/ /drung du

byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /rje btsun pad ma spyan gyi lung / /zangs ma zhun gyi ri bo 'dra/ /byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu

bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /zangs ma zhun gyi me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs

rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/ /'gro ba rmongs pa'i thibs po bcom/ /sna tshogs thabs kyi rlung chen 'phyo/ /bdag kyang snying po de

yi mthus/ /phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /oM pad+ma a la~M kA ra hU~M phaT swA hA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas

bzhugs/ /nub byang phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na/ /zhing khams stong brgya zhes bya bar/ /sangs rgyas dam tshig dpal bzhugs so/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /mgon po

spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /rje btsun rdo rje chos dbang phyug /nor bu spug gi kha dog 'dra/ /byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom

ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /spug gi snying po'i me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /

rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i mnar sems zhen pa bsal/ /mthu stobs chen po'i rdo rjes btab/ /bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/ /phrin las 'di nyid

grogs bgyid do/ /oM badzra d+harma d+hA tu hU~M swA hA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /steng gi phyogs kyi zhing khaMs mchog /

grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na/ /zhing khams gtsug tor brtsegs pa na/ /sangs rgyas gtsug tor rgyal po bzhugs/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /ha ri ha ri ha ri la/ /zhon zhes

rab tu grags pa yi/ /rje btsun chos kyi gtsug tor de/ /in dra nI la'i ri bo mdog /byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po

thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /in dra nI la'i me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor bar mdzad/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /

rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i log lta'i sgrib g.yogs sel/ /dag pa'i smon lam 'khor lo bskor/ /bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/ /phrin las 'di

nyid grogs bgyid do/ /oM b+h+ru~M hrIHha hU~M swA hA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /'og gi phyogs kyi zhing khaMs

mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na/ /zhing khams za ma tog mdzes na/ /sangs rgyas gnon pa'i dpal bzhugs so/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /rje btsun mgrin

pa sngon po rgyal/ /an da rnyil gyi ri bo 'dra/ /byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba

du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /an d+ha rnyil gyi me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor bar mdzad/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /

zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i shes bya'i sgrib nag sel/ /ye shes ral gris rtsa ba bregs/ /bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/ /phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /oM ma Ni pad+me hU~M/ snying po de

skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang tshogs 'dus nas/ /rig sngags mthu chen 'chad pa dang / /
gzhan don rdzogs par mdzad pa de'i/ /shin du dga' bar mdzad pa la/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kun/ /phyag rgya nas ni spyi bor bzhag /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis legs so byin/ /nam mkha' snyan pa

yis kyang bkang / /de tshe phyogs bcur bzhugs pa yi/ /khro bo rgyal po ma lus rnams/ /sa steng thams cad gar gyis bkang / /g.yas brkyang g.yon brkyang zla gam dang / /zlu~M po gru bzhi gru gsum 'gos/ /chod dang gred chongs

hril po dang / /rdobs dang btsir ba'i tshul gyis su/ /bgegs rnams stabs kyis tshar gcod mdzad/ /lag pa thal sbyar phye btsum bskyed/ /sor mo gcig snol gcig 'khyud dang / /kun bsnol kun 'khyud kun gdengs

dang / /rgyab bsnol res 'khyud kun 'khyud dang / /re mos 'khyud sgring kun sged dang / /mnyam bzhag dang ni mchog gi rgya/ /sa gnon skyabs sbyin mchog sbyin sogs/ /phyag rgya du ma bgegs sel mdzad/ /gzhan yang

'jig rten skyong ba'i tshogs/ /ma lus 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /gdongs bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i/ /snga na med pa'i rig sngags rmad/ /ngo mtshar 'byung zhes thos ma thag /lus kyang shin du 'dar gyur nas/ /rgyal mchog

gtso bo drung lhags te/ /phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /spyan sngar 'dug te 'di skad gsol/ /gang zhig gdod ni bcu gcig pa'i/ /rig sngags lan cing 'dzin pa dang / /rgyun du 'don dang yid la byed/ /'jig rten

mgon po spyan ras gzigs/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshogs 'di rnams/ /gang gis yid la byed pa 'am/ /yang na ji tsam dran yang rung / /dge ldan rigs kyi bu de ni/ /phyogs bcu rgyal ba rnams kyi sras/ /byang chub sems dpa'

rnams kyi bshes/ /rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyi yab/ /byis pa rnams kyi gnyen yin no/ /bdag cag rnams ni de yi 'bangs/ /skyes bu khyu mchog chen po ste/ /bsod nams rnams kyi gter ldan zhing / /de yi tshul khrims ral

ba med/ /mi de skye ba don yod de/ /lha gnas dag nas spu gseb tu/ /ye shes 'od zer bdud rtsi 'dzud/ /'jig rten 'di yi nad rigs dang / /gdon rigs ci snyed yod pa 'am/ /rig sngags byad ltems ma lus pas/ /de la

tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /cho ga bzhin du spyad pa yis/ /tshangs pa'i tshe tshad gnas nas kyang / /shi ba sems brgyal med par ni/ /gnas 'pho tshul gyis mtho ris 'jug /rgyal ba'i zhing du gshegs nas kyang / /rgyal ba

rnams la chos nyan cing / /rgyal sras rnams dang stobs gcig tu/ /stobs dang mi 'jigs pa brnyes te/ /mtshan dang dpe byad ldan gyur nas/ /skad cig glog 'gyu ci bzhin du/ /'gro ba ma lus dag byed cing / /zhing rnams ma

lus dag par byed/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las lha byung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas lag na rdo rje 'dzin/ /bzhengs te thal sbyar thub
pa la/ /phyag 'tshal phyogs su 'khod nas ni/ /gsang ba bstod nas tshig 'di gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal dbang po/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang kun/ /rang rang gnas nas gshegs nas byon/ /

'gro ba thugs brtse chen po yis/ /snying po byin brlabs ldan la gsol/ /rmad du byung ba'i snying po la/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas dang / /rig pa 'dzin rnams 'thun par dgyes/ /'on kyang 'gro rnams bzung ba

dang / /dngos grub thams cad myur ba dang / /snying po mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir/ /mgon po thugs rje che rnams kyi/ /byin brlabs ldan pa rtsa ba'i sngags/ /'dren pa de ring bshad du gsol/ /rig sngags nyi ma zla

ba'i 'od/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyis sprin bral byed/ /'gro la thugs brtse mdzad pa dang / /bdag la phan pa'i don slad du/ /rgyal ba mya ngan kun bral ba/ /rtsa ba'i gzungs sngags bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa

ches/ /sdig pa kun myur sgrol bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi thugs rje las/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang seng ge'i sgra/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/

na maHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad ya thA/ oM a ka Te bi ka Te/ Ni ka Te/ Ti ka Te/ ka Ta~M ka Te/ ka ro Te bir+ya swA hA/ yon tan ye shes tshogs rnams kun/ /rig

sngags 'dis ni nges par bskyed/ /khyad par du ni mdze nad la/ /rtswa las byung ba'i me bzhin no/ /rtog ldan rnam shes brgyad kyi gzhi/ /sbyor phyir maN Dal lham pa brgyad/ /ba ser skya yi bdud rtsis byug /yan lag bcu gnyis
mgor bcas pa'i/ /sngags grangs byin gyis brlabs byugs nas/ /lhag ma yan lag thig ler bya/ /cung zad lce la myang bas ni/ /dus dus sum brgya drug bcu'i tshad/ /nyi ma grangs kyis dag nas ni/ /lo gcig

dus su rtogs ldan 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/ /dpal bskyed 'tshe ba bzlog pa yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /mgon po yid bzhin 'khor lo yi/ /rtsa ba'i

rig sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsakra warti pad+ma tsan+ta ma Ni dz+wa la ma hA pad+ma ru ru tiSh+Tha dz+wa la A kar ShA ya

hrIHhU~M phaT swA hA/ 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /glo bur gnod pa bsal ba'i phyir/ /bdun phrag sngags grangs dang mnyam pa'i/ /yung kar ser po brgya rtsa brgyad/ /rang gi lus sam yan lag la/ /mchod

dang bcas pas gdags par bya/ /de la yang yang gsol ba gtab/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /khams gsum dbang du bya ba yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /mgon

po pad+ma gar dbang gi/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+yA A ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru N-i kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sarba satwa bA sa nA gA d+hi pa ti ni/

na maHsarba satwa pi sa na/ A ha ra Ni/ na maHsarba satwa ba yo d+he ra NA ya/ na maHsta~M b+ha sra shra ma NA ya/ na maHsarba satwa bo d+hi tsit+ta ka ni sa na ka rA ya/ na maHsarba satwa ban d+ha na ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/ na maHsarba satwa duH

kha bi mo k+Shan ka rA ya/ na maHsarba An ta kA ra bi d+ha nA ma kA ra/ na maHsarba bid+yA d+hA ra rA dzA pra sha pra sta ye/ ma hA yo ga yo ge shwa rA ya/ ha sa ha s+ya nA ya/ na ma skri twA i daM Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa ra mu khong gir+N+Na

ri shi bi ba ri dA/ nA ga yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa/ shAkya brah+ma lo ka pA la ya/ biSh+N+yu ma he shwa ra na rA ya na skan d+ha/ ku be ra/ a su ren dra/ ma tri ga na na ma skri twa/ badzra badzra khu Na sa hr-i da ya/ ha ya gr-I ba na mo ya ma hr-i da ya/ ma/

war+t+ya sh+yi mi/ a ba pra me yor da sa d+ha kan a pa ha na/ sarba bi na ya ka~M a mo g+ha~M/ sarba kar+m+ma bi Shiny+tsaHbi nA ya kaM / tad+ya thA/ oM ta ru la/ ta nu ta la/ bi ta ru la/ sarba bi Shi ka ka /sarba bud d+ha bi da ni/ pra dzA ba ti/ ta/ a

na la bi s+ph+ya li~M ki/ an+Ta hA sa ke shwa rA ya/ a to pa pra bi tA ya/ badzra khu ra narge ti ta/ tsa li ta pra pu da ta la/ badzrod shAn+tiM ta ti/ si ta ma du to ga ta pra na ma Na ba kA ra ba ra duSh+Ta~M/ bid+yA ka ma ga sa~M b+ha ka na kA ra/ sarba

bi d+yau ba twa he sha kA ra/ pa ra ma shAn tI kA ra/ bud d+ha bo d+hA ya ma ti/ b+ha ga bAn ha ya gr-I ba sarba bid+yA hr-i da ya/ ma bar ti yi sh+ya gi/ la tra kha dra la hA ro Ta/ man tra~M rak+Sha rak+ShaH At+ma swa sti ta~M man+t+ra~M sid d+ha sA d+ha/ sarba ka rma kha

Sha me/ sid d+he sid d+he/ de hi de hi/ A be sha a be sha /pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ sarba gra he Sha a pra te ha ta/ d+hu na d+hu naH bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ sarba sa ro kra ma kr-i tan+tA graH ka khor da dur laM g+hi ta hi

ba shi ka bi shi ka ta/ sA sha daMSh+T+ra/ bi Sha tsur+Na yo ga a b+hi tsa ra ba shI/ ka ra NaH sid d+ha any+dza na/ tsa ku mo ha na tsin+ta/ pi~M she sa na kA ra/ nir+ya a pa ra bre sha ka ra na/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa rin d+ha di sha na~M/ sarba

b+ha ye b+h+yaH sarba satwA nA~M/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mA ma nu dwa d+harma sa~M g+ha a nu dz+nyA ta~M me karma shI g+hA~M/ ku ru ku ru phaT/ ha ya g+h+r-I ba phaT/ badzra daM Th+T+ro ka da b+hA ya pa ra sa na phaT/ ye ke tsi ta mA ma e+e hi da shi go pa kA ya kra mi na to man tra yan

dra ma man ti/ dza ba ya ri dzu hu~M ti/ ka kho rdar kun wan di nA~M/ sarba dza mu khen dra pra dad tA ya phaT/ na maHsarba duSh+Ta gra ho ta sAd+na ya ha ya gr-I ba sid d+h+ya~M tu me man tra pa dAHni swA hA/ /oM a mr-i tod b+hA bA ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT

swA hA/ na maHsarba satwa sh+tsa sid d+h+yan tu/ me man tra pa dAHNi swA hA/ gang zhig klus non spyi la ni/ /dung gi me tog sngags stong gis/ /byin gyi brlabs nas gu gul bdug /lus la thogs na legs par 'gyur/ /

de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /thogs med sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /mgon po thugs rje mi bshol ba'i/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/ /

na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na maHsarba b+ha ma tsa ka ra~M/ sarba ro ga pra sha ma na ka ra~M/ sarba byA da ni b+ha da ka ra~M/ aSh+T+ra k+Sha Na pa di sa sa twe b+h+yaHtA rA

saM myaka tA rA naM/ da sa dI ka bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaHna maHsa~M myaka sa~M bud d+ha ko TI NA~M/ a he na ma s+t+wi da Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra sa shud+ha d+ha ra Ni/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya a gra bI sh+ya ti/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a gra nA ma dz+wa la sa ti kA ra/ ma hA

kA ru NA byu bas man ta ha ran tu/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza Ta dza Ta/ dzi Ti dzi Ti/ dzu Tu dzu Tu/ ra ra ra ra/ ri ri ri ri/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA sa~M gra ha/ a nu ha ra~M tu/ e h+ye

hi san d+hu ya/ e h+ye hi tsa ta tsa ta tsi ti tsi ti/ tsu tu tsu tu/ sarba bo d+hi satwaH pra Ni d+ha na gr-ih+Na/ kA ra a nu san d+hA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sa~M b+hu ba e h+ye hi/ ra la ra la ru lu/ d+h+yA na bi mok+Sha sa mA d+hi/ sa ma ba ti b+hi sh+tsa ra/

a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ tsa la tsa la/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ e h+ye e h+ye/ bud d+ho bud d+ho/ bud d+ha sa t+ye na/ d+harma sa t+ye na/ sa~M ga sa t+ye na/ Te/ s+thA Te s+thA sarba ma hA mai tri b+hu tA ni pa ran tu/ ma hA kA ru Na me g+hen mA ma

rba sarba rA ga ni ba ra ya~M tu/ bu na bu na/ bi bu na bi bu na/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ Ta s+tho Ta s+tha/ e h+ye e h+ye/ mA ma sarba sha pu ya~M tu/ karma bi sho d+ha ya/ ma hA kA ru ni kA ya/ ma hA pad+ma nA dA ya/ pad+ma a pa ya swA hA/

shwe ta A dz+nyA u pa bi d+hA ya swA hA/ ka ru ri ni swA hA/ shu pa dz+nyA swA hA/ tsakra NA~M swA hA/ ya me ye swA hA/ oM da tse bi bud d+he b+h+yaHswA hA/ sa~M spe tshe b+h+yoHbud d+he b+h+yaHswA hA/ a du pa du ke b+h+yoHb+h+ya di de swA hA/ bi de ke b+h+yo byA te b+h+yaHswA hA/ bai

d+ha de b+h+yoHbyA de b+h+yaHswA hA/ swa na ni pa dz+nyi ke b+h+yoHbyA de b+h+yaHswA hA/ b+hU mi an ti ri ka sha tsa re b+h+yoHswA hA/ tad ya thA/ oM na tra Ta tra Ta/ tri ti tri ti/ tru tu tru tu/ nA mA ma sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaH sa a pa tra be b+h+yaHrak+Sha rak+Sha ku ru swA hA/ gra sa gra

sa swA hA/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ na maHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya ma hA satwA ya ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ shang ka ri'i sa bon las/ /stong du bzlas nas dri chu dang / /

lhan cig skrangs la byugs pas ni/ /lhog nad drag po 'joms par byed/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /rig sngags rbod gtong bzhom pa yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje

las/ /mgon po don yod zhags pa yi/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungaso/ /na ma s+t+rai yad+h+wa a nu ga ta pra ti te b+h+yaHsarba bud d+ha bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaHna maHpra t+ye ka bud d+hA Ar+ya shA ba ka sa~M g+he b+h+yoHa tI nA ga ta pra t+yud pa

na ni b+h+yaH na maH sa~M myaka ga tA nA~M/ na maH sa~M myaka pra ti pa nA~M/ na maHshA ra dwa tI pu trA ya ma hA ma ti ye/ na maHAr+ya mai t+te ya pra mu khe b+h+yoHma hA bo d+hi satwe na maHsu pra ti ta shai len dra rA dza pra mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
