rten la bskor ba dang / /mchod rten brtsig dang dkyil 'khor ni/ /rnal 'byor yan lag las ldan pas/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir/ /rgyun chad med par brtson pa na/ /dge byed smon lam rgyas pa ni/ /de dag

myur du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de phyir smon lam mchog tu bshad/ /gang la dge spyod g.yel ba yi/ /le lo can ni bdud bzung nas/ /gya tshom smra zhing chos la smod/ /bstan pa 'jig par byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir
dman rigs gdol pa can/ /log spyod can ni ring du song / /ser sna le lo nga rgyal can/ /bag med g.yeng dang bcas pa ni/ /bdud kyi 'ching lam log la~M pa/ /zhugs dang slar la btung bar bya/ /'phags pa

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma'i dra ba zhes bya ba las dngos grub 'byung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas nad dang gnod pa sogs/ /sngags brjod tsam gyis bsal bar bshad/ /

nad gdon gang dang gang la yang / /sngags pas drag tu gsal btab la/ /rang gis rtse gcig sems kyis bzla/ /dang por snying rjer bcas pa yi/ /sngags kyis nad dang gdon las grol/ /de tshe mchod la brtson par bya/ /

smyo nad nyin re ldang ba dang / /nyin gnyis pa 'am nyin gsum pa/ /nyin bzhi nyin bdun ldang ba'i rims/ /'byung po mkha' 'gro sha za 'am/ /smyo byed brjed byed lus srul po/ /'dre gdon drag pos bgyid mod kyang / /

brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sel bar 'gyur/ /yang na srad bu kha dog lnga/ /mdud re sngags re brgya rtsa brgyad/ /mdud ldan mgul lam dpung par gdags/ /kha na ma tho bsag pa yi/ /sgrib kun zhi zhing byang 'gyur na/ /bgeg

sogs nad lta smos ci dgos/ /bde brlab bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /skrangs dang 'bras kyi phreng ba dang / /shu ba phol mig rma mdze dang / /me dbal lhog pa g.yan la sogs/ /ma rungs pa yi nad rnams dang / /ral gri

mda' mdung la sogs pas/ /myos sam de yis nyen pa dang / /sbrul dang sdig pa rtsangs pa dang / /bung ba mchu rnon la sogs pa/ /gdug pa rnams la lan bdun dang / /brgya rtsa brgyad dang stong du brjod/ /yang
na sa ser 'jim pas byugs/ /de yis nad las grol bar nges/ /bgegs sam rlung la sogs pa yi/ /gzhogs gcig phyogs su nad langs sam/ /rna ba 'on nam sna sub na/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa 'am/ /

'bru mar zho dang ru rta dang / /lan bdun brjod nas sku byug dang / /zos shing rna ba snar byugs nas/ /sos par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' che/ /nyi 'od kyis kyang rig sngags 'chang / /

bsrung dang lam 'gro skyab pa'i phyir/ /byin brlabs ldan pa'i tshig 'di gsungs/ /na mo bud d+hA ya gu ra be/ na mo d+harmA ya ta ye ni/ /na maHsang g+hA ya ma hA te/ tri bi yi swA hA na mA/ nyin mtshan dus su 'di brjod pas/ /

sdig kun byang zhing nad rnams zhi/ /lam du bgegs bdud mi phrad cing / /rtag tu sems dga' dam pas 'thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od kyang / /bsrung ba'i don du sngags 'di gsungs/ /sha ma ta he ru sha ho/ /

adz+nya pa te/ su ru te/ sha~M ke Te/ ba ra ma bya te/ su ru Te/ kya la Ta te khi ma te swA hA/ tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la/ /bdun bzlas mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig /na sar btags na nad sel 'gyur/ /gzhan yang yon tan grangs med

'thob/ /sbrul gyi rma ni sgo phye la/ /bdun bzlas rma khar btab na sos/ /seng ge stag gzig dom dred kyis/ /bklags la nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags/ /brjod nas gra khrims can la bskon/ /de ma thag tu rim sel

'gyur/ /blo bur gdon gyis nyen pa la/ /lan bdun brjod pa'i gu gul bdug /ldong ros yungs kar lan tshwa dkar/ /sbyar nas nyi shu rtsa cig brjod/ /nad pa'i mal bzhag nas bdugs na/ /'byung po 'bros te nad las grol/ /

til mas nang du ru rta btsos/ /byugs pas gzhogs nad rna nad dang / /zha grum myur du sel bar byed/ /yang na rtsi mar nyid la bya/ /til mar lte bar bskus pa yis/ /myur du bu thon 'gyur bar nges/ /lcim rtsas sha ma

thon par nges/ /du ru ka dang sbyi mong sbyar/ /snying nad drag po sel bar 'gyur/ /ba rog mo'i lci dron gyis/ /rma khar bslan na mes tshig sos/ /srin bu ring mo snying la za/ /rta dkar gcin la khyor gang 'thung / /des ni srog

chags bud par 'gyur/ /'bras la rams kyi lo ma yis/ /khu ba bskol bas byug par bya/ /bong bu'i rtug pa gsar pa brtsir/ /nyal kar mig du blugs na sos/ /mtshan ma skrangs la skud dkar ro/ /de ku nyi shu rtsa gcig

bzlas/ /brgya rtsa brgyad brjod shu dag dkar/ /dpung par btags pas g.yul las rgyal/ /phug ron ril ma nyi shu brgyad/ /bzlas bcas bskus pas lcag sgrog dang / /shing sgrog la sogs grol bar nges/ /thal ba 'am bye ma

la ni sngags/ /stong bzlas me tog srin bu grol/ /gdon dang yams nad bzlog pa la/ /dri bzang chu la bzlas nas bkrus/ /bu med bu 'dod don du ni/ /stong bzlas ba mar btung bar bya/ /byi ba sbrul dang ru sbal sha /phye ma gtor na

phyugs rnams rengs/ /mar ga ni dang shu dag dang / /lga dang go snyod sbrang rtsi sbyar/ /sngags 'di yis ni shes rab 'phel/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA

ya/ tad+ya thA/ khA hi khA hi/ ba li te swA hA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ /na ma ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pad+me phu ma hA pad+me phu/ pad+ma lo tsa ne phu/ a mo g+ha be te/ na mo a dota ku tra ya/

sa ra sa ra ga tsa ga tsa/ i ma ma ma k+Shi ro ga~M nA sha ya swA hA/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas kyang / /thal bas mig ni phyi rol bsku/ /mig nad thams cad 'joms par 'gyur/ /skud pa dkar po mdud pa bdun/ /sngags bdun bzlas pa'i rna ba yi/ nad

rna~Ms thams cad 'jom par byed/ /gur gum ka ra cha mnyam pas/ /sna'i nad ni sel bar byed/ /a ru ra'i phye ma dang / /sbrang rtsi bsres pa'i 'dag pas ni/ /so yi nad dang lce yi nad/ /thaMd 'jom par shes par bya/ /oM hU~M

shru~M hU~M shu k+She phu/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig chu la bzla/ /'thungs pa'i ma zhu'i gnod pa sel/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM rat+na she/ ma hA tsaN Da a

su ra mar ta ka dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ts+tshin d+ha ts+tshin d+ha/ hu ru hu ru/ ki ri ki ri/ ha na ha na/ sarba dz+wa reM ru dra ka ban d+he na/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sarba gra ha~M swA hA/ sngags 'di mtshal gyis bris nas kyang / /mgul du btags na nad rnams sel/ /

gzhan yang rtsa ba'i sngags gang gis/ /las rnams de dang de la sbyar/ /sbrang bu srin bu sbrul lhog pa/ /g.yen pa shu ba ske nad la/ /sbrang rtsi pi pi ling gis byug /gang zhig brtson du zhugs pa la/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig

bzlas pa la/ /tsan dan 'di gu snying gar byug /gang gis mig nad sel ba la/ /shing dngar chu 'am spos chu 'am/ /la la sha yi khus yis bya/ /rna ba la ni til mar gyis/ /gzhan gyi yi ge gsal ba dang / /'thab mo

shags 'gyed 'gyur ba'i tshe/ /bum pa chu yis gdong pa bkru/ /gang yang byis pa bsrung ba ni/ /seng ldeng phur bu sor bzhi pa/ /pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / /don yod zhags pa'i sngags ring dag /stong rtsa brgyad

du bzlas btags na/ /tshe ring nyid du bde bar spyod/ /ba lang rwa dang po so 'cha/ /shing kun dung sbrul lpags pa dang / /ras bal sa bon drung po dang / /de bzhin du ni ser po gnyis/ /nas kyi phub ma g.yengs pa'i skra/ /

byi la'i rtug pa bri ha ti/ /shugs pa bya rog sgong nga dang / /ba lang rmig pa na le sham/ /da du ra dang lhan cig sbyar/ /de rnams bsres pa'i dud pa yis/ /bgegs rnams sel phyir ru tra yi/ /dud pa bcu

drug zhes bya ba'o/ /pu shel tse dang ba bla dang / /btsan dug gi ni sbrul shun gyis/ /bdugs na rim nad thaMd sel/ /nad gzhan dag kyang sel bar byed/ /ba lang lci ba'i khu bar ni/ /so ma ra dza'i phye ma gdab/ /yi ge

hrI yis byin brlabs nas/ /mgrin pa sngon po'i rtsa ba'i sngags/ /brgya rtsa brgyad brjod 'thungs pas ni/ /dug dang rims nad sel bar byed/ /skyer pa bskol ba'i khu bar ni/ /so ma ra tsa'i phye mar sbyar/ /
ril bu rgya sran tsam gyi tshad/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i sngags brjod nas/ /zos pa tsam gyis dug rigs rnams/ /zos kyang lus la gnod pa med/ /'o mar yung ba srang gcig bskol/ /so ma ra tsa blugs te

blud/ /so so 'chang la ha la'i sngags/ /brgya rtsa brgyad sngags grangs tshang ba/ /brjod de blud na skyugs nas ni/ /dug gis tshug par mi 'gyur ro/ /khyim gyi dud pa rgyam tshwa dang / /skye du dmar rtsa lo mar bcas/ /

phye ma mar sar sbrang rtsi bcas/ /ha ri chen po rtsa ba'i sngags/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btung bar bya/ /sbrul nad thams cad sel bar byed/ /shu dag ru rta a ga ru/ /yung ba bong nga dkar po rnams/ /don yod

zhags pa'i sngags kyis mnye/ /byug pas dug rnams thams cad sel/ /rgyam tshwa srang gang mar srang gnyis/ /gcin srang brgyad dang lhan cig bskol/ /rdo rje chos kyi sngags kyis 'thungs/ /dug nad thams cad sel

bar byed/ /rgyam tshwa tshwa gsum mar srang bzhi/ /sbyar te mi shol sngags brjod nas/ /byugs na reg pa tsam gyis ni/ /sdig pa sbrul gyis zin pa sel/ /ku mu ri dang ser po gnyis/ /lcim tsha myang tshwa spar bcas la/ /

gar dbang sngags dang chu yis btung / /dug nad thams cad sel bar byed/ /ser po gnyis dang ldong ros dang / /go thal gur gum le brgan rtsi/ /pad ma rgyan lung bsngags kyi btung / /dbyig dug thams cad 'joms par byed/ /
gang la gza' dang rgyu skar gyi/ /'tshe ba byung na de bsal phyir/ /pad ma 'dab brgyad maN Dal gyi/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dbus rnams su/ /mgon po 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni/ /mkha' lding gzugs su
'gyur ba la/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bcu gcig gis/ /gus pa'i tshul du mchod byed bkod/ /nyi ma zla ba lag 'dzin pa'i/ /khyab 'jug gis ni byi ba'i gzugs/ /mnan pa'i mkha' lding mig sman mdog /

nor rgyas bu gnyis lha yi gzugs/ /mig gsum ldan pa brjid pa'i lus/ /rin chen lnga yi sder gshog can/ /rdo rje mchu rno khro dang bcas/ /nyi ma bye bas brgyan pa'i 'od/ /snying gar nyi ma 'od 'bar la/ /ga~M yig nag

po sngags kyis bskul/ /spu rnams zings kyis gyur nas kyang / /phyogs bcur rdo rje khyab par 'phro/ /gza' dang rgyu skar mog byas te/ /gdon dang klu rna~Ms sreg par byed/ /thugs rje mi bshol ba yi sngags/ /'brug

sgra lta bur gsal bar brjod/ /gang yang grangs med stong phrag ni/ /las rnams thaMd sngags 'dis 'grub/ /mkha' lding dkar po brjid pa'i lus/ /klu yi gdon las sbyar bar bya/ /de la mgrin pa sngon po yi/ /rtsa ba'i sngags

kyis bskul bas ni/ /sa steng gtum po klu yi gdon/ /du ma nges par sel bar byed/ /klu dang tshangs pa'i srin po bsreg /'gro la mdze nad gtong bar byed/ /mkha' lding dmar po sbrul za ma/ /me tog thod pa kha T+wA~M ga /

g.yon na 'chang ste g.yas pa na/ /ral gri me 'od 'bar ba 'chang / /mgon po seng ge'i sgras skul nas/ /dba' rlabs bskal pa'i me dang mnyam/ /sbrul dang rin chen dbyug tho can/ /mkha' lding sha za'i gdon la ni/ /mgon po

ha ra'i sngags kyis bskul/ /mkha' 'gro'i gdon la mkha' lding ni/ /ljang gu ral gri phur pa 'chang / /pad ma ral gri sngags kyis bskul/ /las rna~Ms gang dang gang la yang / /sngags dang phyag rgya ldan par bya'o/ /ci ltar mos te phyag rgyar

bcas/ /lus kyi phyag rgya sems kyi rgya/ /ngo bo nyid kyis mtshon pa yi/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas rgyas 'debs 'gyur/ /da ni phyag rgya bshad par bya/ /sku yi mdun du langs nas kyang / /rkang pa g.yas pa yid tsam skum/ /

lag gnyis so sor thur du brkyang / /gung srin so sor mthil du bkug /mtheb mdzub dag ni so sor brkyang / /gru khug lag mthil mdun du bstan/ /'gro 'am 'dug kyang dgra dpung las/ /rgyal phyir sngags 'di brjod par bya/ /

na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ /na ma ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a ba te pa ra ba te/ e h+ye hi swA hA/ yang na sngon ltar lus bsrang ste/ /snying gar thal sbyar spro ba snol/ /

mdzub mo gnyis sbrengs rtse mo sprad/ /mtheb gnyis mdzub tshigs dang por bkug /lag mthil cung zad ma reg pa/ /gzungs sngags gang brjod phyag bya'o/ /bgegs kyi 'tshe ba 'byung ba'i tshe/ /sngags dang phyag rgya 'dis

bsal bya/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba d+harmA Ni maN Da lA ya/ e h+yi he pa ra ma shud d+ha satwA ya swA hA/ yang na sgom la 'jug pas

ni/ /thog mar phyag rgya 'di bcing ngo / /pus btsugs spyi bor thal mo sbyar/ /mdzub gnyis bkug la rtse sprad nas/ /de la mtheb gnyis sbyar bar bya/ /'di ni bdud las rgyal bar nges/ /yang na lag gnyis rgyab sprad nas/ /

sor mo rtse rnams reg par bya/ /mtheb gnyis brkyang nas mdzub snang sbyar/ /smin mtshams su ni gzhag par bya/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA

ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba duSh+Ta na mo badzrA ya me swA hA/ khyad par du ni lha mthong 'gyur/ /yang na 'breng ste mnyam bzhag rgya/ /snying gar bzhag la sngags 'di brjod/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/

bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba de ba A na le swA hA/ glo bur rtsod pa rgyal byed yin/ /yang ni 'greng ste rting pa sprad/ /lag gnyis 'jigs byed tshul du bya/ /rtsa sngags gang
rung brjod pas ni/ /ting 'dzin yan lag brtan par 'gyur/ /yang na pad ma rgyan lung gi/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag gnyis thal sbyar srin lag gis/ /mthe bo'i sen mo mnan byas te/ /mthe'u

chung rtse mo'i gung mo sprad/ /gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya ste/ /dgug na mdzub rtse bsgul zhing dgug /yang na g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dgug /g.yon pa slar btang bya ba'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya

ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM brah+ma e h+ye hi swA hA/ yang na sor rtse rnams bskyed na/ /mdzub mo g.yab la lha chen rnams/ /yang na phyag rgya 'di bcas la/ /nyi zla

gzas bzung dus su ni/ /gzungs sngags ba mar la bzlas nas ni/ /phyag rgya btab nas zos pas ni/ /shes rab 'phel dang tshe 'phel 'gyur/ /nad med gzugs bzang 'thob par nges/ /'grang ste rkang gshib thal sbyar

nas/ /mtheb gnyis lag pa'i nad bkug pa/ /snying gar gzhag bya spyan ras gzigs/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i 'khor lo'i rgya/ /mchod sogs las kyi sngon 'gro ba'o/ /de bzhin sdig bshags la yang ngo / /mdzub bkug

mthe bo sen mor bcas/ /lag gnyis rgyab sprad gar dbang rgya/ /thal sbyar mtheb mdzub so sor brkyang / /mgrin pa sngon po'i phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub mo gnyis bkug lhag ma brkyang / /mi gi shol ba yi phyag rgya'o/ /

lag gnyis rgyab sprad mtheb gnyis brkyang / /bdug pa bzang la sngags 'di bzlas/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na mo rat+na sha ri tsan

dra a la~M kA ra marga te dza su pra tsa ka bi sha rA dzA ya/ tad ya thA/ oM rat+ne rat+ne/ ta ta sha rat+na/ ta ta sha rat+na pri te ma he rat+na pra b+ha te/ rat+na te ga ra swA hA/ snga bar brgya rtsa brgyad brjod do/ /nor yang thob pa'i gter rnyed 'gyur/ /'gro
gzhan bdag la byams 'dod na/ /so shing la ni nyi shu gcig /ldob skyen 'dod pa shu dag la/ /stong rtsa brgyad bzlas snying gar bsku/ /gang bshad phyag rgya dang bcas pas/ /gdug pa'i sngags 'dis bgegs

kyang 'bros/ /na maHsarba bud d+ha d+harma sa~M g+ha ya/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM hu pi hu pi/ ka pa
du pi/ pra gA ya ni swA hA/ rnam grangs bdug pas sangs rgyas bdug /lha rnams dag kyang mchod par bya/ /yan lag g.yas pa'i mthe bo ni/ /lag mthil bzhag nas sor mos dgab/ /rna ltag phyar nas mdzub
mo ni/ /brkyang bskum bskul bas spro ba dang / /g.yon pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya ste/ /dus ma yin par 'chi sogs bzlog /lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas kyang / /sor mo bsnol te bkod pa las/ /mthe
'o mthe'u chung so sor ni/ /sprad de sprad pa shes rab rgya/ /oM sarba sa~M sho d+ha ni swA hA/ de bzhin bsnol te bkan pa yi/ /gang gnyis nang du gshibs bsgreng ba/ /mar me'i rgya ste sngags 'di'o/ /

oM dI pa ta bo tsa na swA hA/ de nyid sbubs nas gung mo gnyis/ /rtse sprad sbrengs pa bdug spos so/ /oM d+hu pa d+ha ta swA hA/ rting sprad so so rtsengs sar dgug /byug pa'i tshul ni byug pa'i rgya/ /
oM d+ha le be t+ya swA hA/ rting sprad sor mo gyen du bgrod/ /zhal nas 'thor tshul bshos kyi rgya/ /oM ne bi d+yi pro k+Sha ta~M swA hA/ lag gnyis bkug nas rtse brgyad sprad/ /mthe bong gyen du yan

pa ni/ /na bza' dam pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM b+ha sa ra ni swA hA/ snyim pa kha phye bteg pa'i tshul/ /ro ma stsal pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM A~M kru~M hrI/ sa ka la g+ha na pa ri wa re na~M/ pa ri ke ra a a a pa ta raM te/ a ba pa raM ti/ a pa ta raM ta

sha di ka lo ka pA la/ sa pa ri wa ri b+h+yaHi da~M ba liM gr-i h+Nan+tu khA daM tu pi ban+tu/ ya thai ba~M ya theSh+TaM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ saM trip+ta sarba satwa ni/ shAn+tiM ku ru/ puSh+Ti ku ru kha shaM ku ru/ A pa ra Na ku ru gupa tiM/ ka ro t+tu kurbAn+tu hU~M hU~M phaT/ ar+ya a

ba lo ki te shwa ra s+ya/ A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Ad+yA nud pan+na twAta oM AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ oM hrI dzaM b+ha la dza len drA ya swA hA/ longs spyod rtag phyir gnod gnas la/ /chu gtsang rtag tu sbyin par bya/ /oM AH

hrI lo ke shwa ra hU nu smr-i ti ka rA ya swA hA/ yi dgas rnams la sra ra zas/ /ci phyir chu dang bcas pa stsal/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnal 'byor grogs/ /lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang / /'byung po yi dgas kun brtson 'gyur/ /sems

kyi lcags kyu ldan bya ste/ /nyon mongs sems la rab drangs te/ /lha klu 'bum phrag sems dga' ba'i/ /kun slong byang chub rin chen gyi/ /las la bsgyur ba'i lhag bsam bskyed/ /mdzad pa rgya che kun grub 'gyur/ /'phags

pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma dra ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud las sngags kyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' che/ /nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba/ /'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa zhig /mchod pa'i bkod pa chen po dang / /bstod pa'i dbyangs dang bcas pa yis/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas/ /skor ba du ma byas

nas kyang / /phyag 'tshal gsang bstod phyogs gcig 'khod/ /pus brtsugs thal sbyar 'di skad gsol/ /mgon po yon tan kun gyi rgyal/ /ye shes rmad kyi 'byung gnas gtso/ /thar pa'i lam chen nyi shar rgyal/ /

'dren pa rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan dpe mthar thug med pa'i sku/ /gzi brjid rgya che mkha' khyab la/ /blo gros yangs pa'i nam mkha' can/ /sku yi gsang ba phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs dbyangs du ma bsam mi khyab/ /
nam mkha' yangs pa'i mtha' bkang nas/ /tshad med yan lag bcu gnyis byung / /gsung gi gsang ba phyag 'tshal lo/ /ting 'dzin rnam thar bsam gtan sgo/ /bsam yas bsam du med bsam pas/ /bsam mi

khyab pa'i shes rab dang / /thugs rje'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba'i nyon mongs 'ching gcod pa'i/ /ma rig g.yul las rgyal byed pa/ /kun rtog dra ba sel ba yi/ /sgron ma de ring bshad du gsol/ /byis rnams
mun pa'i 'obs su ltung / /nyan thos 'dod chags tshig gis skrag /rang rgyal gsang ba'i bzod dang ldan/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'ching bas 'jigs/ /nyon mongs mnga' bdag gsang sngags la/ /shes rab snying

rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /bag chags bcas pa gtan spong ba'i/ /thabs mchog du ma bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/ /'od zer phyogs bcur rgyas byas nas/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs chen gsung snyan pas/ /

nam mkha'i khams chen rab bkang nas/ /shes rab snying rjer 'brel ba yi/ /sbyor ba'i cho ga du ma rnams/ /bsdus pa'i don du byas pa 'di/ /nyi ma'i snying po nyan pa ni/ /legs so byang chub sems dpa' che/ /dpal dang
ldan pa khyod legs so/ /rtse gcig gus dang bcas pa yi/ /sems kyis legs nyon yid la zung / /nyams dga' bde ba'i sa phyogs su/ /shin du dga' ba'i sa las ni/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa bya/ /gru bzhi

sgo bzhi rta babs bcas/ /shar ram lho yi sgo gtod bya/ /dkar po ser po dmar po dang / /ljang ku'i tshon gyis bri bar bya/ /dbus su pad ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /dkar po'i lte bar 'tsham bar dmar/ /mu khyud gnyis dang ldan

pa'o/ /gser dngul zangs sam sa nyid la/ /bum pa lto yangs mgrin pa phra/ /kha g.yel zhabs tshod zhum pa la/ /shin tu gtsang mar bkrus nas kyang / /ga pur gur gum cu gang dang / /gla rtsi gi'u wang chu yis bkang / /

bya gri seng gri ha sa der/ /ka ri kar ni de ba ko/ /nas 'bras til gro mon sran dang / /gser dngul byi ru mu tig dang / /man shel yin te rin chen lnga/ /bum par stsal nas ras dkar gyis/ /mgul pa bcings nas kha

rgyan yang / /dri zhim shing lo me tog gzhag /me tog phreng dang bcas pa de/ /pad ma'i dbus su bzhag nas kyang / /rgya mtsho chen por 'khrugs pa nas/ /dpag bsam shing chen 'bras bur bcas/ /'jig rten dbang
gis gang ba yi/ /sngags kyang mtha' yas khyab dmigs nas/ /sngags kyi mthu yis sangs rgyas nas/ /dgongs pa rgya chen skyes gyur te/ /legs so bkra shis 'bab par 'gyur/ /rgyal sras rnams dang
rig pa yi/ /lha mo tshogs dang glu len dang / /bkra shis du ma brjod par 'gyur/ /de tshe mkha' la ye shes kyi/ /'od zer bye ba phrag brgya yis/ /shing chen yongs su smin pa las/ /bdud rtsi char chen
'bebs par 'gyur/ /'jig rten skyong la gtor ma sbyin/ /rgyal dang rgyal sras mchod par bya/ /skar ma la sogs 'bab pa 'am/ /tshes gcig nas ni nya yi bar/ /sngags kyi phreng ba brjod par bya/ /

lha la yang yang bskor bar bya/ /las rnams gang dang gang la yang / /lha yi dbang gyur sbyar bar bya/ /de dang de ni las rnams la/ /ci bde bar yang sbyar bar bya/ /phran tshegs las la spyan ma'i sngags/ /
lhog pa 'brum bu la sogs la/ /mi bshol ba yi sngags kyi sbyar/ /gdon rigs bzlog la gar dbang ste/ /byad stems rig sngags bzlog pa la/ /don yod zhags pa'i sngags kyis bkru/ /shes rab

'phel ba rdo rje chos/ /klu nad ha la ha las sel/ /tshe 'phel pad ma rgyan lung ste/ /mgrin sngon sngags kyis dpal 'phel byed/ /ha ri chen po bdug spos te/ /gdong bcu gcig pas glo bur sel/ /seng ge sgras
ni mdze nad sel/ /rnal 'byor yo byad 'dod pas ni/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i sngags kyis bkru/ /bkra shis rol mo du ma dang / /gtsang sbra gos gsar ldan pa yis/ /snyan pa'i gdangs dang ldan pas bkru/ /myur

du sgrib pa 'byang ba dang / /'dod yon kun grub sngags phreng ni/ /gang dang gang yang sbyar bar 'gyur/ /phran tshegs gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /zla ba gzas bzung gyur pa'i tshe/ /mar srang gcig ni dngul snod bzhug /
sku gzugs mdun bzhag sngags brjod nas/ /zla ba sos nas mar blangs te/ /zos saM lus la byugs pa yis/ /nad rnams zhi zhing bde bar 'gyur/ /ldong ros ge'u wang cha mnyam pas/ /sku yi mdun
bzhag sngags stong bzla/ /chus sbrus dpral bar thig le ni/ /khams gsum mthong zhing 'dod gsum 'grub/ /chu dron sbyar nas lus bkrus na/ /nad dang bgegs rnams dag par 'gyur/ /
bse 'bras la ni brgya rtsa brgyad/ /bzlas nas khro zhal g.yas la byug /dgra dpung phyogs su bstan na ni/ /dgra g.yul shin du nyes par 'gyur/ /bal bu 'bras bu sngags rer bcas/ /
bal bu le la brgya rtsa brgyad/ /sku yi drung du bsregs pas ni/ /mi yams phyugs nad thams cad 'chad/ /skud pa gtsang ma mdog dmar po/ /sngags re btab pa'i mdud pa bdun/ /
zhal gcig steng zhal btags nas ni/ /nad pa la btags rims nad zhi/ /sngags re mdud pa nyi shu gcig /mdun zhal steng bzhag blangs btags pas/ /mkha' 'gro 'byung po ro langs gdon/ /
drag pos zin pa 'joms par byed/ /gal te des kyang ma sos na/ /mdud re brgya rtsa brgyad brjod nas/ /zhal gcig mdun zhal dbur btags te/ /blangs te btags na nges par grol/ /sdug bsngal

nad pa yun rings gdungs/ /khyim du 'dre gdon 'jigs zhugs nas/ /'bru re sngags re thang 'brom 'bras/ /sku mdun brgya rtsa brgyad grangs te/ /gong ltar bsgrubs pa'i skud pa yang / /lus la btags na grol bar nges/ /

mi mdza' ba dang 'khrug pa dang / /byad stems drag po bzlog pa la/ /sku la spos dang me tog mchod/ /bi nA ya yi gzugs mdun du/ /bra bo'i 'bras bu dgra ming bsreg /sngags re mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad/ /mdud ldan

g.yon gyi khro zhal gdags/ /zhag bzhi lon nas sku las dgrol/ /mdud pa re re'i bar du ni/ /sngags re brjod cing bcang bar bya/ /bdag la sdang byed skyabs su 'ong / /rdzas dang sngags kyi nus pa'o/ /brtson pa'i bar

chad bsal ba ni/ /tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la/ /mdud re sngags re brgya rtsa brgyad/ /mdud nas mdud bzhag steng btags pa/ /zhag gcig lon dgrol lus btags na/ /las rnams bkra shis tshul du 'grub/ /gang
zhig bsgribs pa'i gshegs ldan pas/ /las gang 'dod bzhin mi 'grub cing / /dus dus bkra mi shis byung na/ /gtsang sbra bum chu bzang po gnyis/ /brgya rtsa brgyad bgrangs re re brjod/ /dang pos sku

gzugs bkru bar bya/ /gnyis pas bi na ya ka bkru/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sngags btab nas/ /rang nyid de nas bkru bar bya/ /bar chad byang nas 'dod kun 'grub/ /ci ltar sprul pa'i gdon bsal phyir/ /byi la'i

mgo rus thal ba dang / /sa bzang chu gtsang sbrus pa'i sa/ /byi la yi ni gzugs byas te/ /sku yi mdun du bzhag nas kyang / /khro zhal g.yon par srad bus gdags/ /rta mgrin sngags ni stong phrag brab/ /gzungs rgya

bzlas pa'i ral gri yis/ /dum bu brgya rtsa brgyad du tub/ /dum bu re re sngags re dang / /dong gi nang du dor bar bya/ /de dag gnod pa gtan du sel/ /mig nad sna tshogs ma rungs la/ /'bras bu gsum pa zhib tu btags/ /

sbrang dkar khye'u 'tsho nu zhor bcas/ /bu tshas gsar pa'i bud med dang / /khyi phag dag gis ma mthong byas/ /thum po 'dzum pa'i zhal la btags/ /sngags stong bzlas nas sbyar ba des/ /mig du blugs na mig
'bras skye/ /mig nad thams cad sel bar byed/ /mig rnon dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ /lhag ma ma yin khron pa'i chus/ /ga bur gu gul cha mnyam bskol/ /khyor gang 'dag par 'gyur ba de/ /rtsa ba'i
zhal gdangs sngags stod bzlas/ /bkrol nas ril bu byas mid na/ /ha la ha la'i dug 'joms 'gyur/ /glang po dkar po'i gi'u wang ni/ /mthing bum bzhag nas sku yi mdun/ /stong rtsa brgyad bzlas yan
lag bskul/ /dpral bar thig le byas gyur na/ /lha klu 'byung po mi rnams dga'/ /khyo shug mi mthun brtags pa la/ /ngur pa'i mjug sgro sku'i mdun du/ /stong bzlas lag tu blangs na 'dum/ /chu skam pa

'am char med na/ /ling ga'i drung du sku bzhugs la/ /cher mchod nas ni sku'i mdun du/ /stong brjod chu skyes char chen 'bebs/ /gang zhig char che ring 'dod ni/ /'gog par snyoms zhugs phyag rgya bcing / /sku yi

mdun du rtag par ni/ /a ka ru nag bdugs pa sogs/ /mchod pas rgyun du mchod bya zhing / /brgyad nas nya bar sngags stong brjod/ /mig gi mngon shes bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /dri zhim dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la/ /

rgyal mtshan ba dan kha dog bzhi/ /bla re yol ba dkar po yi/ /dbus su pad ma lnga bris te/ /ring bsrel ldan pa'i sku gdung bzhugs/ /tsan dan dkar po'i dri chu dang / /bdug pas rgyun du mchod par bya/ /ba mdog

ser skya'i mar gyi ni/ /sgron ma'i phreng bas mchod par bya/ /man shi ri ka ku shu dang / /pad ma dmar dang sngon po dang / /rgya mtsho chab kyi dbu ba dang / /nya rgun nag po'i myu gu dang / /ma brlabs pa dang gu gul dang / /ku ba na

sa dang gi'u wang dang / /gur gum dmar dang ser po dang / /tsha ba gsum dang cha mnyam brdungs/ /de rnams phyed tshad gla rtsi dang / /ga bur stsal nas re re'i tshad/ /sngags ni stong phrag re re'i grangs/ /sku yi mdun du brjod
par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor dbus bzhag nas/ /sngags khrir bcas te nya la ni/ /zangs kyi za ma tog tu stsal/ /sku yi steng zhal btags nas ni/ /mchod pa byas nas gsol ba gdab/ /'khar ba'i thur mas

mig tu stsal/ /ling thog gam ni mchi ma 'dzag /sprin dkar sprin dmar g.yos pa dang / /klad pa na dang mig nad dang / /glo bur long dang thib pa sel/ /nyin gnyis bskus na lus kyi nad/ /bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi sel bar
'gyur/ /gsum pa gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur/ /bzhi pas sgrib pa thams cad byang / /lngas ni rtsod pa'i g.yul las rgyal/ /drug pas rmi ngan byad stems sel/ /bdun pas glo bur 'chi ba med/ /bdun
phrag gnyis kyis dbang phyug 'thob/ /gsum gyis 'byung po dbang du 'gyur/ /bzhi pas gnod sbyin lnga pas klu/ /lnga pas lha mi srin po rnams/ /drug pas mkha' lding ri bdun lha/ /bdun pas nag po chen po

'grub/ /brgyad pas ma mo dgus gter mthong / /bcu pas 'gro ba'i sman par 'gyur/ /bcu gcig lha mo'i khang par phyin/ /bcu gnyis rig 'dzin drang srong khyim/ /bcu gsum klu yi khang par phyin/ /bcu bzhi sum

bcu gsum pa'i gnas/ /bcwa lnga mtshan mo kun mthong ste/ /bcu drug khams gter mthong bar nges/ /bcu bdun rdo rje sa gzhi dang / /rlung gi dkyil 'khor thog pa med/ /bcwa brgyad pas ni nyi ltar mgyog / /bcu dgu rgyal sras kun mthong 'gyur/ /

nyi shus spyan ras gzigs nyid kyis/ /lung bstan dam chos bshad par 'gyur/ /nyi shu gcig gis gzugs khams phyin/ /mngon shes lnga dang ldan par 'gyur/ /lo gcig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /zhing khams du mar phyin pa

dang / /dam chos nyan dang zhing spyod 'gyur/ /mig sman sbyor ba bla med 'di/ /sangs rgyas mu stegs can la gsang / /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sna tshogs sman gyi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag dang 'gro ba ma lus pa'i/ /'dod

pa'i don kun 'grub byed nyon/ /ga pur gla rtsi gi'u wang dang / /gur gum dzA ti li shi dang / /ka tan la dang sug smel dang / /tsan dan dkar dang pad ma dang / /gser gyi me tog ud pal sngo/ /re re la yang sngags stong bzla/ /

sbrang rtsi dkar po lhan cig sbru/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su sku yi zhal/ /dbu ma la ni gdags bya ste/ /tshes gcig nas ni bcu bzhi'i bar/ /nyin re sngags stong brjod par bya/ /mchod pa rgya cher mchod par bya/ /bstod

dang gsol ba gdab par bya/ /dge slong dge tshul dge bsnyen gang / /bcwa lnga'i nyin par lnga stong bzla/ /de nas gtsang ma'i snod bzhag ste/ /dgos pa gang dang gang la yang / /lha ni de dang de dag sbyar/ /gang la bgeg kyi
gnod gyur nas/ /pad ma gar gyi sngags kyis bdun/ /'go ba'i nad yams bsal ba dang / /ha la ha la'i sngags bzlas pas/ /gos la sogs pa bdug par bya/ /gzhan dag dga' bar 'dod pas ni/ /yid bzhin

nor bu'i phreng sngags kyis/ /mig gi steng du byug par bya/ /rgyal po rgyal mo la sogs pa/ /pho mo dbang du bya 'dod na/ /rdo rje chos kyi phreng sngags kyis/ /dpral bar thig le bya ba'o/ /mdze la sogs pa'i nad la ni/ /

seng ge sgra'i phreng sngags kyis/ /lus la reg pa bde bar byug /long du zhugs pa'i nad la ni/ /ha ri chen po'i sngags dang chus/ /rang gi khong du btung bar bya/ /byad stems rig sngags bzlog pa la/ /don yod zhag pa'i

sngags kyis bdug /dug nad sel la mgrin sngon te/ /sgrib pa sbyong ba'i don du ni/ /gdong bcu gcig pa nyid kyis sbyar/ /rgyal srid thob par byed pa ni/ /mgon po pad ma rgyan lung ngo / /de nas sbyor ba

bshad bya ba/ /'byung po sha za mkha' 'gro dang / /lus srul po dang brjid byed kyis/ /nyin gcig nas ni nyin bdun bar/ /glo bur ba yi rims rnams dang / /rtag pa'i rims dang drag po'i rims/ /brtun byed la sogs

rims rigs dang / /glo bur ba dang rtag pa'i gdon/ /nad drag po ni ji snyed dang / /dug rigs rims dang lba ba dang / /'bras dang lhog pa me dbal dang / /shu ba rngo dang 'brum bu'i rigs/ /phol mig me dbal bal ldog

sogs/ /mngon du gang dang gang snang la/ /sngags stong bzlas pa'i 'jim pa ni/ /sku zhal dbus la btags nas ni/ /mchod pas mchod de sngags khri brjod/ /tshes gcig nas ni tshes brgyad bar/ /gsol ba yang ni

gdab byas nas/ /tshes dgu'i snga dro dgrol bar bya/ /bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod/ /'bras phye ba mar 'bru bzang rnams/ /shing rtsi shi 'am brgya rtsa brgyad/ /bsgrags pas nad yams gnod pa zhi/ /nad la mar

lhag nyung zhig btung / /nad gzer gang yang 'joms par 'gyur/ /yang na 'bru men phye ma 'am/ /sa 'am spra tshil gzugs byas te/ /srad bus khro ba'i zhal btags nas/ /rig sngags brgya rtsa brgyad brjod de/ /

ral gris gtubs nas sbyin sreg bya/ /brgya phrag lngas ni sdang byed nyams/ /yang na dug gis gzugs brnyan btum/ /dug khrag nim pa'i shing la bsreg /drug bcu rtsa bzhi grangs kyis ni/ /tshar bcad pa yi dbang du

'gyur/ /'byung po drag po zhen pa la/ /gu gul yungs kar de ltar bsreg /bal po se'u lcug ma la/ /bu ram sbrang rtsi zho mar sbag /sku'i mdun du bsreg pas ni/ /'go ba'i nad yam 'chad par 'gyur/ /gu gul dkar po nyi shu

gcig /bsregs na byang chub sems dpa' 'gugs/ /zho mar sbrang rtsi lung tang shing / /nyi shu rtsa gcig sku mdun bsreg /sa chen rgyal sras kun mnyam pa'i/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po des rnyed 'gyur/ /gang gi bsod

nams rgyas 'dod na/ /dri bzang chu dang sa gtsang la/ /gru bzhi khru gang dkyil 'khor bya/ /dri bzang shing la khru gang brtsig /man 'dzu sha ka yungs kar sbrang / /'o ma zho mar a ka ru/ /tsan dan dkar po dmar po dang / /dri zhim mtho gang tshad kyi zhing / /'bru bzang

tshad dang bcas pa dag /dang por sngags stong bzlas nas kyang / /brgya rtsa brgyad du bsgrags pa yis/ /tshe ring nad med rgyal srid 'thob/ /stong gis 'jig rten pa dag 'grub/ /khris ni 'dod pa'i lha yin te/ /'bum gyis

gzugs khams mngon du gyur/ /sa yas rgyal sras kun mthong zhing / /mngon shes drug dang ldan par 'gyur/ /bye bas rgyal ba kun mthong zhing / /zhing khams du ma spyod par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang phran tshegs las rnams

la/ /ci srid nyi shu rtsa gcig nas/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du sbyor/ /sngags dang lha la sems brtan bya/ /nad yams drag po bsal ba la/ /gtso bor 'bras bu gsum bsreg go/ gdon chen rnams ni bsal ba la/ /

gu gul sgog pa rnga mo'i sha /brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg par bya/ /rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /phra mo nad dang gdon rigs la/ /dur ba yungs kar mchog tu bshad/ /'bru rnams gang dang gang 'dod la/ /'bru rig
de nyid sbyin sreg bya/ /char pa dbab par 'dod pas ni/ /tsam pa ka dang rnam gsum dang / /mngar gsum nA ga ge sar dang / /dbang po lag gi sbyin sreg ni/ /ci 'dod char pa 'bab par 'gyur/ /gal te bcad
par 'dod pas ni/ /thal ba de dang yungs kar gyis/ /nan tan phyogs bzhir gar dbang gi/ sngags kyis yang yang gtor bar bya/ /yungs kar zho mar sbrang rtsi dang / /'bras yos kyis ni byis pa sos/ /
gdon nam rims las 'jigs pa dang / /khyim bsrung bar ni 'dod pa yis/ /pad ma dmar po'i sbyin sreg ni/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig kho na bya/ /sems bzang gnyugs ring 'dod pas ni/ /tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin
sreg bya/ /phran tshegs yams nad sel ba la/ /lo ma tsam gyi sbyin sreg bya/ /phyugs nad sel bar 'dod pa'i tshe/ /'o ma me tog dkar bcas bsreg /nad dang gdon bcas sel ba la/ /mngar gsum 'bru bzang
ga pur bcas/ /dur ba dkar po'i yams shing rnams/ /dri bzang byugs pas nad rnams sel/ /cho ga de ltar ldan pas ni/ /sna nad ru rta 'bru mar byug /yang na gre bar sngags bcas gdags/ /byis pa gdon

gyis nyen pa la/ /'bru mar ram ni srad bu bya/ /dud 'gro la ni chu nyid dam/ /yang na srad bu bya ba ste/ /rtsi mar dag gis mchog tu 'gyur/ /sbyor rnams gang dang gang la yang / /sku byad mtshan dpe ldan pa ni/ /
me long nang gi gzugs ltar dmigs/ /gsol ba btab pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /dang po skye mched drug ldan sems/ /thun mong rigs can sra ba'i khams/ /gnyis pa mos dang ldan pa ni/ /thun mong kun du

zhugs pa'i rigs/ /gsum pa rig pa'i rtags ldan pa/ /rig 'dzin gsang sngags 'chang ba'i rigs/ /bzhi pa lhag sems mthun ldan zhing / /gsang sngags sngon du gyur pa yi/ /lnga pa blang dor med pa'i sems/ /drug pa
bdag gzhan dbyer med sems/ /bdun pa chos rnams rgyal ba'i sems/ /brgyad pa 'phags pa'i bden pa'i sems/ /dgu pa rten 'brel zab snang sems/ /bcu pa mtshan bral grub pa'i sems/ /bcu gcig mtshan

bral snang ba'i sems/ /bcu gnyis chos kyi sgo yi sems/ /bcu gsum lhag par 'byung ba'i sems/ /bcu bzhi shes bya mthar thug sems/ /rgyas dang gsal dang khyab pa dang / /rtag dang 'gyur med gya nom pa'i/ /

gnas skabs bcu bzhir rab tu rtogs/ /sems rtogs gyur nas sangs rgyas chos/ /rgyud kun du ni rgyal bas bshad/ /'od zer lcags kyu khyud mo'i bar tu ni/ /spros pas lha 'bum phrag dge kun slong sems/ /dkar po

skyes nas byang chub rin chen gling / /thob mdzad blos bsgyur 'di ni ngo mtshar che/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma dra ba zhes bya ba las sku la rten pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste dgu
pa'o// // de nas 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshogs/ /rgya chen rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /shar lho mtshams na bzhugs pa yi/ /nya na ka zhes la sogs pa/ /drang srong tshogs rnams mgrin gcig tu/ /bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad gsol/ /oM kun mkhyen ye shes nyi ltar lha/ /mtshan dpe du mas brgyan mdzad pa/ /bdud las rgyal ba rkang gnyis mchog /'dren pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhi ba chags bral 'od gsal

ba/ /rgyun chad med pa'i 'khor lo'i tshul/ /skye rga na 'chi las sgrol zhing / /rnam dag bsgrub gsum chos phyag 'tshal/ /sa chen sa chen gzhan rnams kyang / /sa la 'dren mdzad tshogs chen rdzogs/ /rgyun

mi 'chad du sku 'byung ba/ /thal sbyar pus btsugs phyogs gcig 'khod/ /de nas rgyal ba kun gyi yab/ /dbang phyug chen po mchog gi lha/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje can/ /'gro la thugs brtse'i slad du ni/ /rig

sngags bla na med pa gsung / /sngags de myur du 'grub pa dang / /skongs dang ngag la sel ba'i phyir/ /me yi las la brten pa'i phyir/ /sbyor ba rim pa bshad du gsol/ /de skad gsol nas drang srong tshogs/ /phyag

'tshal bskor ba byas nas kyang / /mchod pa'i char chen phab pa ste/ /thal sbyar pus btsugs phyogs gcig 'khod/ /de nas rgyal sras kun gyi yab/ /'gro ba'i gnyen gcig 'dren pa'i gtso/ /sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga 'di/ /

nan tan du ni bka' stsal to/ /sa bzang dri bzang chur bcas pas/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa bya/ / bud shing 'o ma can rnams ni/ /me tog bzang po'i shing la bsreg /gdon nad zhi bar 'dod pas ni/ /'bras bu
gsum sogs shing rnams bsreg /gdon phran la ni mngar gsum dang / /dur ba dkar po bsregs pas zhi/ /rmi lam ngan dang ltas ngan gang / /'bras phye mar sngags sel bar byed/ /gos dang snod bcad rdzas dang

lus/ /gzhan grib ngan pas gos pa la/ /'bras phye mar dang spos dkar dang / /me tog dkar po bsreg par bya/ /ting lo byid kyi me tog bsreg /mig nad thams cad sel bar byed/ /ma su li ma rtsa bar bcas/ /bsreg

na rna ba'i nad sel 'gyur/ /tsan dan gla rtsi ba mar bsregs/ /sna yi nad rnams thams cad sel/ /mu zi gu gul ri lu bsregs/ /so dang lce yi nad sel 'gyur/ /so na~M dza dang ka ku ra/ /bsregs pas ske nad 'joms

par byed/ /sbrang rtsi tsan dan sha ka ra/ /bsreg pas glo nad sel bar byed/ /'bras bu gsum dang zho sha lnga/ /bsregs pas snying nad sel bar byed/ /'u su sbrang dang byi dang ka /bsregs pas mchin pa'i nad sel 'gyur/ /
me tog kha dog lnga bsregs na/ /pho ba la sogs nang grol nad/ /ma lus thams cad zhi bar byed/ /lus mdzes pa yang thob par 'gyur/ /nor 'dod pas ni seng ldeng mer/ /ba ser zho dang mar bsreg

bya/ /gos mdog gang dang gang 'dod la/ /de dang mtshungs pa'i me tog dang / /srad bu sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /shing mdog de dang mthun pa yi/ /dri zhim dag la bsreg par bya/ /rnyed 'gyur the tshom mi bya'o/ /pri yang ku

dang ka ling ka /pad+ma'i ze ba yal sdong la/ /bsregs cing gsol ba gdab pa ni/ /gter gyi longs spyod rgyas par 'gyur/ /'bras dang myu gu'i 'bras bu sogs/ /bsreg na longs spyod brtan par 'gyur/ /'dan 'dod pa la dang 'bras
bu gsum/ /brgya bsregs bu dang bu mo 'phel/ /'bras yos 'phel bar 'dod pas kyang / /sri ka 'dza ti me tog dkar/ /ba dkar 'o ma zho mar bcas/ /bsregs pas 'khor dang dmag dpung 'phel/ /de 'bum grangs

kyis rgyal srid 'thob/ /mngar gsum bil ba'i 'bras bu la/ /'bum gyis rang nyid rgyal por 'gyur/ /sngags mthu rgyas pa'i don du ni/ /nim pa'i shing la mar dang ni/ /yungs kar dkar po sbrang bcas la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad

du bsreg par bya/ /gang gis rgyal po 'khor dang bcas/ /dbang du bya bar 'dod pa yis/ /yungs kar rgyal ba'i yungs kar bcas/ /rgya sran drug du bsreg par bya/ /gnod sbyin mo rnams dbang 'dod na/ /mya ngan med

pa'i yam shing la/ /'bras bu gsum dang gur gum ni/ /stong phrag gcig tu bsreg par bya/ /gnod sbyin tshogs dbang byed pa la/ /'bras bu gsum pa'i shing la ni/ /'bras bu gsum dang gu gul la/ /stong phrag gnyis su bsreg par bya/ /lha

rnams dbang du bya 'dod pas/ /a ru ra yi shing sar la/ /'o ma zho mar sbrang rtsi la/ /sum stong bsreg pas lha dbang 'gyur/ /bud med dbang du 'dod pas ni/ /til dang 'bras sogs phub ma la/ /'bras dang rang byung brgya rtsa brgyad/ /

bsreg pas bzang mo dbang du 'gyur/ /byis pa dbang du 'dod pas ni/ /pri yang ku yi sbyin sreg bya/ /las rnams gang dang gang la yang / /de dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis sbyor/ /zhi ba zhi ba'i yid kyis te/ /skal bzang blo ni rgyas

pa la/ /chags dang 'dun sems ldan pas ni/ /dbang du 'gyur la the tshom med/ /khro dang bcas pa'i yid kyis ni/ /drag po'i las su 'gyur ba yod/ /brtan po dal 'byor ldan pa'i blo/ /rgyun rtag gsal ba yod gyur pas/ /

ci ltar bsams pa de 'grub kyi/ /gzhan du yang ni de ltar min/ /mig la skyon zhugs lus kyi ni/ /dngos gang gsal bar blta ba ltar/ /bla ma dang ni bral gyur na/ /sngags kyi byin brlabs snang ba med/ /lus ngag yid kyi sgo nas kyang / /

rnam pa kun du bla ma la/ /dmod pa 'bad de spang bar bya/ /dmad pas dmyal sogs ngan 'gror 'gro/ /bla ma'i ngag las byung ba dang / /ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya mchod/ /oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid d+ha lo tsa na

sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ bsang gtor dang ku sha dgram pa'i sngags so/ /oM dz+wa la dz+wa lA na lArka swA hA/ sbar ba'i sngags so/ /na maHsa man ta bud d+hA NA~M/ oM ag ne ye A dI pya a bI sha ma hA shri ye ha bya ka bya ba ha nA ya

swA hA/ mchod mar gyi sngags so/ /oM sarba pA pa~M da ha na badzra ye swA hA/ til gyi sngags so/ /oM sarba sa~M pA de swA hA/ /zho dang zan dam pa yi'o/ /oM badzra basmi ku ru ku ru swA hA/ ud pal lo/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta swA hA/ 'bras kyi'o/ /

oM badzra a pra te ha ta badzra swA hA/ ku sha'o/ /oM badzra bi dzA ya swA hA/ lag pan gyi'o/ /oM badzra mA le puSh+pa ye swA hA/ mngar gsum dang dkar gyi'o/ /oM badzra ma hA be gA ya swA hA/ nas kyi'o/ /oM ma hA ba lA ya swA hA/ sran ma ma sha yi'o/ /

oM badzra g+hasma ri swA hA/ gro'o/ /oM badzra yadz+nyA ya swA hA/ u dum bA ra'o/ /oM ti ti pri mi swA hA/ byang chub shing ngo / /oM badzrA ya swA hA/ n+ya ya gro d+ha'o/ /oM badzra na~M ka ya swA hA/ a mra'i'o/ /oM AHhrIHhUM/ thams cad du bsang ba'o/ /chus

ni dag par byed pa dang / /rdul sogs mun pa zhi bar byed/ /zhi ba chu yi dkyil 'khor bar/ /dkar po zlum po kho na'o/ /sa ni rtswa shing 'bru me tog /bskyed dang dngos po rgyas par byed/ /rgyas pa'i sa yi dkyil 'khor ltar/ /ser po

gru bzhi pa na'o/ /rlung gis sdud dang 'byed pa dang / /dbang du byas nas g.yo bar byed/ /dbang la rlung gi dkyil 'khor ltar/ /zla gam dmar po'i kha dog go/ mes ni smin cing bsreg pa dang / /drag shul gyis ni yal bar byed/ /

drag po gru gsum me'i dkyil 'khor ltar/ /nang dmar rgyab ni nag por bya/ /mkha' la nyi ma shar ba ni/ /mun pa'i sgrib pa zhi bar byed/ /zhi la shar du bltas pa ste/ /dpal ldan gos kyang dkar po'o/ /nyi ma byang du 'gro ba'i tshe/ /

dngos po rgyas par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ /rgyas pa byang du bltas bya ba/ /gos ni ser ram ljang khu shis/ /nyi ma thal nas mtshan mo ni/ /dbang du dngos po 'gyur ba'i phyir/ /dbang la nub phyogs bltas pa dang / /gos kyang dmar ser

rab tu shis/ /nyi ma lhor 'gro'i dus su ni/ /shin du grangs ba'i chu yis ni/ /rtswa sog dngos rnams bsad nas kyang / /des dang 'thor dang dengs pa dang / /skabs dang g.yar dang dub pa dang / /rab tu g.yos dang bcas par

'gyur/ /mngon spyod lho yi phyogs bltas nas/ /gos kyang sngo dang nag po bya/ /tsam pa ka dang pu ti ka /lag skyes pad ma dkar po dang / /ku mud dkar po zla seng rnams/ /chu gtsang dang bar bcas pa dag /zhi ba'i las la

mchod par bya/ /many+dzu nA ga bi sha ri/ /su mu le dang a spras dang / /gser mdog chen po chu dung dang / /tsi'u le ser dang pad ma ser/ /chu bo chen po chur bcas pa/ /rgyas pa'i las la bsngags pa'o/ /mu tsi na dang man du

dmar/ /lo yi che dang nya sha rnams/ /sin du ra dang pad ma dmar/ /ku mu ta rigs dmar po rnams/ /lu ma'i chu dang bcas pa ste/ /dbang gi las la mchod par bya/ /u pal k+She pa la ka dang / /ud khye ba ba dang ma

mi shi/ /dzu mong sbyin la mgo bo dang / /phag rna daN+Dota pa la rnams/ /khron pa'i chu dang lhan cig tu/ /mngon spyod las la mchod par bya/ /sA lu dkar po zan dang zho/ /pri ka spos ni zhi ba la/ /sA lu dmar po'i zan

'o ma/ /tsan dan dmar po dbang la'o/ /gro dang ma sha bser ba'i zan/ /hu lu ka ni rgyas pa la'o/ /nas dang bra bo'i zan gu gul/ /btsos pa'i sha dang lhan cig ste/ /drag po'i las de zhal zas dang / /bdug spos

bye brag shes par bya/ /rtsi mar dang ni a ba se'i/ /sdong bur ldan pa'i mar me ni/ /zhi ba'i las la shin tu shis/ /yang na pad dkar sdong bu'o/ /til lam shin tu dngas ma dang / /sa ri ha yi sdong bu ni/ /rgyas pa'i las la shin tu shis/ /

yang na ba yi lag gi cha/ /na ke la yi mar dang ni/ /pad ma dmar po'i mar dang ni/ /dbang gi las la shin du shis/ /yang na ba ya ma ri'o/ /yungs dang tsi li mar dang ni/ /tsi tra'i sdong bu mar me ni/ /yang na gso ma'i

shun pa yis/ /mdog dmar dal zhing gsal ba ni/ /gangs ri'i rtse ltar rab 'bar ba/ /bar bre smra gul spos dkar dri/ /zhi ba'i las ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /mdog dmar g.yo zhing mog pa la/ /nyi ma thal ka'i ri rtse

'dra/ /shib sgra ma li ka la'i dri/ /dbang gi las 'grub the tshom med/ /mdog ser mig g.yo dngas pa la/ /nyi ma shar ba'i ri ltar 'bar/ /lhab sgra tsam pa ka yi dri/ /rgyas pa'i las 'grub the tshom med/ /
le brgan mdog ldan 'khyil zhing smug /hur sgra rul dri bro ba dang / /nags kyi ri bo ltar 'bar ba/ /mngon spyod las la 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jig rten ting 'dzin ldan grub pa'i/ /drang srong rigs la dpag

med kyang / /me yi lha ni bzhi bcu bzhi/ /sbyin sreg las la spang bar bya/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i ting 'dzin can/ /bcu gnyis grangs ni gzung bar bya/ /gnya' na ka dang sa bi ki/ /tuk+Shu se'u mya s+ye tro dang / /lto

ba yid skyes khro bo dang / /dmar po mri ta cho ma li/ /b+hi su ya ke bcu gnyis po/ /phan 'dogs la sogs las la sbyar/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg thal bas ni/ /'byung po phra mo zhi bar byed/ /dbang gi thal bas 'byung po

'ching / /rgyas pas 'dod pa'i las sbyin byed/ /ri bo rtse la gtor bar bya/ /drag pos 'byung po sel bar bya/ /lam gyi gzhung du gdong bar bya/ /zhi dang dbang gi zhing phyogs dang / /ra ba skyed mos tshal du gtor/ /dag par byed pas chu bo

ltar/ /rgyas pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / /gang bar byed pa rgya mtsho ltar/ /sbyin sreg gis ni lha mnyes shing / /sngags bsgrub sngags kyi las rnaMs 'grub/ /drang srong tshogs rnams thaMd dang / /dri za'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang / /'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang / /

sbyin sreg gis ni rab dga' nas/ /rnal 'byor grogs byed bsrung ba dang / /skyob phyir tshe ring dpal 'phel zhing / /nad med longs spyod rgyas pa dang / /bsam pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi

rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma dra ba zhes bya ba las me la brten pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' che/ /rdzu 'phrul 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ /mkha' la yi ge sprul nas ni/ /'gro don sna tshogs mdzad

pa zhig /'khor bcas dkyil 'khor der lhags nas/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /mchod pa'i sprin gyis rgyas par mchod/ /phyogs gcig 'khod nas ston pa la/ /mgrin gcig gsung ni snyan pa yis/ /'di skad tshig ni

gsol ba 'debs/ /oM mtshan dang dpe byad brgyan pa'i sku/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /chos kyi longs spyod ci snyed pa/ /rdzogs par longs spyod mdzad phyag 'tshal/ /gang la mkho ba de'i gtso bo/ /'dren pa

gzugs brnyan du ma 'chang / /sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa'i sku/ /bde ba che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi 'gyur rnam dag byang chub la~M/ /phyogs chos byang chub sum bcu bdun/ /stobs dang mi 'jigs brtson mdzad pa/ /chos rnams

lhun grub sku phyag 'tshal/ /rnam dag rgya mtshor ldan rnams la/ /thugs rje rgya mtsho rgyun byung nas/ /zhing khams rgya mtsho spyod mdzad pa'i/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal/ /sngags dang rdzas dang phyag rgya'i rim/ /sna tshogs

kyis ni don mdzad phyir/ /theg pa kun las khyad par du/ /sngags kyi theg le khyad par 'phags/ /nan tan sgrub pa smos ci dgos/ /sngags dang phyag rgya 'chang bas kyang / /nad dang gnod sel bskal pa yi/ /sgrib rnams 'byang bas

khyad par 'phags/ /dbul po rigs dang dman pa yang / /zhugs ma thag nas bde ldan zhing / /cung zad grub nas nus mthu ni/ /dpag med 'byung bas khyad par 'phags/ /mgon po bcom ldan rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /dpal chen
ye shes kun gyi mdzod/ /'od zer nyi ma 'bum gzi can/ /'gro ba 'dren gtso ded dpon gyi/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas pa yi/ /'gro la sna tshogs phan don du/ /ci ltar

'gyur mdzad bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/ /pad ma'i spyan gdangs 'dzum mdzad nas/ /tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis/ /'gro la phan phyir 'di skad gsungs/ /dge byed phyag rgya sngags dang bcas/ /

'gro la phan phyir zhus pa ni/ /legs so rdzu 'phrul 'khor lo che/ /shes rab 'chang ba khyod legs so/ /sems dpa' chen po de phyir ngas/ /khyod la ngo mtshar legs par bshad/ /khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /

legs par zung la rgya cher spros/ /ras sam gro ga shing shun gang / /'jam zhing nag ris med pa la/ /gur gum gi'u wang sen rtsi dang / /tsan dan gyis ni phyag rgya bri/ /pad ma 'dab brgyad mu khyud bcas/ /'od dang ldan pa bri

bar bya/ /d+ha ra d+ha ra dang po ste/ /gnyis par d+hi ri d+hi ri spro/ /gsum pa d+hu ru d+hu ru ste/ /i ti bi Ti bzhi lnga pa/ /tsa le tsa le gnyis bri'o/ /pra tsa le gnyis drug par ro/ /ku su me dang ku su ma/ /bdun pa bris te brgyad pa la/ /

b+ha le i li mi li bri/ /oM mi tsi ti dza lam dang / /ha sar bcas pa dbus su'o/ /phyag 'tshal bcas sngags mtha' mar bri/ /rab rdzogs sngags kyis lhar dmigs nas/ /gtsang ma'i mchod pas mchod bya ste/ /sngags

stong brjod nas lus la gdags/ /'di ni bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /nad dang yams dang gdon rnams dang / /'jigs pa brgyad las skyob par nges/ /rig sngags bzlog na khyad par du/ /rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga la/ /'od kyi ra ba zlum

po yi/ /ri mo gnyis dang bcas pa bri/ /rwa rnams la ni hU~M gnyis par/ /rig sngags bzlog dang bcas pa bri/ /lte bar oM hrIHswA hA'i bar/ /bdag nyid bsrung shes bri bar bya/ /mu khyud dang por bri bar bya/ /gzigs dbang yid bzhin nor sngags so/ /
gnyis par gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags/ /gsum par pad ma gar dbang gi/ sngags rnams g.yas su bskor bar bya/ /gal te nad yams bzlog pa la/ /'dab brgyad pad ma mu khyud gsum/ /sngon ltar yi ge bkod
pa la/ /mu khyud gnyis par spyan gyi sngags/ /gsum par rten 'brel sngags bris nas/ /lus sam mgul du thogs pas ni/ /nad rims dang ni lhog 'brum tshogs/ /rlung gis rdul bzhin sel bar 'gyur/ /de nas

tshig de thos ma thag /lha min bu mo nad bdag mo/ /sa tu de bi zhes bya ba/ /bzhengs te thal mo sbyar byas te/ /bu mo khris ni mgrin gcig tu/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol/ /rje btsun 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig po/ /mgon po

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi sngags 'di gang 'dzin pa/ /gal te 'bruM nad byung na ni/ /bdag ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ /dam bcas 'di ni dran par bya/ /tre bal bya'i ka ka ba ni ta/ /su ma ya bi las ka ka ra ni/ /

ki shun pan tsa tra li he na yi/ /ke na ka tra tsa ra ni/ /ya mi rna nad ma na tsa/ /ma yi pa ra nad bur dwa/ /dwa tsa pid twa tsit+ta nad dan/ /sa stu de wi me wa/ /lha mos de skad gsol ma thag /mgon pos 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /oM oM b+ha bita

bit+ta mi ti/ ga tsan dra ka ra ni/ a mu ka s+ya ka pya/ lo hi ta ga~M d+ha pa rak+Sha ku ru swA hA/ byin brlabs ldan pa'i sngags de ni/ /rgyun du bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /oM ha ne se ru pa d+ha ri swA hA/ srad bu ma nyams dkar po la/ /

nyi shu rtsa gcig mdud par bya/ /bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi bzlas nas kyang / /lus sam mgul du gdags par bya/ /kraM hi tig tig tra tha prag shig /ta tha yo tha tsa la he hu~M hU~M phaT/ sran ma rdog po re re la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad brgyad bzlas pa yi/ /

'bru bdun thum por byas pa zhig /dri bzang bcas la mgul du thogs/ /yam nad kun dang 'brum nag nad/ /shin du gdug pa kun sel 'gyur/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang ba mo/ /dpal phreng mas ni 'di skad gsol/ /bdag gi

rig sngags 'di zlos pa/ /rims nad kun dang bral bar 'gyur/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ri Ni kA ya/ na mo badzra mu ra be+e dza ya/ ta thA ga tA ar ha te b+h+yaH

sa myaka sa~M bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM badzre badzre/ ma hA badzre/ sarba b+hi ri thA/ ha na ha na badzra/ sarba b+ha pra shra ma na ye swA hA/ mi skra mi rus sle hres dang / /gu gul yungs kar sgog skya dang / /shing shun gla rtsi 'khor lo ni/ /rtsib brgyad
phyogs bzhir hriHyig bri/ /mtshams bzhir bris te dbus su ming / /sngags 'di mu khyud dang po la/ /gnyis gdong bcu gcig pa yi sngags/ /bris nas lus sam mgul du thogs/ /nad rims thams cad sel ba

dang / /rnal 'byor kun dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang gis/ /'gro ba'i don du 'di skad gsol/ /rang 'byung can gyi ras la ni/ /sen rtsis 'khor lo rtsib bzhi pa/ /mu khyud gsum dang ldan pa bri/ /rtsib

bzhi hrIHla g.yon bskor du/ /hriHg+hi wa shi ku ru hrIH/ /mu khyud dang por mgon po ni/ /pad ma gar dbang sngags bri'o/ /gnyis pa ud pal dmar po phreng / /gsum pa lcag kyu nyi shu gcig /dbus su ba~M yig hrir
bcas bri/ /lha dam nyid kyang dam byed na/ /'gro ba gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /gsol dang bkra shis brjod pa dang / /bgegs kyi gnod pa sel 'dod pas/ /rtse gsum rdo rje rgya gram ste/ /dbus su spyan ras

gzigs dbang mgon/ /pad ma gtsug tor sngags bri'o/ /rwa rnams kun la hU~M yig ni/ /bgegs ming ud tsa Ta yis bskor/ /mu khyud dang po spyan ras gzigs/ /ha la ha la'i sngags bri'o/ /gnyis pa khro bo rta skad sngags/ /

gsum par bgegs dgra'i sngags bris la/ /de rgyab me yi phung po bri/ /gang zhig 'khor lo 'di bris pas/ /sred med bu ltar mthu che ba/ /bug pa can yang 'thor byed na/ /phran tsheg dbyer ba smos ci dgos/ /gang la ser sna rnams chag shing / /longs

spyod 'phel bar mi 'gyur na/ /phun sum tshogs ldan dpal 'phel phyir/ /skyob pa'i phyag rgya bshad par bya/ /rgyal po 'am ni dge 'dun la/ /gtsang ldan ras bzang blangs nas kyang / /dag par bkrus te dri bzang byug /legs par

brgyan nas thig btab ste/ /gur kum dang ni gla rtsi yis/ /pad ma 'dab ma bcu drug bri/ /phyogs bzhir 'dab mar dpal be'u ste/ /mtshams bzhir yid bzhin nor bu bri/ /mtshams brgyad la ni yi ge ga~M/ oM dang badzra da ke

hU~M/ /yi ge drug gis bskor bar bya/ /mu khyud dang por mi bshol sngags/ /gnyis pa gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags/ /gsum pa ud pal phreng ba ste/ /yang tog rtse 'am mdzod bzhag nas/ /gsol btab mchod na long spyod

'phel/ /bud med gang zhig bu 'dod pas/ /de bzhin pad ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /phyogs bzhir hrI ni mtshams su drang / /dbus su khye'u yi gzigs shig bri/ /phyogs bzhir yid bzhin nor bu bri/ /sngags bu stsol bcas bri

bar bya/ /mtshams bzhir oM dang a ma ra/ /dzI wan tI ye swA hAs bskor/ /mu khyud dang po spyan ras gzigs/ /pad ma rgyan lung can gyi sngags/ /gnyis par gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags/ /gsum par uta pal dmar

po'i phreng / /'od 'phro rtag par mchod pa dang / /phul du byung ba'i bstod pas bstod/ /gsol ba 'debs shing sngags bzlas na/ /bu stsol 'gyur la the tshom med/ /bsrung dang nor 'phel dbang byed dang / /bu slong ba yi phyag rgya

ni/ /smin drug snar ma rgyal la bri/ /lhag ma rnams ni ci bder bri/ /gang zhig sems stor yid mi dga'/ /glo bur yi mug skye 'gyur na/ /pad ma 'dab ma bzhi pa yi/ /dbus su rang gzugs mtshan ma bri/ /'dab mar rdo rje mdog

bzhi pa/ /gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags kyis bskor/ /mu khyud la ni spyan ras gzigs/ /don yod zhags pa'i sngags bri'o/ /gnyis par rdo rje phreng ba bri/ /de'i rgyab 'od kyi phreng ba bri/ /rtag par mchod cing gsol ba gdab/ /nad sel tshe ring bsod

nams 'phel/ /gang zhig shes rab 'dod pas ni/ /dpal be'u rgyal po'i du mar ni/ /tri yig rgyab tu sngags 'dis bskor/ /oM dang skal de skal ma ni swA hA zhes pa bri/ /de rgyab mu khyud 'khor ba la/ /mgrin pa sngon po'i rtsa sngags

bri/ /de rgyab 'od kyis ra ba bri/ /gang gis 'di 'chang mchod pa la/ /nad dang gnod pa kun bral te/ /dug dang rims nad 'joms pa dang / /shes rab myur du 'phel bar 'gyur/ /yul du lo thog nyams pa dang / /thog 'brug ser ba rgod pa dang / /

klu dang sa bdag gnod pa ste/ /de bsal sbyor ba bshad par bya/ /shing kun dkar po ma nyams pa/ /nyams dga'i sbyor ba nyi rim la/ /rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa/ /mig sman gyis ni bri bar bya/ /grwa rnams la ni hU~M yig la/ /oM dang dzi ni ti ti te/ /hU~M

phaT ces pa'i sngags kyis bskor/ /mu khyud dang po mgon po che/ /gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags phreng bri/ /gnyis par thugs rje chen po mgon/ /mi gshol ba yi sngags kyis bskor/ /gsum par rdo rje phreng ba dang / /me yi

'od dang ldan par bri/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bstan tsam gyis/ /klu yi rgyal po mthu ldan rnams/ /'khor dang bcas te lus skams 'gyur/ /gang gi khyim du gdod pa dang / /ma he rta sogs yams nad can/ /bsal ba'i thabs kyi phyag

rgya ni/ /brtan par drang srong tshogs rnams nyon/ /ko bi da ri'i shing la ni/ /khru gang khru gnyis dbyibs gru bzhi/ /gas grugs chag sogs med pa la/ /shin tu srab 'jam sor gnyis rngams/ /shing de la ni rta babs
gzugs/ /'khor lo gdugs dang bcas pa yi/ /brtsegs pa'i g.yas zur dang po ni/ /rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga ste/ /gnyis pa ud pa la dmar po'o/ /gsum pa 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ser/ /bzhi par pad ma dkar

po'o/ /g.yon zur dang por pad ma dmar/ /gnyis pa ud pal sngon po'o/ /gsum par nor bu bzhi rgya gram/ /nang khang du ni pad ma bya/ /'dab ma brgyad pa 'od ldan pa'o/ /lte ba dang ni 'dab brgyad la/ /oM dang pi shA tsi par+Na/ /sha ba ri sarba bya

d+hi/ /pra sha ma ni swA hA/ /zhes paM yig la ni bskor bar bri/ /mu khyud dang po spyan ras gzigs/ /gdong bcu gcig gi sngags bri'o/ /gnyis par chos kyi gtsug tor gyi/ /rtsa ba'i phreng sngags bri bar bya/ /rgya skyegs dang ni mtshal yin te/ /

de la shing spyin byug par bya/ /mchod dang gsol gdab sngags dag ni/ /bdun stong re re brjod byas nas/ /sgo gong la gdags byung 'jug tshe/ /'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rta phyugs yams nad ma lus la/ /rig pa'i lha mo

'i tshogs bcas pa'i/ /'jig rten mgon gyi rig sngags mthus/ /myur du sel bar mnan pa dang / /bzlog dang bcing bar mdzod ces brjod/ /phyugs bdag chen pos skyong ba ltar/ /glang po rta bong ma he tshogs/ /brtan zhing nad

dang gnod pa med/ /shin du 'phel zhing rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dmag dpung chen po 'jigs pa la/ /khyad par du ni skyob pa yi/ /phyag rgya sbyor ba mnyan par gyis/ /yung bas ras sam shing la ni/ /pad

dkar steng du kha T+wA~M dang / /ral gri 'od ma bri bar bya/ /de la gdug gu gsum gyis bskor/ /dang po gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags/ /gnyis pa seng ge sgra yi sngags/ /gsum par ha ya chen po'i sngags/ /de rgyab me yi ra ba bri/ /

'di la gsol ba btab nas ni/ /g.yul ngor khyer te zhugs pa gang / /dgra dpung chen po 'bros 'gyur te/ /rang nyid g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /longs spyod phyir ni byang bltas bri/ /dbang byed pa ni nub tu ste/ /
g.yul bzlog pa ni lhor bltas bri/ /lhag ma rnams la shar bltas bri/ /dkar ser dmar dang sngo ba yi/ /dbye bas zas dang gos shes bya/ /'dzum dang rngam dang dgod dang khro/ /bzhin

gyi rnam pa bshad pa yi/ /sngags dang sngags kyi 'od phreng dang / /lha yi kha dog dbye ba dang / /snod la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang / /rgyan yang de ltar shes par bya/ /kun kyang rin chen pad ma'i gdan/ /kha dog sna tshogs
ldan par ni/ /sngags kyis yig 'bru'i lha rnams bzhugs/ /sngags rdzogs nas ni sngags su dmigs/ /gang gis phyag rgya 'chang byed la/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang / /rig pa'i lha mo'i

tshogs rnams dang / /'jig rten 'dren pa'i tshogs bcas dang / /spyan ras gzigs dbang tshogs chen dang / /khro bo tshogs bcas ma lus dang / /'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan rnams/ /ci 'dod las rnams ma lus pa'i/ /

grogs dang dpung du byas nas ni/ /tshul bzhin du ni bsgrub pa la/ /brtson 'grus gang dang gang gis kyang / /the tshom du ni mi bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma dra ba las
phyag rgya la brten pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas mkha' la gshegs pa yi/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i drang srong mchog /mtshan dpe du ma rgyas pa che/ /nyi ma'i gong bu zhes bya ba/ /drang srong
rje dpon tshogs kyi mchog /'gro don rdzogs mdzad thugs rje can/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon po la/ /sangs rgyas tshig gis 'di skad gsol/ /oM 'od zer du ma ther zug gi /
srid 'dam stug po sel byed rgyal/ /yon tan ye shes kyis brgyan sku/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal/ /gsung snyan yan lag brjod bral chos/ /bag chags ri bo snyil
mdzad rgyal/ /skye 'gag bral ston sde snod gsum/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal/ /skye 'gag gnod bral mnyam bzhag pa/ /ting 'dzin shes rab 'phel mdzad rgyal/ /ye shes
gzigs pa mtha' yas thugs/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal/ /sna tshogs sman dang sngags sbyar nas/ /lha yi gong bu'i ri lu ni/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /dngos
grub ma lus rdzogs pa yi/ /thugs rje'i nyi ma lham mdzad pa'i/ /mgon po pad mas bshad du gsol/ /'gro rnams ma rig 'dam la zhen/ /srid pa'i thag pas rgya gram bcings/ /'dod chags
zhe sdang mun pas g.yogs/ /nga rgyal phrag dog chu bos g.yengs/ /ngan rtog log lam g.yang sar ltung / /bag med ser sna'i dug gis myos/ /sdig pa'i grib mas rnam par rgyal/ /bag
chags 'thug po'i ri bos mnan/ /mgon po khyod ni thugs rjes ngal ba med/ /nyes pa'i rgya mtsho bsal ba'i phyir/ /shes rab thabs 'byung bshad du gsol/ /de nas 'jig rten mgon po rje/ /thugs rje
thugs dpal mnga' ba yi/ /thugs dam rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu bcas/ /khyad par gsung 'di bka' stsal to/ /mtha' dag gzugs sgra thos pa dang / /rdzu 'phrul bsgyur dang gzhan sems shes/ /
'das dang ma 'ongs don shes dang / /mtha' yas shes drug las spyod pa/ /dngos dang rtags dang cha mthun gyis/ /rnam pa bcwa brgyad dag tu 'gyur/ /phra dang yang dang mchod par bya ba dang / /bdag
por gyur dang dbang du 'gyur ba dang / /gar yang phyin yang 'dod dgur ldan pa dang / /dga' mgur gnas te dbang phyug yon tan no/ /rnam pa brgyad kyis dper bya yis/ /longs spyod dbang dang lus

la dbang / /tshe la dbang dang rkang mgyogs dang / /chu la mi 'bying mkha' la 'gro/ /sa 'og 'gro dang mi snang ba/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod sogs/ /dngos po gang dang gang bsgrub rnams/ /ri lus
las ni 'byung 'gyur gyi/ /gzhan gyi myur du 'grub mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ril bu ni/ /mtshams med la sogs byed pas kyang / /rnyed ma thag tu dngos grub 'gyur/ /nye dang dbang ldan lha yi
sras/ /ma mos dbang du byed gyur na/ /'byung po sha za lha min mi/ /ma mo mkha' 'gro 'byung po klu/ /dud 'gro la sogs rdzogs gzugs can/ /sems can gzhan lta snos ci dgos/ /dngos
grub bzang po 'dod pa yis/ /khyad par ri lus 'di bsgrub bya/ /gi'u wang dang ni lig bu mig /ldong ros bzang por sbyar ba yi/ /ri lu rgya sran tshad byas nas/ /snod gtsang nang du gzhag par
bya/ /sku yi mdun du sngags brjod na/ /sngan chad ma mthong snang ba 'am/ /sgra thos sam ni bde gshegs gzugs/ /yid 'ong mngon du byung ba sogs/ /mar ngo gsum gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas

zla ba gzas bzung tshe/ /ci 'byor mchod de snyim par bcug /bzlas brjod byas nas nyi shar na/ /du bar 'thul dang dri can 'gyur/ /dud 'thul lus la byugs pas kyang / /snang ba dang 'od gzugs can dang / /

'dzam gling phyogs rnams rgyu ba dang / /longs spyod che dang ldan 'gyur te/ /shi 'phos nas ni dga' ldan gnas su ste/ /dri ma tsam gyis lus byugs kyang / /'gro ba thams cad dbang byed cing / /thos pa 'dzin

cing sgyu rtsal mkhas/ /shi nas 'dzam gling 'di nyid du/ /lcang lo can gyi gnod sbyin ni/ /'khor la gzhon nu'i rigs su skye/ /yang na mi yi rgyal po 'am/ /glang po nyid du skye bar 'gyur/ /'bar ba lus la bskus na blta/ /
rig sngags 'chang lus nyi shar mdog /bskra par gnas te 'dod dgur spyod/ /'jig rten kun du thogs med rgyu/ /mkha' lding sa 'og chu bran 'gro/ /sangs rgyas kun nas phyin nas kyang / /dbang por gnas te
rgyal por gnas/ /sprul pa'i rdzas kyis bde gshegs mchod/ /'dod nas shi 'phos 'jig rten khams/ /gzhan 'das sangs rgyas dag tu skye/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yis/ /bdag nyid yid du

'ong 'dod pas/ /gur kum ga bur gla rtsi dang / /gi'u wang bsregs nas sngags stong bzlas/ /brdungs te phye mar byas nas kyang / /sngags stong bzlas te chu gtsang gis/ /ril bu rgya sran tshad byas nas/ /re re la

yang stong stong brjod/ /rlung dang nyi mas ma rig par/ /bskams nas snod gtsang gzhag par bya/ /ri bu tsam cig mur na yang / /rgyal po blon po 'khor bcas kyis/ /mthong na bu bzhin gzigs pas na/ /tha mal skye bo smos

ci dgos/ /nor rnams gzhan gyis ster ba dang / /bsgo ba la ni ngag btsan 'gyur/ /ga pur gur kum gi'u bang dang / /tsan dan gan da brda dang / /gla rtsi dag ste cha mnyam du/ /re re sngags stong bzlas nas su/ /brdungs te ril bu byas pa

dag /g.yon pa'i zhal la gdags par bya/ /bdun nas nya'i bar du ni/ /sngags bzlas pa dang mchod pa bya/ /bdugs pas nad dang gdon rnams sel/ /mig la byugs pas rgyal po dang / /rgyal mo bu dang bu mo dang / /blon po
la sogs dbang du 'gyur/ /khar bcug tsam gyis grol bar 'ong / /gdams pa thams cad don yod 'gyur/ /spyi bor btags na byad stems dang / /g.yul las shin tu rgyal bar 'gyur/ /gal te phye mas bdugs

pas kyang / /sdig pa thams cad byang 'gyur te/ /kun gyi mthong dang dga' ba dang / /gzi byin 'phags pa kun gyis mchod/ /ga bur gla rtsi gur kum dang / /tsan dan gla rtsi ka ko la/ /spos kyi rgyal po pad ma dang / /uta pal sngo dang tsan

dan dmar/ /re re la yang stong stong bzlas/ /cha mnyam phye ma gi'u wang bcas/ /ril bu tsa na ka tshad bya/ /grib skams byas nas lus la 'chung / /gling bzhi kun khyab rgyal srid 'thob/ /kra ku la yi thang chu dang / /ldong ros

bed dang ud pal sngo/ /rgya mtsho lbu ba gi'u wang dang / /yung dang skyer pa gur kum dang / /ga phur dang ni gla rtsi gsum/ /re re la yang sngags stong bzla/ /de nas sku yi mgul btags te/ /stong bzlas dril nas ril bu bya/ /

mig nad sel na chu dang sbyar/ /so nad la ni ka ka ru/ /rna ba'i nad la ru rta ste/ /uta pal mu tig mig nad la/ /gre ba'i nad la ba sha ka /glo nad la ni ba le ka /sha ka ra'i thang dang sbyar/ /rlung nad la ni mar dang sbyar/ /

mkhris nad la ni tig ta dang / /bad kan la ni lga dang sbyar/ /mdze nad la ni dug mo nyungs/ /ma zhu ba la kha ru tshwa/ /skrangs nad rnams la thug po che/ /bgegs dang yams nad sel ba la/ /gu gul dang bcas bdug par bya/ /

ril bu'i yon tan mtha' yas ni/ /nam yang brjod par mi nus so/ /gu gul la ni stong bzlas pa'i/ /ri lus bgegs tshogs sel bar byed/ /ke su rtsa dang sge'u gsher dang / /ba la ta ka tsha ba gsum/ /ser po mu zi phye ma rnaMs/ /

sbrang rtsi dang bcas ri lu bya/ /pad ma gar dbang sngags stong bzlas/ /zos pa tsam gyis lus rgyas te/ /nad dang gdon dang dgras mi tshugs/ /'dod rnams thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /ta ka'i rtsa ba ba ru ra/ /skyu ru ra dang til ti la/ /mnyam byas

srin bya'i khrag dang ni/ /ri lu byas la mig la byug /klu dang yi dgas khang pa dang / /sa 'og thams cad mthong bar nges/ /byis pa zla ba gsum pa'i lce/ /nyin gcig spos phor nang du gzhug /gnyis pa ra 'o gsum dang 'byung / /bzhi

pa ril bu tshil chen btso/ /lnga pa sbrang rtsi nang du ste/ /drug pa dngul chu'i nang du bzhag /bdun pa rigs ngan thod par ni/ /byi la'i khrag gis bsku la gzhag /skams nas bya dang spyang ku'i sha /lhan cig rang gi khar bcug na/ /de ma thag tu

mi snang 'gyur/ /gzhan yang yon tan dpag tu med/ /ldong ros gyen du bcas pa dang / /dza ti lo ma sa bon bcas/ /ri lu sngags stong bzlas pa yis/ /bar snang la ni 'gro bar nges/ /ban du ma dang ki ram dang / /ma ka ri dang su mi

tam/ /bra pan ta ma'i ri lu ni/ /nyi zla bzas bzung dus su mid/ /shes rab phul du 'byung ba ste/ /thos pa 'dzin 'gyur smos ci dgos/ /gi'u wang sA hA tsi na dang / /sre ta sbrang gi rilu bya/ /sngags stong bzlas nas khar bcug na/ /'das pa'i

don rnams shes par 'gyur/ /gi'u wang sug pa phye ma dang / /ba ra swA ta ha su ri/ /a ra hu ri sbrang rtsir bcas/ /ril bu byas nas sngags stong bzla/ /mid pas ma 'ongs don rnams shes/ /gzhan yang nad 'don byed pa yis/ /ri lu

chen po bshad par bya/ /rgyal dang rnam rgyal na gu la/ /kan d+ha na gu li dang ni/ /ru Ni a pa ya ba ni/ /i pa ya na ta ga ra/ /gan d+ha ga dang pri yang ku/ /'khor lo che dang 'khor lo dang / /biSh+nu ka Ti de bzhin du/ /so ma ra tsa un na ti/ /

re re la yang sngags phreng dang / /brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod par bya/ /de nas brdungs te sbrang dang bcas/ /byis pa la ni dpung par te/ /bu 'dod mo la mgul par gdags/ /'di btags pa yi de ma thag /'jigs pa brgyad dang nad

las grol/ /ba mar shu dag ba lcir bcas/ /lcags kyi snod du btsos pa yi/ /ril bu a mra'i 'bras bu tsam/ /sngags 'di stong phrag brgyad brjod de/ /phyis ni nyi shu gcig brjod nas/ /snga bar mid pas shes rab 'phel/ /

na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM shud d+he mr-i ti ba la bar d+ha ni swA hA/ srod dang tho rangs dge sbyong dang / /dal smra gsong po dul bag can/ /khrus la dga'

zhing dri bzang bsten/ /spyod lam rab zhi khro ba med/ /rtag tu bsngags brjod brtse sems can/ /spyan ras gzigs nyid la cher dang / /gdug bag can la mchi ma can/ /lung thob bla mar rab dga' ba'i/ /skyes mchog de la rab

dge zhing / /'jig rten skyong gi lha rnams dang / /'byung ba la sogs smos ci dgos/ /rtag par rang gi yid la ni/ /snying po gsang sngags bcang bar bya/ /nye ba'i snying po lus dag pa'i/ /lha yang rang la nye bar byed/ /

rtsa ba'i sngags rnams brjod mang ba/ /khri dang 'bum dang sa ya dang / /sa ya gsum dang drug brjod de/ /kha cig la yang bzhi dang ni/ /lnga tsam gyis ni de grub yin/ /las la sbyar ba bdun dang ni/ /bcu bzhi nyi shu rtsa gcig

dang / /brgya dang de bzhin stong gis rdzogs/ /de ma thag tu chu yin te/ /cung zad ba ni mar gyis bya/ /bstan par gyur pa ka ra te/ /ches bstan pa la srad bu yin/ /sman dang sngags kyis sel byed de/ /ril bus ring du skyong byed

yin/ /sngags bsgrub pa la mi mos pa'o/ /mdun du rtsom na de dag rnams/ /de skad gsungs pa'i de ma thag /rdo rje snying po nyi 'od dang / /pad dkar rin chen snying po dang / /pad spyan gzigs kyi snying po dang / /ye shes dbang phyug pad

dbang phyug /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams/ /rang rang sde dpung sder bcas pa/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams/ /'jig rten dbang la cher dmigs nas/ /mchod pa'i tshogs rnams bkram byas te/ /rin
chen rigs las 'khrungs pa yi/ /mchod pa nam mkha' gtos par bkang / /rol mo du ma lhab lhub dang / /sil snyan lha'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /sprin mdzes tshogs rnams rab 'khrigs ltar/ /bkod pa mtha' yas
bsham bya ste/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs/ /mgon gyur ye shes mnga' ba rnams/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang gsung snyan la/ /yi rang skyes nas mtshan chen brjod/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang mchog brtan

che/ /'jig rten dbang po dbang phyug che/ /pad ma sems dpa' pad 'byung che/ /rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dag pa chen po chos rgyal gtso/ /blo gros chen po sems dpa' che/ /pad ma 'chang dang pad ma dpa'/ /pad ma'i mgon

khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad ma las byung dam pa'i yid/ /pad ma gsal mdzad dga' mdzad po/ /pad ma'i rdo rje pad ma'i sku/ /khyod mchog spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snang ba kun chen thabs po che/ /che mnyaM dga' ba dgongs pa

che/ /dpa' bo chen po brtan chen rgyal/ /bde ba chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /bsam chen mkhyen chen theg chen po/ /rnal 'byor chen po mes po che/ /bde stsol bde mdzad dga' mdzad che/ /pad ma rgyas zhal phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos
mnga' don mnga' pad ma rgyal/ /dag pa chos mnga' chos mchog 'dzin/ /rmad 'byung chen ldan chos rab 'chang / /chos kyi tshogs khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sems dpa' mchog sems dpa'/ /rin chen
sems dpa' chos sems dpa'/ /dam tshig sems dpa' las sems dpa'/ /kun mkhyen sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal/ /'jig rten dpa' bo dpa' bo mchog /rnam par gzigs gtso skyob mdzad che/ /

'jig rten gsal mdzad 'jig rten don/ /'jig rten mgon po phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten yi ge kha dog che/ /yi ge che tshungs yig drug mchog /yi ge'i rang bzhin yi ge gzigs/ /yi ge 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /

pad ma'i phyag rgya pad ma'i lag /legs so sbyin mdzad dbugs sbyin pa'o/ /sangs rgyas tshogs de sangs rgyas chos/ /sangs rgyas che mkhyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshad med che sku sangs rgyas sku/ /gzugs bzang 'chang ldan

rdo rje gzugs/ /gzi brjid che mchog chos snang ba/ /snang bar mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtso mgon rgyal po pad ma'i dpal/ /chos kyi dpal mgon 'dren mdzad pa/ /tshangs pa'i mgon chen khyab 'jug mgon/ /tshangs pa'i

sras khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /cher gsal gtso bo snang ba mchog /'od chen mdzad pa rang gsal mdzad/ /snang ba chen po kun gsal mgon/ /snang ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spyan can spyan po che/ /chos kyi spyan te

gzigs pa che/ /ting 'dzin chen po ye shes mtsho/ /rdo rje spyan khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dren pa'i gtso bo dbang sgyur gtso/ /mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas sras/ /rgyal thabs mnyes pa khyu mchog che/ /sangs rgyas dpag med

phyag 'tshal lo/ /drag po chen po rtul chen po/ /ha la chen po seng ge sgra/ /mgrin sngon gar gyi dbang phyug gtso/ /ye shes gtsug tor phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang / /'chang la nad med bgegs med de/ /dpal 'byor

'jig rten dbang phyug mthong / /yang yang lhar skye mya ngan 'da'/ /de skad gsungs nas blo ldan rnams/ /rang rang stan la mngon par 'khod/ /de tshe phyogs bcu rnam par g.yos/ /bdud rigs thams cad mog por gyur/ /

de nas gzungs kyi dbang phyug gis/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la/ /rtogs pa'i ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /nga'i mtshan nyid 'di gsungs so/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul can/ /dkar lam bcu pa rnam spro ba/ /sems can

gang du 'dod sbyor ba'i/ /rigs ni rigs chen thams cad pa'o/ /lus ngag yid bcu spyod bcu ni/ /rgyun mi chad du sbyor mod kyang / /rags pa yi ni gzugs brnyan mthus/ /sngags sbyor gsang sngags 'dzin pa yi/ /lha la
goms pa lha mthong ngam/ /mngon shes dang po sems gsal bas/ /mkha' mnyam sems kyi rdzu 'phrul che/ /sems snang rigs pa 'dzin pa'i sa/ /mtshan ma phra ba la sogs pa'i/ /mngon shes 'jig rten gsal

mthong sa/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i snying po ste/ /bstan pa'i ye shes las byung ba'o/ /dam tshig sdom pa mkha' mnyam spyod/ /sems dang sems dpa' dbyer med dang / /zhi lam sgro skur chad pa dang / /sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'gog

dang lam/ /bzhi bzhi lhun gyis grub pa dang / /rten 'brel zab don mngon gyur pa/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs kun mchog /mtshan med ting 'dzin la gnas nas/ /rtsol bcas gzhan don sgrub pa dang / /rtsol med shugs kyis bde

'byung dang / /nges tshig chos don spos pa'i mtha'/ /rdzu 'phrul du ma spyod yul la/ /rigs chen yongs su grub pa'i sa/ /mkha' spyod phun sum tshogs ldan cing / /sems kyi snang ba du mar sgyur/ /dngos rnams spros spang bsdu spyod pa/ /

rig 'dzin phyag rgya chen po yis/ /chos sku kun snang kun du 'od/ /bde skur snang ba pad ma'i spyan/ /yi ge 'khor lo sprul tshogs che/ /mtshon bya mtshan nyid rdo rje 'dzin/ /zag med ye shes bla ma'i sa/ /'du 'bral med pa'i
bde chen sa/ /de ltar drug ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /sa chen bla med mthar gnas so/ /ngo bo spros med chos sems pa/ /gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i rgyu gcig go/ sems can sems snyoms byang sems 'dzin/ /nges par
sgrub pa'i rgyu gnyis so/ /sems can mi gtong tshul khrims bsrung / /sngags don mi spong nyid dang gsum/ /rang gis sngags bsgrub gzhan gyis sngags/ /bar mi gcod dang 'gro ba la/ /byams pa

bsgrub dang snying rje bsgrub/ /grub par byed pa'i rgyu bzhi'o/ /dben pa bsten dang 'du 'dzi spong / /thos pa bsam zhing de don spyod/ /phyi rol sngags spong zhe sdang skyung / /de dag sngags sgrub rgyu lnga'o/ /
dad pa 'dun pa gsol ba dang / /phyi nang sngags la mi spyod dang / /spros med ston pa'i gzhung 'jug dang / /theg chen mdo gzhung 'dzin pa dang / /sngags gzhung tshol ba mi skyo dang / /bed
spyod brtson dang drug pa'o/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg mchod gtor brtson/ /phyi rol dka' thub gdung med dang / /snod bcud 'og min gnas lha dang / /bu mo pha rol phyin yul
lha/ /'gro ba mi bslu chos mi 'byed/ /theg dman mi len pa dang bdun/ /nyan thos rang rgyal blo ldan dang / /rig 'dzin rdzu 'phrul the tshom med/ /lha dang bla ma'i bsnyen
bkur dang / /dbang bskur lung nod spro ba dang / /ser sna med dang gtong la dga'/ /gsang ba dga' zhing mi g.yengs dang / /gzi brjid dbang che'i lus thob dang / /grags kun blo
ldan brgyad por blta/ /skur pa med cing bden par smra/ /bag yod tshul 'chos spangs pa ste/ /brgyad pa de yang bsgrub pa'i rgyu/ /rgyu med 'bras bu ga la srid/ /
gang zhig lcags kyus bzung bas gnyis re nas/ /klu phrug 'bum phrag 'dren ltar dge ba'i sems/ /kun slong byang chub rin chen thob mdzad rgyu/ /rtag par 'chang na gnas bsgyur byed par

'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /blo ldan rnams la bka' stsal pa/ /legs so legs so sems dpa' che/ /gang dag de dag de bzhin du/ /bde 'dod rnaM par g.yeng ba dang / /des ni sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das/ /

gdung ba chags sdang 'khrug pa dang / /des ni log pa'i chos 'dor yang / /dge sbyong log ltas tshangs pa'i gdon/ /sngags log spyod byed rig 'dzin gdon/ /gdul dka' dag la rgyun rings so/ /skye ngan 'jigs

phyir blo zab spyod/ /gang gis khyim du rgyud 'di yod/ /bri dang bklag dang mchod pa dang / /rim gro ched du gsal byed dang / /bkra shis tshe ring dpal 'byor skye/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs de dag dang / rig pa'i lha mo dang / khro bo du ma dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/

bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/ sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ /

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma dra ba zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// //rig pa'i 'byung gnas rig pa'i 'od zer gyis shes rab pad ma rgyas pa'i kha che'i yul bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i

gtsug lag khang chen por paN Di ta chen po so ma shrI b+ha bya zhes bya ba dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba kyu ra dge slong tshul khrims 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o/ /zhus dag /bkri shis shog / //
